GSP33m_mbhtnu:930: indro'ṅgade caiva tato'ṅgado hi balī nitāntaṃ sa babhūva śaśvat / 3.78 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:931: xxxix.ye'nye ca bhūpāḥ kṛtavīryajādyā balādhikāḥ santi sahasraśo'pi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:933: svayaṃ ramā sīrata eva jātā sīteti rāmārthamanūpamā yā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:934: videharājasya hi yajñabhūmau suteti tasyaiva tatastu sā'bhūt / 3.80 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:936: sahānusargaḥ kathito'tra pūrvo yo yo guṇairnityamasau varo hi / 3.81 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:944: Oṃ / athābhyavardhaṃ ścaturāḥ kumārā nṛpasya gehe puruṣottamādyāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:945: nityapravṛddhasya ca tasya vṛddhirapekṣya lokasya hi mandadṛṣṭim / 4.1 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:946: nirīkṣya nityaṃ caturaḥ kumārān pitā mudaṃ santatamāpa coccam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:948: tanmātaraḥ paurajanā amātyā antaḥ purā vaiṣayikāṇsca sarve /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:949: avekṣamāṇāḥ paramaṃ pumāṃ saṃ svānandatṛptā iva sambabhūvuḥ / 4.3 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:950: tataḥ suvaṃ śe śaśinaḥ prasūto gādhīti śakrastanujo'sya cā'sīt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:951: vareṇa vipratvamavāpa yo'sau viśvasya mitraṃ sa ihā'jagāma / 4.4 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:952: tenārthito yajñarirakṣayaiva kṛcchreṇa pitrā'sya bhayād visṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:953: jagāma rāmaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena siddhāṇsramaṃ siddhajanābhivandyaḥ / 4.5 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:954: anugrahārthaṃ sa ṛṣeravāpa salakṣmaṇo'straṃ munito hi kevalam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:956: atho jaghānā'śu śareṇa tāṭakāṃ varād vidhātustadananyavadhyām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:957: rarakṣa yajñaṃ ca munernihatya subāhumīśānagirā vimṛtyum / 4.7 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:958: śareṇa mārīcamathārṇave'kṣipad vaco viriñcasya tu mānayānaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:959: avadhyatā tena hi tasya dattā jaghāna cānyān rajanīcarānatha / 4.8 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:960: tadā videhena sutāsvayaṃ varo vighoṣito dikṣu vidikṣu sarvaśaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:962: atho ahalyāṃ patinā'bhiśaptāṃ pradharṣaṇādindrakṛt ācchilīkṛt ām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:965: ananyabhaktāṃ ca sureśakāṅkṣayā vidhāya nārīṃ prayayau tayā'rcitaḥ / 4.11 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:970: tathā videhaḥ pratilabhya rāmaṃ sahasranetrāvarajaṃ gaviṣṭham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:974: sa āha cainaṃ paramaṃ vacaste karomi nātrāsti vicāraṇā me/
GSP33m_mbhtnu:975: śṛṇuṣva me'thāpi yathā pratijñā sutāpradānāya kṛt ā purastāt / 4.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:976: tapo mayā cīrṇamumāpateḥ purā varāyudhāvāptidhṛtena cetasā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:977: sa me dadau divyamidaṃ dhanustadā kathañcanācālyamṛte pinākinam / 4.17 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:979: kuto narāstadvarato hi kiṅkarā sahānasaivātra kṛṣanti kṛcchrataḥ / 4.18 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:980: adhāryametad dhanurāpya śaṅkarādahaṃ nṛṇāṃ vīryaparīkṣaṇe dhṛtaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:981: sutārthametāṃ cakara pratijñāṃ dadāmi kanyāṃ ya idaṃ hi pūrayet / 4.19 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:982: itīritāṃ me giramabhyavetya diteḥ sutā dānavayakṣarākṣasāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:983: sametya bhūpāṇsca samīpamāṇsu pragṛhya taccālayituṃ na śekuḥ / 4.20 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:984: saṃ svinnagātrāḥ parivṛttanetrā daśānanādyāḥ patitā vimūrchitāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:985: tathā'pi māṃ dharṣayituṃ na śekuḥ sutākṛte te vacanāṃ svayambhuvaḥ / 4.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:986: purā hi me'dāt prabhurabjajo varaṃ prasādito me tapasā kathañcana /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:987: balānna te kaścidupaiti kanyakāṃ tadicchubhiste na ca dharṣaṇeti / 4.22 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:988: tatastu te naṣṭamadā ito gatāḥ samastaśo hyastana eva pārthivāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:989: xlii.tato mamāyaṃ pratipūrya mānasaṃ vṛṇotu kanyāmayameva me'rthitaḥ / 4.23 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:991: samīkṣya tad vāmakareṇa rāghavaḥ salīlamuddhṛtya hasannapūrayat / 4.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:992: vikṛṣyamāṇaṃ tadanantarādhasā pareṇa niḥ sīmabalena līlayā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:993: abhajyatāsahyamamuṣya tad balaṃ prasoḍhumīśaṃ kuta eva tad bhavet / 4.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:994: sa madhyatastat pravibhajya līlayā yathekṣudaṇḍaṃ śatamanyukuñjaraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:999: upetya mandaṃ lal . itaiḥ padaistāṃ tadaṃ sa āsajya ca pārśvato'bhavat / 4.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1000: tataḥ pramodo nitarāṃ janānāṃ videhapuryāmabhavat samantāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1002: lakṣmyā samete prakaṭaṃ rameśe sampreṣayāmāsa tadā'śu pitre /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1003: videharājo daśadigrathāya sa tanniśamyā'śu tutoṣa bhūmipaḥ / 4.30 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1005: svasenayā'gre praṇidhāya dhātṛjaṃ vasiṣṭhamāṇsveva sa yatra maithilaḥ / 4.31 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1006: sa maithilenātitarāṃ samarcito vivāhayāmāsa sutaṃ mudambharaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1007: purohito gādhisutānumodito juhāva vahniṃ vidhinā vasiṣṭhaḥ / 4.32 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1008: tadā vimānāvalibhirnabhastal . aṃ didṛkṣatāṃ saṅkulamāsa nākinām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1009: surānakā dundabhayo' vinedire jaguśca gandharvavarāḥ sahasraśaḥ / 4.33 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1010: vijānamānā jagatāṃ hi mātaraṃ purā'rthituṃ nā'yayuratra devatāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1011: tadā turāmaṃ ramayā yutaṃ prabhuṃ didṛkṣavaścakruralaṃ nabhastal . am / 4.34 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1012: xliii.yathā purā sāgarajāsvayaṃ vare sumānasānāmabhavat samāgamaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1013: tathā hyabhūt sarvadivaukasāṃ tadā tathā munīnāṃ sahabhūbhṛt āṃ bhuvi / 4.35 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1014: pragṛhya pāṇiṃ ca nṛpātmajāyā rarāja rājīvasamānanetraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1016: svalaṅkṛt āstatra viceruraṅganā videharājasya ca yā hi yoṣitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1017: mudā sametaṃ ramayā ramāpatiṃ vilokya rāmāya dadau dhanaṃ nṛpaḥ / 4.37 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1018: priyāṇi vastrāṇi rathān sakuñjarān parārddhyaratnānyakhilasya ceśituḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1019: dadau ca kanyātrayamuttamaṃ mudā tadā sa rāmāvarajebhya eva / 4.38 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1020: mahotsavaṃ taṃ tvanubhūya devatā narāṇsca sarve prayayuryathāgatam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1021: pitā ca rāmasya sutaiḥ samanvito yayāvayodhyāṃ svapurīṃ mudā tataḥ / 4.39 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1024: ajānatāṃ rāghavamādipūruṣaṃ samāgataṃ j ñāpayituṃ nidarśanaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1025: samāhvayantaṃ raghupaṃ spṛdheva nṛpo yayāce praṇipatya bhītaḥ / 4.41 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1026: na me sutaṃ hantumihārhasi prabho vayogatasyetyuditaḥ sa bhārgavaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1027: sutatrayaṃ te pradadāmi rāghavaṃ raṇe sthitaṃ draṣṭumihā'gato'smyaham / 4.42 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1028: sa itthamuktvā nṛpatiṃ raghūttamaṃ bhṛgūttamaḥ prāha nijāṃ tanuṃ hariḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1030: śṛṇuṣva rāma tvamihoditaṃ mayā dhanurdvayaṃ pūrvamabhūnmahādbhutam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1032: tadā tu lokasya nidarśanārthibhiḥ samarthitau tau hariśaṅkarau suraiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1033: raṇasthitau vāṃ prasamīkṣituṃ vayaṃ samarthayāmo'tra nidarśanārthinaḥ / 4.45 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1034: tato hi yuddhāya rameśaśaṅkarau vyavasthitau tau dhanuṣī pragṛhya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1036: xliv.śaśāka naivātha yadā'bhivīkṣituṃ praspandituṃ vā kuta eva yoddhum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1037: śivastadā devagaṇaḥ samastāḥ śaśaṃ suruccairjagato harerbalam / 4.47 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1038: yadīraṇenaiva vinaiṣa ṇsaṅkaraḥ śaśāka na praśvasituṃ ca kevalam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1039: kimatra vaktavyamato harerbalaṃ harāt paraṃ sarvata eva ceti / 4.48 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1040: tataḥ praṇamyā'śu janārdanaṃ haraḥ prasannadṛṣṭyā hariṇā'bhivīkṣitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1041: jagāma kailāsamamuṣya tad dhanustvayā prabhagnaṃ kila lokasannidhau / 4.49 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1043: varaṃ hi haste tadidaṃ gṛhītaṃ mayā gṛhāṇaitadato hi vaiṣṇavam / 4.50 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1044: yadīdamāgṛhya vikarṣasi tvaṃ tadā harirnātra vicāryamasti /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1045: iti bruvāṇaḥ pradadau dhanurvaraṃ pradarśayat viṣṇubalaṃ harād varam / 4.51 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1046: pragṛhya taccāpavaraṃ sa rāghavaścakāra sajyaṃ nimiṣeṇa līlayā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1047: cakarṣa sandhāya śaraṃ ca paśyataḥ samastalokasya ca saṃ śayaṃ nudan / 4.52 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1048: pradarśite viṣṇubale samastato harācca niḥ saṅkhyatayā mahādhike /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1049: jagāda meghaughagabhīrayā girā sarāghavaṃ bhārgava ādipūruṣaḥ / 4.53 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1050: alaṃ balaṃ te jagato'khilād varaṃ paro'si nārāyaṇa eva nānyathā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1051: visarjayasveha śaraṃ tapomaye mahāsure lokamaye varād vibhoḥ / 4.54 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1052: purā'tulo nāma mahāsuro'bhavad varāt sa tu brahmaṇa āpa lokatām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1053: punaśca taṃ prāha jagadgururyadā harirjitaḥ syāddhi tadaiva vadhyase / 4.55 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1054: ato vadhārthaṃ jagadantakasya sarvājito'haṃ jitavad vyavasthitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1055: itīrite lokamaye sa rāghavo mumoca bāṇaṃ jagadantake'sure / 4.56 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1057: sa tena rāmodarago bahirgatastadājñayaivā'śu babhūva bhasmasāt / 4.57 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1058: itīva rāmāya sa rāghavaḥ śaraṃ vikarṣamāṇo vinihatya cāsuram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1059: xlv.tapastadīyaṃ pravadan mumoda tadīyameva hyabhavat samastam / 4.58 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1061: vadañchṛṇotīva vinodato hariḥ sa eka eva dvitanurmumoda / 4.59 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1062: sa ceṣṭitaṃ caiva nijāṇsrayasya janasya sattattvavibodhakāraṇam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1063: vimohakaṃ cānyatamasya kurvan cikrīḍa eko'pi narāntare yathā / 4.60 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1064: tataḥ sa kāruṇyanidhirnije jane nitāntamaikyaṃ svagataṃ prakāṇsayan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1065: dvidheva bhūtvā bhṛguvarya ātmanā raghūttamenaikyamagāt samakṣam / 4.61 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1066: sametya caikyaṃ jagato'bhipaśyataḥ praṇudya śaṅkāmakhilāṃ janasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1067: pradāya rāmāya dhanurvaraṃ tadā jagāma rāmānumato ramāpatiḥ / 4.62 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1068: tato nṛpo'tyarthamudā'bhipūritaḥ sutaiḥ samastaiḥ svapurīmavāpa ha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1069: reme'tha rāmo'pi ramāsvarūpayā tayaiva rājātmajayā hisītayā / 4.63 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1070: yathā purā ṇsrīramaṇaḥ śriyā tayā rato nitāntaṃ hi payobdhimadhye /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1071: tathā tvayodhyāpurigo raghūttamo'pyuvāsa kālaṃ suciraṃ ratastayā / 4.64 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1079: Oṃ / itthaṃ viśveśvare'sminnakhila jagadavasthāpya sīt āsahāye
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1084: t āṃ netuṃ tat tamo'ndhaṃ kamalajaniruvācā'śu rāmābhiṣekam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1085: bhūtvā dāsī vilumpa svagatimapi tataḥ karmaṇā prāpsyase tvaṃ
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1086: setyuktā mantharā'sīt tadanu kṛtavatyeva caitat kukarma / 5.2 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1091: vṛkṣān paśvādikīṭān pitaramatha sakhīn mātṛpūrvān visṛjya
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1092: protthāṃ gaṅgāṃ svapādāddhara iva guhenārcitaḥ so'tha tīrtvā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1099: dhik kurvantau nitāntaṃ sakaladuritagāṃ mantharāṃ kaikayīṃ ca
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1100: prāptau rāmasya pādau munigaṇasahitau tatra covāca natvā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1101: rāmaṃ rājīvanetraṃ bharata iha punaḥ prītaye'smākamīśa
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1104: satyāṃ kartuṃ ca vāṇīmavadadatitarāṃ neti sadbhaktinamram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1106: kartaitat te vaco'haṃ sudṛḍhamṛtamidaṃ me vaco nātra śaṅkā / 5.7 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1107: śrutvaitad rāmavākyaṃ hutabhuji patane sa pratijñāṃ ca kṛtvā
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1110: śrīśasyaivāsya kṛtvā ṇsirasi paramakaṃ pauraṭaṃ pādapīṭham / 5.8 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1111: samastapaurānugate'nuje gate sa citrakūṭe bhagavānuvāsa ha
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1113: sa āsurāveśavaśād ramāstane yadā vyadhāt tuṇḍamathābhivīkṣitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1114: janārdanenā'śu tṛṇe prayojite cacāra tena jvalatā'nuyātaḥ / 5.10 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1117: punaḥ prayātaḥ śaraṇaṃ raghūttamaṃ visarjitastena nihatya cāsuram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1120: nipātito'sau saha vāyasākṣibhistṛṇena rāmasya babhūva bhasmasāt / 5.13 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1121: dadurhi tasmai vivaraṃ balārthino yad vāyasāstena tadakṣipātanam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1122: kṛtaṃ rameśena tadekanetrā babhūvuranye'pi tu vāyasāḥ sadā / 5.14 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1124: t āvat tadakṣyasya kuraṅganāmnaḥ śivena dattaṃ ditijasya cākṣayam / 5.15 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1126: sa vāyasān rāghava ādipūruṣastato yayau śakrasutastadājñayā / 5.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1128: śrutvā kharaprabhṛtibhirvarato harasya sarvairavadhyatanubhiḥ prayayau sabhāryaḥ / 5.17 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1129: xlviii.āsīcca tatra śarabhaṅga iti sma jīrṇo lokaṃ harerjigamiṣurmunirugratejāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1130: tenā'daropahṛtasārdhyasaparyayā saprīto dadau nijapadaṃ paramaṃ rameśaḥ / 5.18 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1131: dharmo yato'sya vanagasya nitāntaśaktihrāse svadharmakaraṇasya hutāṇsanādau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1132: dehātyayaḥ sa tata eva tanuṃ nijāgnau santyajya rāmapurataḥ prayayau pareśam / 5.19 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1133: rāmo'pi tatra dadṛśe dhanadasya śāpād gandharvamurvaśirateratha yātudhānīm /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1134: prāptaṃ daśāṃ sapadi tumburunāmadheyaṃ nāmnā virādhamapi śarvavarādavadhyam / 5.20 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1135: bhaṅktvā'sya bāhuyugal . aṃ bilagaṃ cakāra sammānayan vacanamambujajanmano'sau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1136: prādācca tasya sugatiṃ nijagāyakasya bhakṣārthamaṃ sakamito'pi sahānujena / 5.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1137: prītiṃ vidhitsuragamad bhavanaṃ nijasya kumbhodbhavasya paramādarato'munā ca/
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1139: ātmārthameva hi purā hariṇā pradattamindre tadindra uta rāmakarārthameva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1140: prādādagastyamunaye tadavāpya rāmo rakṣan ṛṣīnavasadeva sa daṇḍakeṣu / 5.23 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1141: kāle tadaiva kharadūṣaṇayorbalena rakṣaḥ svasā patinimārgaṇatatparā'sīt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1142: vyāpādite nijapatau hi daśānanena prāmādikena vidhinā'bhisasāra rāmam / 5.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1144: rāmaṃ sametya bhava me patirityavocad bhānuṃ yathā tama upetya suyogakāmam / 5.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1145: t āṃ tatra hāsyakathayā janakāsutāgre gacchānujaṃ ma iha meti vacaḥ sa uktvā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1146: tenaiva duṣṭacaritāṃ hi vikarṇanāsāṃ cakre samastarajanīcaranāṇsahetoḥ / 5.26 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1147: tatpreritān sapadi bhīmabalān prayātāṃ stasyāḥ kharatriśiradūṣaṇamukhyabandhūn /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1149: datte'bhaye raghuvareṇa mahāmunīnāṃ datte bhaye ca rajanīcaramaṇḍalasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1150: rakṣaḥ patiḥ svasṛmukhādavikampanācca śrutvā balaṃ raghupateḥ paramāpa cintām / 5.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1151: sa tvāṇsu kāryamavamṛśya jagāma tīre kṣetraṃ nadīnadapateḥ śravaṇaṃ dharitryāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1152: mārīcamatra tapasi prativartamānaṃ bhītaṃ śarād raghupaternitarāṃ dadarśa / 5.29 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1153: xlix.tenārthitaḥ sapadi rāghavavañcanārthe mārīca āha śaravegamamuṣya jānan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1154: śakyo na te raghuvareṇa hi vigraho'tra jānāmi saṃ sparśamasya śarasya pūrvam / 5.30 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1155: ityuktavantamatha rāvaṇa āha khaḍgaṃ niṣkṛṣya hanmi yadi me na karoṣi vākyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1156: tacchuśruvān bhayayuto'tha nisargataśca pāpo jagāma raghuvaryasakāṇsamāṇsu / 5.31 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1157: sa prāpya haimamṛgatāṃ bahuratnacitraḥ sīt āsamīpa urudhā vicacāra śīghram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1158: nirdoṣanityavarasaṃ vidapi sma devī rakṣovadhāya janamohakṛte tathā'ha / 5.32 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1159: devemamāṇsu parigṛhya ca dehi me tvaṃ krīḍāmṛgaṃ tviti tayodita eva rāmaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1160: anvak sasāra ha śarāsanabāṇapāṇirmāyāmṛgaṃ niśicaraṃ nijaghāna jānan / 5.33 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1161: tenā'hataḥ śaravareṇa bhṛśaṃ mamāra vikruśya lakṣmaṇamuruvyathayā sapāpaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1163: yāṃ yāṃ pareśa urudhaiva karoti līl āṃ t āṃ t āṃ karotyanu tathaiva ramāpi devī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1164: naitāvatā'sya paramasya tathā ramāyā doṣo'ṇurapyanuvicintya uruprabhū yat / 5.35 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1166: devyā hareḥ kimu viḍambanamātrametad vikrīḍatoḥ suranarādivadeva tasmāt / 5.36 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1168: sṛṣṭvā'tmanaḥ pratikṛtiṃ prayayau ca śīghraṃ kailāsamarcitapadā nyavasacchivābhyām / 5.37 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1169: tasyāstu tāṃ pratikṛtiṃ praviveśa śakro devyāṇsca sannidhiyutāṃ vyavahārasiddhyai /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1170: ādāya tāmatha yayau rajanīcarendro hatvā jaṭāyuṣamuruśramato niruddhaḥ / 5.38 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1171: mārge vrajantamabhiyāya tato hanūmān saṃ vārito ravisutena ca jānamānaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1172: daivaṃ tu kāryamatha kīrtimabhīpsamāno rāmasya nainamahanad vacanāddhareśca / 5.39 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1173: prāpyaiva rākṣasa utā'tmapurīṃ sa tatra sīt ākṛtiṃ pratinidhāya rarakṣa cātha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1174: rāmo'pi tattu vinihatya suduṣṭarakṣaḥ prāpyā'śramaṃ svadayitāṃ nahi paśyatīva / 5.40 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1175: anveṣamāṇa iva taṃ ca dadarśa gṛdhraṃ sīt ārirakṣiṣumatho ripuṇā viśastam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1176: l.mandātmaceṣṭamamunoktamareśca karma śrutvā mṛtaṃ tamadahat svagatiṃ tathā'dāt / 5.41 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1177: anyatra caiva vicaran sahito'nujena prāptaḥ karau sa sahasā'tha kabandhanāmnaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1179: chitvā'sya bāhuyugal . aṃ sahito'nujena taṃ pūrvavat pratividhāya surendrabhṛtyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1180: nāmnā danuṃ trijaṭayaiva purā'bhijātaṃ gandharvamāṇsu ca tato'pi tadarcito'gāt / 5.43 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1181: dṛṣṭvā tameva śabarī paramaṃ hariṃ ca jñātvā viveśa dahanaṃ purato'sya tasyai /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1182: prādāt svalokamimameva hi sā pratīkṣya pūrvaṃ mataṅgavacanena vane'tra sā'bhūt / 5.44 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1183: śāpād varāpsarasameva hi tāṃ vimucya śacyā kṛt āt patipurastvatidarpahetoḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1184: gatvā dadarśa pavanātmajamṛśyamūke sa hyeka enamavagacchati samyagīśam / 5.45 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1185: dehe'pi yatra pavano'tra hariryato'sau tatraiva vāyuriti vedavacaḥ prasiddham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1186: kasmin nvahaṃ tviti tathaiva hi so'vatāre tasmāt sa mārutikṛte ravijaṃ rarakṣa / 5.46 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1187: evaṃ sa kṛṣṇatanurarjunamapyarakṣad bhīmārthameva tadariṃ ravijaṃ nihatya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1188: pūrvaṃ hi mārutimavāpa raveḥ suto'yaṃ tenāsya vālinamahan raghupaḥ pratīpam / 5.47 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1189: evaṃ surāṇsca pavanasya vaśe yato'taḥ sugrīvamatra tu paratra ca śakrasūnum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1190: sarve śritā hanumatastadanugrahāya tatrāgamad raghupatiḥ saha lakṣmaṇena / 5.48 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1191: yatpādapaṅkajarajaḥ śirasā vibharti śrīrabjajaśca giriśaḥ saha lokapālaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1192: sarveśvarasya paramasya hi sarvaśakteḥ kiṃ tasya śatruhanane kapayaḥ sahāyāḥ / 5.49 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1195: saṃ sthāpyā'śu harīndrān jānan viṣṇorguṇānanantān saḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1203: kṛtvā ca saṃ vidamanena nuto'sya cāṃ saṃ prītyā'ruroha sa hasan saha lakṣmaṇena / 6.1 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1204: āropya cāṃ sayugal . aṃ bhagavantamenaṃ tasyānujaṃ ca hanumān prayayau kapīndram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1205: sakhyaṃ cakāra hutabhukpramukhe ca tasya rāmeṇa ṇsāṇsvatanijārtihareṇa ṇsīghram / 6.2 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1206: śrutvā'sya duḥkhamatha devavaraḥ pratijñāṃ cakre sa vālinidhanāya harīśvaro'pi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1207: sīt ānumārgaṇakṛte'tha sa vālinaiva kṣiptāṃ hi dundubhitanuṃ samadarśayacca / 6.3 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1209: samprāsya yojanaśate'tha tayaiva corvīṃ sarvāṃ vidārya ditijānahanad rasāsthān / 6.4 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1210: śarvaprasādajabalād ditijānavadhyān sarvān nihatya kuṇapena punaśca sakhyā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1211: bhītena vālibalataḥ kathitaḥ sma sapta sālān pradarśya ditijān sudṛḍhāṃ śca vajrāt / 6.5 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1212: ekaikameṣu sa vikampayituṃ samarthaḥ patrāṇi loptumapi tūtsahate na śaktaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1213: viṣvak sthitān yadi bhavān pratibhetsyatīmānekeṣuṇā tarhi vālivadhe samarthaḥ / 6.6 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1214: jetuṃ caturguṇabalo hi pumān prabhuḥ syāddhantuṃ śatādhikabalo'tibalaṃ suśaktaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1215: tasmādimān harihayātmajabāhvalopyapatrān vibhidya mama saṃ śayamāṇsu bhindhi / 6.7 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1216: śrutvā'sya vākyamavamṛśya diteḥ sutāṃ stān dhāturvarādakhilapumbhirabhedyarūpān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1217: brahmatvamāptumacalaṃ tapasi pravṛtt ānekeṣuṇā sapadi tān pravibheda rāmaḥ / 6.8 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1218: sandhāya kārmukavare niśite tu bāṇe'thā'kṛṣya dakṣiṇabhujena tadā pramukte /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1219: rāmeṇa satvaramanantabalena sarve cūrṇīkṛt āḥ sapadi te taravo raveṇa / 6.9 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1220: bhittvā catān sagirikuṃ bhagavatpramuktaḥ pātāl . asaptakamathātra ca ye tvavadhyāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1221: nāmnā'surāḥ kumudino'bjajavākyarakṣāḥ sarvāṃ śca tānadahadāṇsu śaraḥ sa ekaḥ / 6.10 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1222: naitad vicitramamitorubalasya viṣṇoryatpreraṇāt sapavanasya bhavet pravṛttiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1224: lii.dṛṣṭvā balaṃ bhagavato'tha harīśvaro'sāvagre nidhāya tamayāt puramagrajasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1225: āṇsrutya rāvamanujasya bilāt sa cā'gādabhyenamāṇsu dayitāprativārito'pi / 6.12 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1226: tanmuṣṭibhiḥ pratihataḥ prayayāvaśaktaḥ sugrīva āṇsu raghupo'pi hi dharmamīkṣan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1227: nainaṃ jaghāna viditākhilalokaceṣṭo'pyenaṃ sa āha yudhi vāṃ na mayā viviktau / 6.13 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1228: saubhrātrameṣa yadi vāñchati vālinaiva nāhaṃ nirāgasamathāgrajaniṃ haniṣye /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1229: dīrghaḥ sahodaragato na bhaveddhi kopo dīrgho'pi kāraṇamṛte vinivartate ca / 6.14 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1230: kopaḥ sahodarajane punarantakāle prāyo nivṛttimupagacchati tāpakaśca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1231: ekasya bhaṅga iti naiva jhaṭityapāstadoṣo nihantumiha yogya iti sma mene / 6.15 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1232: tasmānna bandhujanage janite virodhe kāryo vadhastadanubandhibhirāṇsvitīha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1233: dharmaṃ pradarśayitumeva raveḥ sutasya bhāvī na tāpa iti vicca na taṃ jaghāna / 6.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1234: yaḥ prerakaḥ sakalaṣemuṣisantateśca tasyājñatā kuta iheśavarasya viṣṇoḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1236: rāmājñayaiva latayā ravije vibhakte vāyoḥ sutena raghupeṇa ṇsare ca mukte /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1237: śrutvā'sya śabdamatulaṃ hṛdi tena viddha indrātmajo giririvāpatadāṇsu sannaḥ / 6.18 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1238: bhakto mamaiṣa yadi māmabhipaśyatīha pādau dhruvaṃ mama sameṣyati nirvicāraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1239: yogyo vadho nahi janasya padānatasya rājyārthinā ravisutena vadho'rthitaśca / 6.19 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1240: kāryaṃ hyabhīṣṭamapi tat praṇatasya pūrvaṃ śasto vadho na padayoḥ praṇatasya caiva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1241: tasmādadṛśyatanureva nihanmi śakraputraṃ tvitīha tamadṛṣṭatayā jaghāna / 6.20 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1242: yaḥ prerakaḥ sakalalokabalasya nityaṃ pūrṇāvyayoccabalavīryatanuḥ svatantraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1243: kiṃ tasya dṛṣṭipathagasya ca vānaro'yaṃ kartaiśacāpamapi yena purā vibhagnam / 6.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1244: sanne'tha vālini jagāma ca tasya pārśvaṃ prāhainamārdravacasā yadi vāñchasi tvam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1245: ujjīvayiṣya iti naicchadasau tvadagre ko nāma necchati mṛtiṃ puruṣottameti / 6.22 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1246: kāryāṇi tasya caramāṇi vidhāya putraṃ tvagre nidhāya ravijaḥ kapirājya āsīt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1247: liii.rāmo'pi tadgirivare caturo'tha māsān dṛṣṭvā ghanāgamamuvāsa salakṣmaṇo'sau / 6.23 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1249: prasahya taṃ buddhimatāṃ variṣṭho rāmāṅghribhakto hanumānuvāca / 6.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1250: na vismṛtiste raghuvaryakārye kāryā kathañcit sa hi no'bhipūjyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1251: na cet svayaṃ kartumabhīṣṭamadya te dhruvaṃ balenāpi hi kārayāmi / 6.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1252: sa evamuktvā harirājasannidhau dvīpeṣu saptasvapi vānarān prati /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1253: sammel . anāyā'śugatīn sma vānarān prasthāpayāmāsa samastaśaḥ prabhuḥ / 6.26 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1256: tadaiva rāmo'pi hi bhogasaktaṃ pramattamālakṣya kapīśvaraṃ prabhuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1257: jagāda saumitrimidaṃ vaco me plavaṅgameśāya vadā'śu yāhi / 6.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1258: yadi pramatto'si madīyakārye nayāmyahaṃ tvendrasutasya mārgam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1259: prāyaḥ svakārye pratipādite hi madoddhatā na pratikartumīśate / 6.29 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1260: itīḍyarāmeṇa samīrite tadā yayau sabāṇaḥ sadhanuḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1261: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ tena sahaiva tāpanirbhayād yayau rāmapadāntikaṃ tvaran / 6.30 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1263: samāgate sarvaharipravīraiḥ sahaiva taṃ vīkṣya nananda rāghavaḥ / 6.31 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1264: sasambhramaṃ taṃ patitaṃ padābjayostvaran samutthāpya samāṇsliṣat prabhuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1268: atastvameva pratiyāhi dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ samādāya madaṅgulīyakam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1269: itīrito'sau puruṣottamena yayau diśaṃ t āṃ yuvarājayuktaḥ / 6.34 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1270: liv.samastadikṣu pratiyāpitā hi te harīśvarājñāmupadhārya māsataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1273: gataḥ sa kālo harirāḍudīritaḥ samāsadaṃ ścātha bilaṃ mahādbhutam / 6.36 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1274: kṛtaṃ mayenātivicitramuttamaṃ samīkṣya tat tāra uvāca cāṅgadam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1275: vayaṃ na yāmo harirājasannidhiṃ vilaṅghito naḥ samayo yato'sya / 6.37 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1277: agamyametad bilamāpya tat sukhaṃ vasāma sarve kimasāvihā'caret / 6.38 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1278: na caiva rāmeṇa salakṣmaṇena prayojanaṃ no vanacāriṇāṃ sadā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1279: na ceha naḥ pīḍayituṃ sa ca kṣamastato mameyaṃ suviniścitā matiḥ / 6.39 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1280: itīritaṃ mātulavākyamāṇsu sa ādade vālisuto'pi sādaram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1281: uvāca vākyaṃ ca na no harīśvaraḥ kṣamī bhavellaṅghitaśāsanānām / 6.40 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1282: rājyārthinā yena hi ghātito'grajo hṛt āṇsca dārāḥ sunṛśaṃ sakena /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1283: sa naḥ kathaṃ rakṣati śāsanātigān nirāṇsrayān durbalakān bale sthitaḥ / 6.41 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1284: itīrite śakrasutātmajena tatheti hocuḥ saha jāmbavanmukhāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1286: vijñātametaddhi mayā'ṅgadasya rājyāya tārābhihitaṃ hi vākyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1287: sādhyaṃ na caitannahi vāyusūnū rāmapratīpaṃ vacanaṃ saheta / 6.43 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1288: na cāhamākraṣṭumupāyato'pi śakyaḥ kathañcit sakalaiḥ sametaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1290: vaco mamaitad yadi cā'dareṇa grāhyaṃ bhaved vastadatipriyaṃ me /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1291: na ced balādapyanaye pravṛtt ān praśāsya sanmārgagatān karomi / 6.45 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1292: itīritaṃ tat pavanātmajasya śrutvā'tibhīt ā dhṛtamūkabhāvāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1295: dṛḍhaṃ nirāṇsāṇsca matiṃ hi dadhruḥ prāyopaveśāya tathā ca cakruḥ / 6.47 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1296: prāyopaviṣṭāṇsca kathā vadanto rāmasya saṃ sāravimuktidātuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1298: tasyāgrajo'sāvaruṇasya sūnuḥ sūryasya bimbaṃ saha tena yātaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1299: javaṃ parīkṣannatha taṃ sutaptaṃ guptvā patatrakṣayamāpya cāpatat / 6.49 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1300: sa dagdhapakṣaḥ savitṛpratāpācchrutvaiva rāmasya kathāṃ sapakṣaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1301: bhūtvā punaścāpi mṛtiṃ jaṭāyuṣaḥ śuśrāva pṛṣṭvā punareva samyak / 6.50 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1302: sa rāvaṇasyātha gatiṃ sutoktāṃ nivedya dṛṣṭvā janakātmajākṛtim /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1304: tatastu te brahmasutena pṛṣṭā nyavedayannātmabalaṃ pṛthak pṛthak /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1305: daśaiva cā'rabhya daśottarasya kramāt patho yojanato'tiyāne / 6.52 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1306: sanīlamaindadvividāḥ satārāḥ sarve'pyaśītyāḥ parato na śaktāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1307: gantuṃ yadā'thā'tmabalaṃ sa jāmbavān jagāda tasmāt punaraṣṭamāṃ śam / 6.53 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1308: baleryadā viṣṇuravāpa lokāṃ stribhiḥ kramairnandiravaṃ prakurvatā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1309: tadā mayā bhrāntamidaṃ jagattrayaṃ savedanaṃ j ānu mamā'sa merutaḥ / 6.54 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1310: ato javo me nahi pūrvasammitaḥ purā tvahaṃ ṣaṇṇavatiplavo'smi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1311: tataḥ kumāro'ṅgada āha cāsmācchataṃ plaveyaṃ na tato'bhijāne / 6.55 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1312: apūrite taiḥ sakalaiḥ śatasya gamāgame śatrubalaṃ ca vīkṣya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1313: sudurgamatvaṃ ca niśācareśapuryāḥ sa dhātuḥ suta ābabhāṣe / 6.56 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1314: ayaṃ hi gṛdhraḥ śatayojanaṃ giriṃ trikūṭamāheta utātra vighnāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1315: bhaveyuranye'pi tato hanūmānekaḥ samartho na paro'sti kaścit / 6.57 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1316: uktvā sa itthaṃ punarāha sūnuṃ prāṇasya niḥ sīmabalaṃ praśaṃ sayan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1317: lvi.tvameka evātra paraṃ samarthaḥ kuruṣva caitat paripāhi vānarān / 6.58 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1318: itīrito'sau hanumān nijepsitaṃ teṣāmaśaktiṃ prakaṭāṃ vidhāya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1326: natvā lilaṅghayiṣurarṇavamutpapāta niṣpīḍya taṃ girivaraṃ pavanasya sūnuḥ / 7.1 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1327: cukṣobha vāridhiranuprayayau ca śīghraṃ yādogaṇaiḥ saha tadīyabalābhikṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1328: vṛkṣāṇsca parvatagatāḥ pavanena pūrvaṃ kṣipto'rṇave girirudāgamadasya hetoḥ / 7.2 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1329: syālo harasya giripakṣavināṇsakāle kṣiptvā'rṇave sa marutorvaritātmapakṣaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1330: haimo giriḥ pavanajasya tu viśramārthamudbhidya vāridhimavarddhadanekasānuḥ / 7.3 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1331: naivātra viśramaṇamaicchata niḥ śramo'sau niḥ sīmapauruṣaguṇasya kutaḥ śramo'sya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1332: āṇsliṣya parvatavaraṃ sa dadarśa gacchan devaistu nāgajananīṃ prahitāṃ vareṇa / 7.4 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1333: jijñāsubhirnijabalaṃ tava bhakṣametu yadyat tvamicchasi tadityamaroditāyāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1334: āsyaṃ praviśya sapadi praviniḥ sṛto'smād devānanandayaduta svṛtameṣu rakṣan / 7.5 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:1335: dṛṣṭvā surapraṇayitāṃ balamasya cograṃ devāḥ pratuṣṭuvuramuṃ sumanobhivṛṣṭyā /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:2357: tvadājñayā balinā sandadhānā varād girīśasya parairacālyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2359: tadā tvayā nityabalatvahetuto yo'nantanāmā garuḍastadaṃ sake /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2360: utpāṭya caikena kareṇa mandaro nidhāpitastaṃ sa saha tvayā'vahat / 10.6 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2361: punaḥ parīkṣadbhirasau giriḥ suraiḥ sahāsurairunnamitastadaṃ sataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2362: vyacūrṇayat tānakhilān punaśca te tvadīkṣayā pūrvavadutthitāḥ prabho / 10.7 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2363: punaśca vāmena kareṇa vīśvare nidhāya taṃ skandhagatastvamasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2364: agāḥ payobdhiṃ sahitaḥ surāsurairmathnā ca tenābdhimathāpyamathnāḥ / 10.8 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2365: kṛtaśca kadrvāstanayo'tra vāsukirnetraṃ tvayā kaśyapajaḥ sa nāgarāṭ/
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2366: mamanthurabdhiṃ sahitāstvayā surāḥ sahāsurā divyapayo ghṛt ādhikam / 10.9 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2367: naicchanta pucchaṃ ditijā amaṅgal . aṃ tadityathāgraṃ jagṛhurviṣolbaṇam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2368: śrāntāṇsca te'to vibudhāstu pucchaṃ tvayā sametā jagṛhustvadāṇsrayāḥ / 10.10 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2369: athātibhārādaviśat sukāñcano giriḥ sa pātāl . amatha tvameva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2370: taṃ kacchapātmā tvabharaḥ svapṛṣṭhe hyananyadhāryaṃ purulīlayaiva / 10.11 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2373: śrānteṣu teṣveka urukrama tvaṃ sudhārasāptyai mudito hyamathnāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2374: tadā jagadgrāsi viṣaṃ samutthitaṃ tvadājñayā vāyuradhāt kare nije / 10.13 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2375: kaleḥ svarūpaṃ tadatīva duṣṣahaṃ varād vidhātuḥ sakalaiśca duḥ spṛśam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2376: kare vimathyāstabalaṃ vidhāya dadau sa kiñcid giriśāya vāyuḥ / 10.14 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2377: sa tat pibat kaṇṭhagatena tena nipātito mūrcchita āṇsu rudraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2378: hareḥ karasparśabalāt sa sañjñāmavāpa nīlo'sya gal . astadā'sīt / 10.15 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2379: atha tvadājñāṃ purato nidhāya nidhāya pātre tapanīyarūpe /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2380: svayaṃ ca nirmathya balopapannaṃ papau sa vāyustadu cāsya jīrṇam / 10.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2381: atyalpapānācca babhūva śūlā ṇsivasya śīrṣṇaṇsca karāvaśiṣṭam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2382: abhūt kaliḥ sarvajagatsu pūrṇaṃ pītvā vikāro na babhūva vāyoḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2384: atha tvayā'bdhau tu vimathyamāne surā'bhavat tāmasurā avāpuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2385: uccaiḥ śravā nāma turaṅgamo'tha karī tathairāvatanāmadheyaḥ / 10.18 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2386: anye ca dikpālagajā babhūvurvaraṃ tathaivāpsarasāṃ sahasram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2388: tathaiva sākṣāt surabhirniśeśo babhūva tat kaustubhaṃ lokasāram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2389: athendirā yadyapi nityadehā babhūva tatrāparayā svatanvā / 10.20 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2390: tato bhavān dakṣiṇabāhunā sudhākamaṇḍaluṃ kalaśaṃ cāpareṇa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2392: tato bhavaddhastagataṃ diteḥ sutāḥ sudhābharaṃ kalaśaṃ cāpajahruḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2393: muktaṃ tvayā ṇsaktimatā'pi daityān satyacyutān kārayatā vadhāya / 10.22 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2397: samastasāraṃ paripūrṇasadguṇaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva tat sammumuhuḥ surārayaḥ / 10.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2398: parasparaṃ te'mṛtahetuto'khilā viruddhyamānāḥ pradaduḥ sma te kare /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2399: samaṃ sudhāyāḥ kalaśaṃ vibhajya nipāyayāsmāniti vañcitāstvayā / 10.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2400: dharmacchalaṃ pāpajaneṣu dharma iti tvayā jñāpayituṃ tadoktam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2401: yadyat kṛtaṃ me bhavatāṃ yadīha saṃ vāda evodvibhaje sudhāmimām / 10.26 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2402: yatheṣṭato'haṃ vibhajāmi sarvathā naviśvasadhvaṃ mayi kenacit kvacit /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2403: iti prahasyābhihitaṃ niśamya strībhāvamugdhāstu tatheti te'vadan / 10.27 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2404: tataśca saṃ sthāpya pṛthak surāsurāṃ stavātirūpoccalitān suretarān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2405: sarvān bhavaddarśina īkṣya lajjitā'smyahaṃ dṛśo mīlayatetyavocaḥ / 10.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2406: nimīlitākṣeṣvasureṣu devatā nyapāyayaḥ sādhvamṛtaṃ tataḥ pumān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2407: kṣaṇena bhūtvā pibataḥ sudhāṃ śiro rāhornyakṛntaśca sudarśanena / 10.29 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2408: tenāmṛt ārthaṃ hi sahasrajanmasu pratapya bhūyastapa ārito varaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2409: svayambhuvastena bhavān kare'sya binduṃ sudhāṃ prāsya śiro jahāra / 10.30 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2410: śirastu tasya grahatāmavāpa suraiḥ samāviṣṭamatho sabāhu /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2411: kṣiptaḥ kabandho'sya śubhodasāgare tvayā sthito'dyāpi hi tatra sāmṛtaḥ / 10.31 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2412: athāsurāḥ pratyapatannudāyudhāḥ samastaśaste ca hatāstvayā raṇe /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2413: kalistu sa brahmavarādajeyo hyṛte bhavantaṃ puruṣeṣu saṃ sthitaḥ / 10.32 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2415: athendirā vakṣasi te samāsthitā tvatkaṇṭhagaṃ kaustubhamāsa dhātā / 10.33 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2416: yathāvibhāgaṃ ca sureṣu dattāstvayā tathā'nye'pi hi tatra jātāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2417: itthaṃ tvayā sādhvamṛtaṃ sureṣu dattaṃ hi mokṣasya nidarśanāya / 10.34 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2418: civ.bhaveddhi mokṣo niyataṃ surāṇāṃ naivāsurāṇāṃ sa kathañcana syāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2419: utsāhayuktasya ca tat pratīpaṃ bhaveddhi rāhoriva duḥkharūpam / 10.35 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2422: tvadājñayā tasya varo'bjajena dattaḥ sa āviśya śivaṃ cakāra /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2423: kadāgamāṃ stasya kuyuktibādhān nahi tvadanyaścarituṃ samarthaḥ / 10.37 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2424: vedāṇsca sarve sahaśāstrasaṅghā utsāditāstena na santi te'dya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2425: tat sādhu bhūmāvavatīrya vedānuddhṛtya śāstrāṇi kuruṣva samyak / 10.38 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2427: sacchāstraśastreṇa nihatya śīghraṃ padaṃ nijaṃ dehi mahājanasya / 10.39 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2428: ṛte bhavantaṃ nahi taṃ nihantā tvameka evākhilaśaktipūrṇaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2429: tato bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā vayaṃ tamonihatyai nijabodhavigraham / 10.40 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2432: vasiṣṭhanāmā kamal . odbhavātmajaḥ suto'sya śaktistanayaḥ parāṇsaraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2433: tasyottamaṃ so'pi tapo'caraddhariḥ suto mama syāditi taddharirdadau / 10.42 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2434: uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān sutoṣito vasormadīyasya sutā'sti śobhanā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2435: vane mṛgārthaṃ carato'sya vīryaṃ papāta bhāryāṃ manasā gatasya / 10.43 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2436: tacchyenahaste pradadau sa tasyai dātuṃ tadanyena tu yuddhyato'patat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2438: tadgarbhato'bhūnmithunaṃ svarājñe nyavedayan so'pi vasoḥ samarpayat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2439: putraṃ samādāya sutāṃ sa tasmai dadau suto'bhūdatha matsyarājaḥ / 10.45 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2441: cv.nāmnā ca sā satyavatīti tasyāṃ tavā'tmajo'haṃ bhavitā'smyajo'pi / 10.46 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2445: yoṣitsu puṃ so hyajanīva dṛśyate na jāyate kvāpi balādivigrahaḥ / 10.48 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2446: yathā nṛsiṃ hākṛtirāvirāsīt stambhāt tathā nityatanutvato vibhuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2447: āvirbhavad yoṣiti no malotthastathā'pi mohāya nidarśayet tathā / 10.49 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2448: strīpumprasa' ngāt parato yato hariḥ prādurbhavatyeṣa vimohayan janam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2449: ato malottho'yamiti sma manyate jano'śubhaḥ pūrṇaguṇaikavigraham / 10.50 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2450: dvīpe bhaginyāḥ sa yamasya viśvakṛt prakāṇsate jñānamarīcimaṇḍalaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2461: j ñānaṃ tayoḥ saṃ smṛtimātrataḥ sadā pratyakṣabhāvaṃ paramātmano dadau / 10.56 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2463: uddhṛtya vedānakhilān surebhyo dadau munibhyaśca yathā'disṛṣṭau / 10.57 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2464: cvi.sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi tathaiva kṛtvā vinirṇayaṃ brahmasūtraṃ cakāra /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2471: tato manuṣyeṣu ca satsu saṃ sthito vināṇsya ityeṣa harirvyacintayat / 10.61 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2472: tato nṛṇāṃ kālabalāt sumandamāyurmatiṃ karma ca vīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2473: vivyāsa vedān sa vibhuścaturdhā cakre tathā bhāgavataṃ purāṇam / 10.62 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2474: yeye ca santastamasā'nuviṣṭāstāṃ stān suvākyaistamaso vimuñcan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2475: cacāra lokān sa pathi prayāntaṃ kīṭaṃ vyapaśyat tamuvāca kṛṣṇaḥ / 10.63 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2476: bhavasva rājā kuśarīrametat tyaktveti naicchat tadasau tatastam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2477: atyaktadehaṃ nṛpatiṃ cakāra purā svabhaktaṃ vṛṣalaṃ sulubdham / 10.64 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2478: lobhāt sa kīṭatvamupetya kṛṣṇaprasādataścā'śu babhūva rājā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2479: tadaiva taṃ sarvanṛpāḥ praṇemurdaduḥ karaṃ cāsya yathaiva vaiśyāḥ / 10.65 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2480: uvāca taṃ bhagavān muktimasmiṃ stava kṣaṇe dātumahaṃ samarthaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2481: tathā'pi sīmārthamavāpya vipratanuṃ vimukto bhava matprasādāt / 10.66 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2482: j ñānaṃ ca tasmai vimalaṃ dadau sa mahīṃ ca sarvāṃ bubhuje tadante /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2483: tyaktvā tanuṃ vipravaratvametya padaṃ harerāpa sutattvavedī / 10.67 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2484: evaṃ bahūn saṃ sṛtibandhataḥ sa vyamocayad vyāsatanurjanārdanaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2487: dadau ca tasmai bhagavān varaṃ taṃ svayaṃ ca taptveva tapo vimohayan / 10.69 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2488: cvii.vimohanāyāsurasargiṇāṃ prabhuḥ svayaṃ karotīva tapaḥ pradarśayet /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2489: kāmādidoṣāṃ śca mṛṣaiva darśayenna tāvatā te'sya hi santi kutracit / 10.70 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2490: tatastvaraṇyoḥ sma babhūva putrakaḥ śivo'sya so'bhūcchukanāmadheyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2491: śukī hi bhūtvā'bhyagamad ghṛt ācī vyāsaṃ vimathnantamutāraṇī tam / 10.71 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2492: akāmayan kāmukavat sa bhūtvā tayā'rthitastaṃ śukanāmadheyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2493: cakre hyaraṇyostanayaṃ ca sṛṣṭvā vimohayaṃ stattvamārgeṣvayogyān / 10.72 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2494: śukaṃ tamāṇsu praviveśa vāyurvyāsasya sevārthamathāsya sarvam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2495: j ñānaṃ dadau bhagavān sarvavedān sabhārataṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇam / 10.73 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2496: śeṣo'tha pailaṃ munimāviśat tadā vīśaḥ sumantumapi vāruṇiṃ munim /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2497: brahmā'viśat tamuta vaiśapāyanaṃ śakraśca jaiminimathā'viśad vibhuḥ / 10.74 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2498: kṛṣṇasya pādaparisevanotsukāḥ sureśvarā viviśurāṇsu tān munīn /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2499: samastavidyāḥ pratipādya teṣvasau pravartakāṃ stān vidadhe hariḥ punaḥ / 10.75 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2500: ṛcāṃ pravartakaṃ pailaṃ yajuṣāṃ ca pravartakam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2510: sa tasmai jñānamakhilaṃ dadau dvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ / 10.80 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2519: evaṃ j ñānaṃ punaḥ prāpurdevāṇsca ṛṣayastathā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2521: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāt prāpya jñānaṃ te mumuduḥ surāḥ / 10.84 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2526: prakāṇsayaṃ steṣu sadā'tmaguhyaṃ mumoda merau ca tathā badaryām / 10.86 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2532: yatra sannikṛṣṭo'pi janaḥ samadhigna viprakṛṣṭastatra kathaṃ nirṇeyāt?
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2537: tasyā'sa patnīyugal . aṃ sutāṇsca pañcābhavan viṣṇupadaikabhaktāḥ / 11.1 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2539: druhyaṃ cānuṃ tathā pūruṃ śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī” 69 / 11.2 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2548: viṣṇoḥ prasādāt sa kṛte yuge rājā bhaviṣyati / 11.6 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2565: bhaviṣyati mayā'viṣṭo yajñaśīla iti sma ha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2569: mahābhiṣaṅ nāma nareśvarastvaṃ bhūtvā punaḥ śantanunāmadheyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2570: janiṣyase viṣṇupadī tathaiṣā tatrāpi bhāryā bhavato bhaviṣyati / 11.15 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2571: śānto bhavatyeva mayoditastvaṃ tanutvamāpto'si tataśca śantanuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2572: itīritaḥ so'tha nṛpo babhūva mahābhiṣaṅ nāma hareḥ padāṇsrayaḥ / 11.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2573: sa tatra bhuktvā cirakālamurvīṃ tanuṃ vihāyā'pa sado vidhātuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2574: tatrāpi tiṣṭhan suravṛndasannidhau dadarśa gaṅgāṃ ślathitāmbarāṃ svakām / 11.17 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2576: uvāca bhūmau nṛpatirbhavā'śu śapto yathā tvaṃ hi purā mayaiva / 11.18 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2577: itīritastatkṣaṇataḥ pratīpād babhūva nāmnā nṛpatiḥ sa śantanuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2578: avāpya gaṅgāṃ dayitāṃ svakīyāṃ tayā mumodābdagaṇān bahūṃ śca / 11.19 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2579: athāṣṭamo vasurāsīd dyunāmā varāṅgināmnyasya babhūva bhāryā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2580: babhūva tasyāṇsca sakhī nṛpasya suvindanāmno dayitā sanāmnī / 11.20 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2582: cxi.jarāpahāṃ nandinināmadheyāṃ baddhuṃ patiṃ codayāmāsa devī / 11.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2583: tayā dyunāmā sa vasuḥ pracodito bhrātṛsnehāt saptabhiranvito'paraiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2584: babandha tāṃ gāmatha tāñchaśāpa vasiṣṭhasaṃ sthaḥ kamalodbhavaḥ prabhuḥ / 11.22 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2585: adharmavṛtt āḥ pratiyāta mānuṣīṃ yoniṃ drutaṃ yatkṛte sarva eva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2586: dharmāccyutāḥ sa tathā'ṣṭāyurāpyatāmanye punaḥ kṣipramato vimokṣyatha / 11.23 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2587: pracodayāmāsa ca yā kumārge patiṃ hi sā'mbeti nareṣu jātā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2588: abhartṛkā puṃ stvasamāṇsrayeṇa patyurmṛtau kāraṇatvaṃ vrajeta / 11.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2591: mṛtyaṣṭakotthāmapi vedanāṃ saḥ prāpnotu śastrairbahudhā nikṛttaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2592: itīritāste kamalodbhavaṃ taṃ j ñātvā samutsṛjya ca gāṃ praṇemuḥ / 11.26 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2593: na mānuṣīṃ garbhamavāpnumo vayaṃ bhavatvayaṃ sarvavit kīrtimāṃ śca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2595: itīrite'stvityuditāḥ svayambhuvā vasiṣṭhasaṃ sthena surāpagāṃ yayuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2596: ūcustathaināmudare vayaṃ te jāyemahi kṣipramasmān hana tvam / 11.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2597: itīritā sā varamāṇsu vavre tebhyo'pyapāpatvamatha priyatvam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2598: teṣāṃ sadaivā'tmana ekameṣāṃ dīrghāyuṣaṃ t ān suṣuve'tha śantanoḥ / 11.29 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2599: avighnatastān vinihantumeva purā pratīpasya hi dakṣiṇorum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2601: tenaiva coktā bhava me sutasya bhāryā yato dakṣiṇorusthitā'si /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2602: bhāgo hi dakṣo duhituḥ snuṣāyā bhāryābhāgo vāma iti prasiddhaḥ / 11.31 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2603: uvāca sā taṃ natu māṃ sutaste kā'sīti pṛcchennatu māṃ nivārayet /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2604: ayogyakartrīmapi kāraṇaṃ ca matkarmaṇo naiva pṛcchet kadācit / 11.32 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2605: cxii.yadā trayāṇāmapi caikameṣa karoti gaccheyamahaṃ visṛjya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2606: tadā tvadīyaṃ sutamityudīrite tatheti rājā'pyavadat pratīpaḥ / 11.33 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2607: tathaiva putrāya ca tena tad vaco vadhūktamuktaṃ vacanād dyunadyāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2608: kanīyase sā hyavadat sutaste nānyaḥ patiḥ śantanureva me vṛtaḥ / 11.34 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2609: tatastu sā ṇsantanuto'ṣṭa putrānavāpya sapta nyahanat tathā'ṣṭamam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2610: gantuṃ tato matimādhāya hantumivodyogaṃ sā himṛṣā cakāra / 11.35 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2611: avasthitirnātisukhāya mānuṣe yataḥ surāṇāmata eva gantum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2612: aicchanna tasyā hi babhūva mānuṣo deho narottho hi tadā'sa śantanoḥ / 11.36 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2614: kā'si tvaṃ hetunā kena haṃ si putrān nṛśaṃ savat / 11.37 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2615: rūpaṃ suravarastrīṇāṃ tava tena na pāpakam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2616: bhavet karma tvadīyaṃ tanmahat kāraṇamatra hi / 11.38 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2617: tat kāraṇaṃ vada śubhe yadi macchrotramarhati /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2619: na dharmo devatānāṃ hi jñātavāsaściraṃ nṛṣu /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2620: kāraṇādeva hi surā nṛṣu vāsaṃ prakurvate /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2625: nṛj ātaṃ śantanuṃ tyaktvā prayayau varuṇālayam / 11.42 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2627: vadhodyogānnivṛtt ā sā dadau putraṃ bṛhaspatau / 11.43 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2629: cxiii.saṃ vatsarāṇāmakhilāṃ śca vedān samabhyasat tadvaśagāntarātmā / 11.44 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2631: rāme bhṛgūṇāmadhipe pradattaḥ śuśrāva tattvaṃ ca śatārddhavarṣam / 11.45 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2632: sa pañcaviṃ śat punarabdakānāmastrāṇi cābhyasya paterbhṛgūṇām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2633: mātrā samānīya taṭe nije tu saṃ sthāpitaḥ prārpayituṃ svapitre / 11.46 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2634: sa tatra baddhvā ṇsarapañjareṇa gaṅgāṃ vijahre'sya pitā tadaiva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2635: vrajan mṛgārthī tṛṣito vilokayan gaṅgāmatoyāmabhavat suvismitaḥ / 11.47 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2636: sa mārgayāmāsa tato'sya hetujñaptyai tadā svaṃ ca dadarśa sūnum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2638: mīmāṃ samānaṃ tamavāpa gaṅgā sutaṃ samādāya patiṃ jagāda ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2640: asyāgrajāḥ svāṃ sthitimeva yātā hareḥ padāmbhojasupāvite jale /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2641: tanūrmadīye praṇidhāya tat tvaṃ t ān mā ṇsuco'nena ca modamānaḥ / 11.50 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2642: iti pradāyāmumadṛśyatāmagād gaṅgā tamādāya yayau svakaṃ gṛham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2643: rājā'bhiṣicyātha ca yauvarājye mumoda tatsadguṇatarpito bhṛśam / 11.51 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2644: punaḥ sa pitrā'numato bṛhaspateravāpa vedān puruṣāyuṣo'rddhataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2647: pituṃ samīpaṃ samavāpya taṃ ca śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ pramumoda vīraḥ / 11.53 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2648: yadaiva gaṅgā suṣuve'ṣṭamaṃ sutaṃ tadaiva yāto mṛgayāṃ sa śantanuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2649: śaradvato jātamapaśyaduttamaṃ vane visṛṣṭaṃ mithunaṃ tvayonijam / 11.54 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2650: śaradvāṃ stu tapaḥ kurvan dadarśa sahasorvaśīm /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2653: hareḥ prāptuṃ tathā tārā bhāryā yā hibṛhaspateḥ / 11.56 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2654: t āvubhau śantanurdṛṣṭvā kṛpāviṣṭaḥ svakaṃ gṛham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2655: nināya nāma cakre ca kṛpāyā viṣayau yataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2656: kṛpaḥ kṛpīti sa kṛpastapo viṣṇoṇscakāra ha / 11.57 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2664: yadā hijātaḥ sa kṛpastadaiva bṛhaspateḥ sūnuragācca gaṅgām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2665: snātuṃ ghṛt ācīṃ sa dadarśa tatra ślathaddukūlāṃ suravaryakāminīm / 11.61 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2666: taddarśanāt skannamathendriyaṃ sa droṇe dadhārā'śu tato'bhavat svayam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2667: ambhojajāveśayuto bṛhaspatiḥ kartuṃ hareḥ karma bhuvo bharoddhṛtau / 11.62 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2668: droṇetināmāsya cakāra tāto munirbharadvāja utāsya vedān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2670: kāle ca tasmin pṛṣato'napatyo vane tu pāñcālapatiścacāra /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2671: tapo mahat tasya tathā varāpsarāvalokanāt skanditamāṇsu retaḥ / 11.64 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2672: sa tad vilajjāvaśataḥ padena samākramat tasya babhūva sūnuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2673: hahū tunāmnā sa viriñcagāyako nāmnā'vaho yo marutāṃ tadaṃ śayuk / 11.65 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2674: sa droṇatātāt samavāpa vedānastrāṇi vidyāṇsca tathā samastāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2675: droṇena yuktaḥ sa tadā guroḥ sutaṃ sahaiva nau rājyamiti hyavādīt / 11.66 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2676: cxv.pade drutatvād drupadābhidheyaḥ sa rājyamāpātha nijāṃ kṛpīṃ saḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2677: droṇo'pi bhāryāṃ samavāpya sarvapratigrahojjhaśca pure'vasat sukhī / 11.67 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2678: siloñchavṛttyaiva hi vartayan sa dharmaṃ mahāntaṃ virajaṃ juṣāṇaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2679: uvāsa nāgākhyapure sakhā sa devavratasyātha kṛpasya caiva / 11.68 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2680: teṣāṃ samāno vayasā virāṭastvabhūddhahā nāma vidhātṛgāyakaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2681: marutsu yo vivaho nāma tasyāpyaṃ śena yukto nijadharmavartī / 11.69 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2682: tataḥ kadācinmṛgayāṃ gataḥ sa dadarśa kanyāpravarāṃ tu śantanuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2683: yā pūrvasarge pitṛputrikā satī cacāra viṣṇostapa uttamaṃ ciram / 11.70 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2684: yasyai varaṃ viṣṇuradāt purā'haṃ sutastava syāmiti yā vasoḥ sutā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2685: j ātā punardāṇsagṛhe vivarddhitā vyāsātmanā viṣṇurabhūcca yasyām / 11.71 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2687: ṛte sa tasyāstanayasya rājyaṃ naicchad dātuṃ t āmathā'yād gṛhaṃ svam / 11.72 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2688: taccintayā glānamukhaṃ janitraṃ dṛṣṭvaiva devavrata āṇsvapṛcchat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2690: sa tasya viśvāsakṛte pratijñāṃ cakāra nāhaṃ karavāṇi rājyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2691: tathaiva me santatito bhayaṃ te vyaitūrdhvaretāḥ satataṃ bhavāni / 11.74 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2692: bhīmavratatvāddhi tadā'sya nāma kṛtvā devā bhīṣma iti hyacīklṛpan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2693: prasūnavṛṣṭiṃ sa ca dāṇsadattāṃ kāl . īṃ samādāya pituḥ samarpayat / 11.75 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2694: j ñātvā tutāṃ rājaputrīṃ guṇāḍhyāṃ satyasya viṣṇormātaraṃ nāmatastat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2695: loke prasiddhāṃ satyavatītyudārāṃ vivāhayāmāsa pituḥ sa bhīṣmaḥ / 11.76 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2696: prāyaḥ satāṃ na manaḥ pāpamārge gacchediti hyātmamanaśca saktam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2697: j ñātvā'pi tāṃ dāṇsagṛhe vivarddhitāṃ jagrāha saddharmarataśca śantanuḥ / 11.77 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2699: yuddheṣu bhīṣmasya nṛpottamaḥ sa reme tayaivābdagaṇān bahūṃ śca / 11.78 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2700: cxvi.lebhe sa citrāṅgadamatra putraṃ tathā dvitīyaṃ ca vicitravīryam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2701: tayośca bālye vyadhunoccharīraṃ jīrṇena dehena hi kiṃ mameti / 11.79 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2702: svecchayā varuṇatvaṃ sa prāpa nānicchayā tanuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2703: tasmin kāle tyajyate hi balavadbhirvadhaṃ vinā / 11.80 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2715: ambikāmbālike tatra saṃ vādaṃ cakratuḥ śubhe /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2716: ambā sā bhīṣmabhāryaiva pūrvadehe tu naicchata / 11.86 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2718: uvāca tāṃ sa tatyāja sā'gamat sālvameva ca / 11.87 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2720: bhīṣmamāpa sa nāgṛhṇāt prayayau sā'pi bhārgavam / 11.88 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2722: bhīṣmāya tu yaśo dātuṃ yuyudhe tena bhārgavaḥ / 11.89 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2723: cxvii.anantaśaktirapi sa na bhīṣmaṃ nijaghāna ha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2725: anantaśaktiḥ sakalāntarātmā yaḥ sarvavit sarvavaśī ca sarvajit /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2726: na yatsamo'nyo'sti kathañca kutracit kathaṃ hyaśaktiḥ paramasya tasya / 11.91 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2727: bhīṣmaṃ svabhaktaṃ yaśasā'bhipūrayan vimohayannāsurāṃ ścaiva rāmaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2728: jitvaiva bhīṣmaṃ na jaghāna devo vācaṃ ca satyāmakarot sa tasya / 11.92 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2732: yaśo bhīṣmasya datvā tu so'mbāṃ ca śaraṇāgatām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2734: anantaraṃ śikhaṇḍitvāt tadā sā ṇsāṅkaraṃ tapaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2735: bhīṣmasya nidhanārthāya puṃ stvārthaṃ ca cakāra ha / 11.95 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2736: bhīṣmo yathā tvāṃ gṛhṇīyāt tathā kuryāmitīritam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2737: rāmeṇa satyaṃ taccakre bhīṣme dehāntaraṃ gate / 11.96 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2738: rudrastu tasyāstapasā tuṣṭaḥ prādād varaṃ tadā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2740: mālāṃ ca ya imāṃ mālāṃ gṛhṇīyāt sa haniṣyati /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2741: bhīṣmamityeva tāṃ mālāṃ gṛhītvā sā nṛpān yayau / 11.98 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2742: t āṃ na bhīṣmabhayāt ke'pi jagṛhustāṃ hi sā tataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2743: drupadasya gṛhadvāri nyasya yogāt tanuṃ jahau / 11.99 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2745: cakāra śambhave cainaṃ so'bravīt kanyakā tava / 11.100 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2747: cxviii.nāmnā ṇsikhaṇḍinī tasyāḥ puṃ vat karmāṇi cākarot / 11.101 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2749: udvāhayāmāsa sā tāṃ puṃ veṣeṇaiva gūhitām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2750: anyatra mātāpitrostu na vijñātāṃ bubodha ha / 11.102 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2751: dhātryai nyavedayat sā'tha tatpitre sā nyavedayat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2752: sa kruddhaḥ preṣayāmāsa nihanmi tvāṃ sabāndhavam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2759: iti matvā vanāyaiva yayau tatra ca tumburuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2761: sa tasyā akhilaṃ śrutvā kṛpāṃ cakre mahāmanāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2762: sa tasyai svaṃ vapuḥ prādāt tadīyaṃ jagṛhe tathā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2763: aṃ śena puṃ svabhāvārthaṃ pūrvadehe samāsthitaḥ / 11.107 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2764: puṃ sāṃ strītvaṃ bhavet kvāpi tathā'pyante pumān bhavet /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2765: strīṇāṃ naiva hi puṃ stvaṃ syād balavatkāraṇairapi / 11.108 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2767: paścāt pundehamapi sā praviveśaiva puṃ yutam / 11.109 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2768: nāsyā dehaḥ puṃ stvamāpa naca puṃ sā'nadhiṣṭhite /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2769: puṃ dehe nyavasat sā'tha gandharveṇa tvadhiṣṭhitam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2773: śvo dehi mama dehaṃ me svaṃ ca dehaṃ samāviśa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2774: ityuktvā sa tu gandharvaḥ kanyādehaṃ samāsthitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2778: yadā yuddhe mṛtiṃ yāti sā kanyā puntanusthitā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2783: śvobhūte sā tu gandharvaṃ prāpya tadvacanāt punaḥ / 11.116 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2784: yayau tenaiva dehena puṃ stvameva samāṇsritā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2786: vicitravīryaḥ pramadādvayaṃ tat samprāpya reme'bdagaṇān susaktaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2787: tatyāja dehaṃ ca sa yakṣmaṇā'rditastato'sya mātā'smaradāṇsu kṛṣṇam / 11.118 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2789: samastavijñānatanuḥ sukhārṇavaḥ sampūjayāmāsa ca taṃ janitrī / 11.119 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2790: taṃ bhīṣmapūrvaiḥ paramādarārcitaṃ svabhiṣṭutaṃ cāvadadasya mātā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2791: putrau mṛtau me natu rājyamaicchad bhīṣmo mayā nitarāmarthito'pi / 11.120 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2794: ṛte ramāṃ j ātu mamāṅgayogayogyā'ṅganā naiva surālaye'pi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2795: tathā'pi te vākyamahaṃ kariṣye sāṃ vatsaraṃ sā caratu vrataṃ ca / 11.122 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2796: cxx.sā pūtadehā'tha ca vaiṣṇavavratānmattaḥ samāpnotu sutaṃ variṣṭham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2797: itīrite rāṣṭramupaiti nāṇsamiti bruvantīṃ punarāha vākyam / 11.123 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2799: saheta sā tad yadi putrako'syā bhaved guṇāḍhyo balavīryayuktaḥ / 11.124 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2800: itīrite'stvityuditastayā'gamat kṛṣṇo'mbikāṃ sā tu bhiyā nyamīlayat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2802: sa mārutāveśabalād balādhiko babhūva rājā dhṛtarāṣṭranāmā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2803: adād varaṃ cāsya balādhikatvaṃ kṛṣṇo'ndha āsīt sa tu mātṛdoṣataḥ / 11.126 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2804: j ñātvā tamandhaṃ punareva kṛṣṇaṃ mātā'bravījjanayānyaṃ guṇāḍhyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2805: ambālikāyāmiti tat tathā'karod bhayāttu sā pāṇḍurabhūnmṛṣādṛk / 11.127 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2806: parāvaho nāma marut tato'bhavad varṇena pāṇḍuḥ sa hi nāmataśca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2807: sa cā'sa vīryādhika eva vāyorāveśataḥ sarvaśastrāstravettā / 11.128 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2808: tasmai tathā balavīryādhikatvavaraṃ prādāt kṛṣṇa evātha pāṇḍum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2809: vijñāya taṃ prāha punaśca mātā nirdoṣamanyaṃ janayottamaṃ sutam / 11.129 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2810: uktveti kṛṣṇaṃ punareva ca snuṣāmāha tvayā'kṣṇorhi nimīlanaṃ purā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2811: kṛtaṃ tataste suta āsa cāndhastataḥ punaḥ kṛṣṇamupāsva bhaktitaḥ / 11.130 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2812: itīritā'pyasya hi māyayā sā bhīt ā bhujiṣyāṃ kumatirnyayojayat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2813: sā taṃ parānandatanuṃ guṇārṇavaṃ samprāpya bhaktyā parayaiva reme / 11.131 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2814: tasyāṃ sa devo'jani dharmarājo māṇḍavyaśāpād ya uvāha śūdratām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2818: nāsatyatā tasya ca tatra hetutaḥ śāpaṃ gṛhītuṃ sa tathaiva coktvā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2819: cxxi.avāpa śūdratvamathāsya nāma cakre kṛṣṇaḥ sarvavittvaṃ tathā'dāt / 11.134 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2822: j ñātvā'sya śūdratvamathāsya mātā punaśca kṛṣṇaṃ praṇatā yayāce /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2824: yogyāni karmāṇi tatastu teṣāṃ cakāra bhīṣmo munibhiryathāvat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2825: vidyāḥ samastā adadācca kṛṣṇasteṣāṃ pāṇḍorastraśastrāṇi bhīṣmaḥ / 11.137 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2828: gavadgaṇādāsa tathaiva sūtāt samastagandharvapatiḥ sa tumburuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2829: ya udvaho nāma marut tadaṃ śayukto vaśī sañjayanāmadheyaḥ / 11.139 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2830: vicitravīryasya sa sūtaputraḥ sakhā ca teṣāmabhavat priyaśca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2834: śūrasya putrī guṇaṇsīlarūpayuktā dattā sakhyureva svapitrā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2835: nāmnā pṛthā kuntibhojasya tena kuntī bhāryā pūrvadehe'pi pāṇḍoḥ / 11.142 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2836: kūrmaśca nāmnā marudeva kuntibhojo'thaināṃ varddhayāmāsa samyak /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2837: tatrā'gamacchaṅkarāṃ śo'tikopo durvāsāstaṃ prāha māṃ vāsayeti / 11.143 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2838: tamāha rājā yadi kanyakāyāḥ kṣamiṣyase śaktitaḥ karma kartryāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2839: sukhaṃ vasetyomiti tena coktaḥ śuśrūṣaṇāyā'diśadāṇsu kuntīm / 11.144 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2840: cakāra karma sā pṛthā muneḥ sukopanasya hi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2844: ṛtau tu sā samāplutā parīkṣaṇāya tanmanoḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2846: tato na sā visarjituṃ śaśāka taṃ vinā ratim /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2848: sa tatra jajñivān svayaṃ dvitīyarūpako vibhuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2861: saṃ vṛddho nikhilāḥ śrutīradhijagau śāstrāṇi sarvāṇi ca/
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2864: atha kuntī dattā sā pāṇḍoḥ so'pyetayā ciraṃ reme /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2865: śūrācchūdryāṃ j ātāṃ viduro'vahadāruṇīṃ guṇāḍhyāṃ ca / 11.156 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2867: kanyāratnaṃ cecchaṃ ścakre brāhmaṃ tapo varaṃ cā'pa / 11.157 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2870: sa mārutāveśavaśāt pṛthivyāṃ balādhiko'bhūd varataśca dhātuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2871: śalyaśca nāmnā'khilaśatruśalyo babhūva kanyā'sya ca mādrināmnī / 11.159 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2872: sā pāṇḍubhāryaiva ca pūrvajanmanyabhūt punaśca pratipāditā'smai /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2873: śalyaśca rājyaṃ pitṛdattamañjo jugopa dharmeṇa samastaśāstravit / 11.160 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2874: athāṅganāratnamavāpya tad dvayaṃ pāṇḍustu bhogān bubhuje yatheṣṭataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2876: bhīṣmo hi rāṣṭre dhṛtarāṣṭrameva saṃ sthāpya pāṇḍuṃ yuvarājameva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2877: cakre tathā'pyandha iti sma rājyaṃ cakāra nāsāvakarocca pāṇḍuḥ / 11.162 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2880: naiṣā virodhe kurupāṇḍavānāṃ tiṣṭhediti vyāsa udīrṇasadguṇaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2881: svamātaraṃ svāṇsramameva ninye snuṣe ca tasyā yayatuḥ sma tāmanu / 11.164 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2882: sutoktamārgeṇa vicintya taṃ hariṃ sutātmanā brahmatayā casā yayau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2883: paraṃ padaṃ vaiṣṇavameva kṛṣṇaprasādataḥ svaryayatuḥ snuṣe ca/ 11.165 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2884: mātā casā vidurasyā'pa lokaṃ vairiñcamanveva gatā'mbikāṃ satī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2885: vyāsaprasādāt sutasadguṇaiśca kālena muktiṃ ca jagāma sanmatiḥ / 11.166 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2886: ambālikā'pi kramayogato'gāt parāṃ gatiṃ naiva tathā'mbikā yayau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2887: yathāyathā viṣṇuparaścidātmā tathātathā hyasya gatiḥ paratra / 11.167 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2888: pāṇḍustato rājyabharaṃ nidhāya jyeṣṭhe'nuje caiva vanaṃ jagāma /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2890: cxxiv.gṛhāṇsrameṇaiva vane nivāsaṃ kurvan sa bhogān bubhuje tapaśca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2891: cakre munīndraiḥ sahito jagatpatiṃ ramāpatiṃ bhaktiyuto'bhipūjayan / 11.169 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2892: sa kāmato hariṇatvaṃ prapannaṃ daivādṛṣiṃ grāmyakarmānuṣaktam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2893: viddhvā ṇsāpaṃ prāpa tasmāt striyā yuṅ mariṣyasītyeva babhūva cā'rtaḥ / 11.170 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2894: nyasiṣṇuruktaḥ pṛthayā sa neti praṇāmapūrvaṃ nyavasat tathaiva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2895: t ābhyāṃ sametaḥ śataśṛṅgaparvate nārāyaṇasyā'śramamadhyage puraḥ / 11.171 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2896: tapo nitāntaṃ sa cacāra tābhyāṃ samanvitaḥ kṛṣṇapadāmbujāṇsrayaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2902: ūcuḥ paraṃ puruṣamenamanantaśaktiṃ sūktena te'bjajamukhā api pauruṣeṇa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2903: stutvā dharā'suravarākramaṇāt pareśa khinnā yato hi vimukhāstava te'tipāpāḥ / 11.174 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2904: dussaṅgatirbhavati bhāravadeva deva nityaṃ satāmapi hi naḥ śṛṇu vākyamīśa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2905: pūrvaṃ hatā ditisutā bhavatā raṇeṣu hyasmatpriyārthamadhunā bhuvi te'bhijātāḥ / 11.175 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2912: tatra sma devavṛṣabhairasureśacamvā yuddhe nisūdita utaughabalaiḥ śatāṃ śaḥ / 11.178 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2914: cxxv.sasāra māyāvidasaṃ hyamāyo varādumeśasya surān vimohayan / 11.179 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2915: māyāsahasreṇa surāḥ samardditā raṇe viṣeduḥ śaśisūryamukhyāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2916: t ān vīkṣya vajrī paramāṃ tu vidyāṃ svayambhudattāṃ prayuyoja vaiṣṇavīm / 11.180 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2917: samastamāyāpahayā tayaiva varād rameśasya sadā'pyasaṃ hyayā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2920: sureśvareṇorjitapauruṣā bahūn vajreṇa vajrī nijaghāna śambaram / 11.182 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2921: tasmin hate dānavalokapāle diteḥ sutā dudruvurindrabhīṣit āḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2922: t ān vipracittirvinivārya dhanvī sasāra śakrapramukhān surottamān / 11.183 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2924: nirīkṣya śakraṃ ca vimohitaṃ drutaṃ nyavārayat taṃ pavanaḥ śaraughaiḥ / 11.184 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2925: astrāṇi tasyāstravarairnivārya cikṣepa tasyorasi kāñcanīṃ gadām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2927: athā'sasādā'śu sa kālanemistvadājñayā yasya varaṃ dadau purā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2932: cakreṇa bāhūn vinikṛtya kāni ca nyavedayaścā'śu yamāya pāpam / 11.188 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2934: jaghāna vāyuḥ punareva jātāste bhūtal . e dharmabalopapannāḥ / 11.189 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2935: rājñāṃ mahāvaṃ śasujanmanāṃ tu teṣāmabhūd dharmamatirvipāpā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2937: cxxvi.tvadbhaktileśābhiyutaḥ sukarmā vrajenna pāpāṃ tu gatiṃ kathañcit /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2938: daityeśvarāṇāṃ ca tamo'ndhameva tvayaiva klṛptaṃ nanu satyakāma / 11.191 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2941: ya ugrasenaḥ suragāyakaḥ sa jāto yaduṣveṣa tathā'bhidheyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2942: tavaiva sevārthamamuṣya putro jāto'suraḥ kālanemiḥ sa īśa / 11.193 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2943: yastvatpriyārthaṃ na hato hi vāyunā bhavatprasādāt paramīśitā'pi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2944: sa eṣa bhojeṣu punaśca jāto varādumeśasya parairajeyaḥ / 11.194 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2945: sa augrasene janito'sureṇa kṣetre hi tadrūpadhareṇa māyayā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2946: gandharvijena dramil . ena nāmnā kaṃ so jito yena varācchacīpatiḥ / 11.195 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2947: jitvā jaleśaṃ ca hṛt āni yena ratnāni yakṣāṇsca jitāḥ śivasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2948: kanyāvanārthaṃ magadhādhipena prayojitāste ca hṛte balena / 11.196 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2949: sa vipracittiśca jarāsuto'bhūd varād vidhāturgiriśasya caiva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2950: sarvairajeyo balamuttamaṃ tato jñātvaiva kaṃ sasya mudā sute dadau / 11.197 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2951: nivārayāmāsa na kaṃ samuddhataṃ śakto'pi yo yasya bale na kaścit /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2952: tulyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ vivareṣu vā kvacid vaśe balād yo nṛpatīśca cakre / 11.198 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2953: hatau purā yau madhukaiṭabhākhyau tvayaiva haṃ so ḍibhakaśca jātau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2954: varādajeyau giriśasya vīrau bhaktau jarāsandhamanu sma tau śive / 11.199 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2955: anye'pi bhūmāvasurāḥ prajātāstvayā hatā ye suradaityasaṅgare /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2956: anye tathaivāndhatamaḥ prapedire kāryā tathaiṣāṃ ca tamogatistvayā / 11.200 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2959: rāmātmanā ye nihatāṇsca rākṣasā dṛṣṭvā balaṃ te'pi tadā tavādya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2960: samaṃ tavānyaṃ nahi cintayanti supāpino'pīśa tathā hanūmataḥ / 11.202 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2961: cxxvii.ye keśava tvadbahumānayuktāstathaiva vāyau nahi te tamo'ndham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2962: yogyāḥ praveṣṭuṃ tadato hi mārgāccālyāstvayā janayitvaiva bhūmau / 11.203 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2963: nitāntamutpādya bhavadvirodhaṃ tathāca vāyau bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2965: hatau ca yau rāvaṇakumbhakarṇau tvayā tvadīyau pratihārapālau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2966: mahāsurāveśayutau hi śāpāt tvayaiva tāvadya vimocanīyau / 11.205 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2967: yau tau tavārī ha tayoḥ praviṣṭau daityau tu tāvandhatamaḥ praveśyau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2968: yau tau tvadīyau bhavadīyaveśma tvayā punaḥ prāpaṇīyau pareśa / 11.206 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2969: āviśya yo balimañjaścakāra pratīpamasmāsu tathā tvayīśa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2970: sa cāsuro balināmaiva bhūmau sālvo nāmnā brahmadattasya jātaḥ / 11.207 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2973: nāsau hataḥ śaktimatā'pi tatra kṛṣṇāvatāre sa mayaiva vadhyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2974: ityātmasaṅkalpamṛtaṃ vidhātuṃ sa cātra vadhyo bhavatā'tipāpī / 11.209 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2976: yadā sabhīṣmeṇa jitaḥ pitā'sya tadā sa sālvastapasi sthito'bhūt / 11.210 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2977: sa cādya tasmāt tapaso nivṛtto jarāsutasyānumate sthito hi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2978: ananyavadhyo bhavatā'dya vadhyaḥ sa prāpaṇīyaśca tamasyathogre / 11.211 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2979: yo bāṇamāviśya mahāsuro'bhūt sthitaḥ sa nāmnā prathito'pi bāṇaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2980: sa kīcako nāma babhūva rudravarādavadhyaḥ sa tamaḥ praveśyaḥ / 11.212 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2984: cxxviii.tvameva nityoditapūrṇasatsukhastvāddṛṅ nakaścit kuta eva te'dhikaḥ / 11.214 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2987: sa merumāpyā'ha caturmukhaṃ prabhuryatra tvayokto'smi hi tatra sarvathā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2988: prādurbhaviṣye bhavato hi bhaktyā vaśastvivāhaṃ svavaśo'pi cecchayā / 11.216 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2989: brahmā praṇamyā'ha tamātmakāraṇaṃ prādāṃ purā'haṃ varuṇāya gāḥ śubhāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2990: jahāra tāstasya pitā'mṛtasravāḥ sa kaśyapo drāk sahasā'tigarvitaḥ / 11.217 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2991: mātrā tvadityā ca tathā surabhyā pracoditenaiva hṛt āsu tāsu /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2992: śrutvā jaleśāt sa mayā tuśaptaḥ kṣatreṣu gojīvanako bhaveti / 11.218 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2993: śūrāt sa jāto bahugodhanāḍhyo bhūmau yamāhurvasudeva ityapi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2994: tasyaiva bhāryā tvaditiśca devakī babhūva cānyā surabhiśca rohiṇī / 11.219 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2995: tat tvaṃ bhavasvā'śu ca devakīsutastathaiva yo droṇanāmā vasuḥ saḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2996: svabhāryayā dharayā tvatpitṛtvaṃ prāptuṃ tapastepa udāramānasaḥ / 11.220 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2997: tasmai varaḥ sa mayā sannisṛṣṭaḥ sa cā'sa nandākhya utāsya bhāryā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:2998: namnā yaśodā saca ṇsūratātasutasya vaiśyāprabhavo'tha gopaḥ / 11.221 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3000: tvāmeva tasmāt prathamaṃ pradarśya tatra svarūpaṃ hi tato vrajaṃ vraja / 11.222 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3001: itīrite so'bjabhavena keśavastatheti coktvā punarāha devatāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3002: sarve bhavanto bhavatā'śu mānuṣe kāryānusāreṇa yathānurūpataḥ / 11.223 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3005: pāpena tenāpahṛto hi hastī śivapradattaḥ supratīkābhidhānaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3007: cxxix.mahāsurasyāṃ śayutaḥ sa eva rudrāveśād balavānastravāṃ śca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3008: śiṣyo mahendrasya hate babhūva tāte svadharmābhirataśca nityam / 11.226 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3010: kṛṣṇaḥ pakṣo yuyudhānābhidheyo gurutmato'ṃ śena yuto babhūva / 11.227 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3011: yaḥ saṃ vaho nāma marut tadaṃ śaścakrasya viṣṇoṇsca babhūva tasmin /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3012: yaduṣvabhūddhṛdiko bhojavaṃ śe sitaḥ pakṣastasya suto babhūva / 11.228 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3013: sa pāñcajanyāṃ śayuto marutsu tathā'ṃ śayuktaḥ pravahasya vīraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3014: nāmāsya cābhūt kṛtavarmetyathānye ye yādavāste'pi surāḥ sagopāḥ / 11.229 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3015: ye pāṇḍavānāmabhavan sahāyā devāṇsca devānucarāḥ samastāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3016: anye tu sarve'pyasurā hi madhyamā yemānuṣāste calabuddhipravṛttayaḥ / 11.230 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3017: li ṅgaṃ surāṇāṃ hi paraiva bhaktirviṣṇau tadanyeṣu ca tatpratīpatā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3024: Oṃ / babhūva gandharvamunistu devakaḥ sa āsa sevārthamathā'hukāddhareḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3025: sa ugrasenāvarajastathaiva nāmāsya tasmādajani sma devakī / 12.1 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3026: anyāṇsca yāḥ kāṇsyapasyaiva bhāryā jyeṣṭhāṃ tu tāmāhuka ātmaputrīm /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3027: cakāra tasmāddhi pitṛṣvasā sā svasā ca kaṃ sasya babhūva devakī / 12.2 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3028: saivāditirvasudevasya dattā tasyā rathaṃ maṅgal . aṃ kaṃ sa eva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3029: saṃ yāpayāmāsa tadā hi vāyurjagāda vākyaṃ gaganasthito'mum / 12.3 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3030: vinā'parādhaṃ na tato garīyaso na mātulo vadhyatāmeti viṣṇoḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3032: mṛtyustavāsyā bhavitā'ṣṭamaḥ suto mūḍheti cokto jagṛhe kṛpāṇām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3033: putrān samarpyāsya ca śūrasūnurvimocya tāṃ tatsahito gṛhaṃ yayau / 12.5 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3034: ṣaṭkanyakāṇscāvarajā gṛhīt āstenaiva tābhiśca mumoda śūrajaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3035: bāhlīkaputrī ca purā gṛhīt ā purā'sya bhāryā surabhistu rohiṇī / 12.6 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3037: kanyāṃ tathā karavīreśvarasya dharmeṇa tenaiva ditiṃ danuṃ purā / 12.7 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3038: yo manyate viṣṇurevāhamityasau pāpo venaḥ pauṇḍrako vāsudevaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3039: j ātaḥ punaḥ śūrajāt kāṇsijāyāṃ nānyo matto viṣṇurastīti vādī / 12.8 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3040: dhundhurhato yo hariṇā madhoḥ suta āsīt sutāyāṃ karavīreśvarasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3041: sṛgālanāmā vāsudevo'tha devakīmudūhya śaurirna yayāvubhe te / 12.9 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3042: tatastu tau vṛṣṇiśatrū babhūvaturjyeṣṭhau sutau śūrasutasya nityam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3043: anyāsu ca prāpa sutānudārān devāvatārān vasudevo'khilajñaḥ / 12.10 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3044: yeye hi devāḥ pṛthivīṃ gatāste sarve śiṣyāḥ satyavatīsutasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3046: cxxxi.marīcijāḥ ṣaṇmunayo babhūvuste devakaṃ prāhasan kārṣyahetoḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3047: tacchāpataḥ kālanemiprasūtā avadhyatārthaṃ tapa eva cakruḥ / 12.12 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3048: dhātā prādād varameṣāṃ tathaiva śaśāpa tān kṣmātal . e sambhavadhvam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3049: tatra svatāto bhavatāṃ nihantetyātmānyato varalipsūn hiraṇyaḥ / 12.13 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3050: durgā tadā tān bhagavatpracoditā prasvāpayitvā pracakarṣa kāyāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3051: kramāt samāveśayadāṇsu devakīgarbhāṇsaye tān nyahanacca kaṃ saḥ / 12.14 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3053: sa pāṇḍurāptumaicchata nyavārayaṃ śca te tadā / 12.15 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3054: yadharthameva jāyate pumān hi tasya so'kṛteḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3055: śubhāṃ gatiṃ natu vrajed dhruvaṃ tato nyavārayan / 12.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3057: babhūva pāṇḍureṣa tad vinā na tasya sadgatiḥ / 12.17 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3065: sutaṃ vinā na no gatiṃ śubhāṃ vadanti sādhavaḥ / 12.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3068: na te surānṛte samaḥ sureṣu kecideva ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3070: varaṃ samāṇsritā patiṃ vrajeta yā tato'dhamam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3073: nimittato'pi tāḥ kvacinna tān vihāya menire / 12.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3074: manovacaḥ śarīrato yato hi tāḥ pativratāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3081: duranvayāt suduḥ sahā vipat tato bhaviṣyati / 12.29 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3082: ayuktamuktavāṃ stato bhavāṃ stathā'pi te vacaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3083: alaṅghyameva me tato vadasva putradaṃ suram / 12.30 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3085: nṛpo'bhirakṣit ā bhavet tadāhvayā'śu taṃ vibhum / 12.31 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3088: tataśca sadya eva sā suṣāva putramuttamam /
