GSP33m_mbhtnu:3723: chadmaprayogata imaṃ vinihatya vīryāt pārthaṃ nihatya nigal . e ca vidadhmahe'nyān / 14.68 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3724: evaṃ kṛte nihatakaṇṭakamasya rājyaṃ duryodhanasya hi bhavenna tato'nyathā syāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3725: asmin hate nipatite ca surendrasūnau śeṣā bhaveyurapi saubaliputradāsāḥ / 14.69 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3726: clxi.evaṃ vicārya viṣamulbaṇamantakābhaṃ kṣīrodadhermathanajaṃ tapasā girīśāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3727: śukreṇa labdhamamutaḥ subalātmajena prāptaṃ pratoṣya marutastanayāya cāduḥ / 14.70 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3729: j ñātvā yuyutsugaditaṃ balavān sa bhīmo viṣṇoranugrahabalājjarayāñcakāra / 14.71 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3730: jīrṇe viṣe kumatayaḥ paramābhitaptāḥ prāsādamāṇsu vidadhurharipādatoye /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3731: j ñātvā yuyutsumukhataḥ svayamatra cānte suṣvāpa mārutiramā dhṛtarāṣṭraputraiḥ / 14.72 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3734: tat koṭiyojanagabhīramudaṃ vigāhya bhīmo vijṛmbhaṇata eva vivṛścya pāṇsān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3736: taṃ vīkṣya duṣṭamanaso'tivipannacittāḥ sammantrya bhūya urunāgagaṇānathāṣṭau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3737: śukroktamantrabalataḥ pura āhvayitvā paścāt supañjaragatān pradaduḥ svasūte / 14.75 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3739: suptasya vistṛta urasyamucad viśīrṇadantā babhūvuramumāṇsu vidaśya nāgāḥ / 14.76 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3740: kṣiptvā sudūramurunāgavarānathāṣṭau tadvaṃ śajān sa vinihatya pipīlikāvat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3741: jaghne ca sūtamapahastata eva bhīmaḥ suṣvāpa pūrvavadanutthita eva talpāt / 14.77 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3742: tat tasya naijabalamapramayaṃ nirīkṣya sarve kṣitīśatanayā adhikaṃ viṣeduḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3743: niśvāsato darśanādapi bhasma yeṣāṃ bhūyāsureva bhuvanāni ca te mṛṣā'san / 14.78 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3744: dadbhirvidaśya na vikāramamuṣya kartuṃ śekurbhujaṅgamavarā api suprayatnāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3745: kasyāpi nedṛśabalaṃ śrutapūrvamāsīd dṛṣṭaṃ kimu sma tanaye'pi hiraṇyakasya / 14.79 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3746: svātmāvanārthamadhikāṃ stutimeva kṛtvā viṣṇoḥ sa daityatanayo hariṇā'vito'bhūt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3747: natvaurasaṃ balamamuṣya sa kṛṣyate hi bhṛtyairbalāt sa pituraurasamasya vīryam / 14.80 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3748: naisargikapriyamimaṃ pravadanti viprā viṣṇornitāntamapi satyamidaṃ dhruvaṃ hi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3749: naivānyathaurasabalaṃ bhavatīdṛśaṃ tadutsādya eṣa hariṇaiva sahaiṣa no'rthaḥ / 14.81 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3750: clxii.kṛṣṇaḥ kilaiṣa ca hariryaduṣu prajātaḥ so'syā'śrayaḥ kuruta tasya bahu pratīpam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3751: sammantrya caivamatipāpatamā narendraputrā hareśca bahu cakruratha pratīpam / 14.82 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3752: taiḥ preritā nṛpatayaḥ pitaraśca teṣāṃ sākaṃ bṛhadrathasutena hareḥ sakāṇsam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3755: raktaṃ viśastrakavacadhvajavājisūtāḥ srastāmbarāḥ ślathitamūrddhajino nivṛtt āḥ / 14.84 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3756: evaṃ bṛhadrathasuto'pi suśocyarūpa ārto yayau bahuśa eva puraṃ svakīyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3757: kṛṣṇena pūrṇabalavīryaguṇena mukto jīvetyatīva vijitaḥ śvasitāvaśeṣaḥ / 14.85 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3758: evaṃ gateṣu bahuśo natakandhareṣu rājasvajo'pi madhurāṃ svapurīṃ praviśya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3759: rāmeṇa sārdhamakhilairyadubhiḥ sameto reme ramāpatiracintyabalo jayaśrīḥ / 14.86 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3760: vyarthodyamāḥ punarapi sma sadhārtarāṣṭrā bhīmaṃ nihantumuruyatnamakurvatājñāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3761: rājñāṃ sutāstamakhilaṃ sa mṛṣaiva kṛtvā cakre jayāya ca diśāṃ balavān prayatnam / 14.87 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3762: prācīṃ diśaṃ prathamameva jigāya paścād yāmyāṃ jaleśaparipālitayā sahānyām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3763: yau tau purātanadaśānanakumbhakarṇau mātṛṣvasātanayatāṃ ca gatau jigāya / 14.88 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3764: pūrvastayorhi damaghoṣasutaḥ prajātaḥ prāhuśca yaṃ nṛpatayaḥ śiśupālanāmnā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3765: anyaṃ vadanti ca karūṇsanṛpaṃ tathā'nyamātṛṣvasātanayameva ca dantavakram / 14.89 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3766: jitvaiva tāvapi jigāya ca pauṇḍrakākhyaṃ śauraiḥ sutaṃ sutamajaidatha bhīṣmakasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3767: yaḥ pūrvamāsa ditijo narahelvalākhyo rugmīti nāma ca babhūva sa kuṇḍineśaḥ / 14.90 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3768: bhāgeta eva tanayasya sa eva vahnernāmnā ṇsuceḥ sa tu pitā'sya hi mitrabhāgaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3769: rāhvaṃ śayuk tadanujau krathakaiśikākhyau bhāgau tathā'gnisutayoḥ pavamānaśundhyoḥ / 14.91 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3770: bandhornijasya tu balaṃ suparīkṣamāṇaḥ śalyo'pi tena yuyudhe vijitastathaiva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3771: bhīmo jigāya yudhi vīramathaikalavyaṃ sarve nṛpāṇsca vijitā amunaivameva / 14.92 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3772: tadbāhuvīryaparipālita indrasūnuḥ śeṣān nṛpāṃ śca samajaid balavānayatnāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3773: clxiii.sālvaṃ ca haṃ saḍibhakau ca vijitya bhīmo nāgāhvayaṃ puramagāt sahito'rjunena / 14.93 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3774: tadbāhuvīryamatha vīkṣya mumoda dharmasūnuḥ samātṛyamajo viduraḥ sabhīṣmaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3775: anye ca sajjanagaṇāḥ sahapaurarāṣṭrāḥ śrutvaiva sarvayadavo jahṛṣurnitāntam / 14.94 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3776: kṛṣṇaḥ suyodhanamukhākramamāmbikeyaṃ j ānan svaputravaśavartinameva gatvā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3777: śvāphalkino gṛhamamuṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraśāntyai gantuṃ dideśa gajanāma puraṃ pareśaḥ / 14.95 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3778: so'yād gajāhvayamamutra vicitravīryaputreṇa bhīṣmasahitaiḥ kurubhiḥ samastaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3779: sampūjitaḥ katipayānavasacca māsān jñātuṃ hi pāṇḍuṣu manaḥ prasṛtiṃ kurūṇām / 14.96 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3780: j ñātvā sa kuntividuroktita ātmanā ca mitrārimadhyamajanāṃ stanayeṣu pāṇḍoḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3781: vijñāya putravaśagaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭramañjaḥ sāmnaiva bhedasahitena jagāda vidvān / 14.97 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3782: putreṣu pāṇḍutanayeṣu casāmyavṛttiḥ kīrtiṃ ca dharmamurumeṣi tathā'rthakāmau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3783: prītiṃ parāṃ tvayi kariṣyati vāsudevaḥ sākaṃ samastayadubhiḥ sahitaḥ surādyaiḥ / 14.98 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3784: dharmārthakāmasahitāṃ ca vimuktimeṣi tatprītitaḥ suniyataṃ viparītavṛttiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3785: yāsyeva rājavara tatphalavaiparītyamitthaṃ vaco nigaditaṃ tava kārṣṇamadya / 14.99 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3786: itthaṃ samastakurumadhya upāttavākyo rājā'pi putravaśago vacanaṃ jagāda /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3787: sarvaṃ vaśe bhagavato na vayaṃ svatantrā bhūbhārasaṃ hṛtikṛte sa ihāvatīrṇaḥ / 14.100 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3788: etanniśamya vacanaṃ sa tu yādavo'sya jñātvā mano'sya kaluṣaṃ tava naiva putrāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3789: ityūcivān saha maruttanayārjunābhyāṃ prāyāt purīṃ ca sahadevayutaḥ svakīyām / 14.101 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3790: j ñānaṃ tu bhāgavatamuttamamātmayogyaṃ bhīmārjunau bhagavataḥ samavāpya kṛṣṇāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3792: pratyudyamo bhagavatā'pi bhaved gadāyāḥ śikṣā yadā bhagavatā kriyate nacemam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3793: kuryāditi sma bhagavatsamanujñayaiva rāmādaśikṣadurugāyapuraḥ sa bhīmaḥ / 14.103 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3794: rāmo'pi śikṣitamarīndradharāt puro'sya bhīme dadāvatha varāṇi hareravāpa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3795: astrāṇi śakratanayaḥ sahadeva āra nītiṃ tathoddhavamukhāt sakalāmudārām / 14.104 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3797: duḥkhaṃ vināṇsaya vacobhirare madīyairnandādināṃ virahajaṃ mama cā'śu yāhi / 14.105 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3798: matto viyoga iha kasyacidasti naiva yasmādahaṃ tanubhṛt āṃ nihato'ntareva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3799: nāhaṃ manuṣya iti kutraca vo'stu buddhirbrahmaiva nirmalatamaṃ pravadanti māṃ hi / 14.106 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3800: pūrvaṃ yadā hyajagaro nijagāra nandaṃ sarve na śekuratha tatpravimokṣaṇāya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3801: matpādasaṃ sparśataḥ sa tadā'tidivyo vidyādharastaduditaṃ nikhilaṃ smarantu / 14.107 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3802: pūrvaṃ sa rūpamadataḥ prajahāsa viprān nityaṃ tapaḥ kṛśatarāṅgiraso virūpān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3803: taiḥ prāpitaḥ sapadi so'jagaratvameva matto nijāṃ tanumavāpya jagāda nandam / 14.108 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3804: nāyaṃ naro harirayaṃ paramaḥ parebhyo viśveśvaraḥ sakalakāraṇa ātmatantraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3805: vijñāya cainamurusaṃ sṛtito vimuktā yāntyasya pādayugal . aṃ munayo virāgāḥ / 14.109 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3806: nandaṃ yadā ca jagṛhe varuṇasya dūtastatrāpi māṃ jalapatergṛhamāṇsu yātam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3807: sampūjya vāripatirāha vimucya nandaṃ nāyaṃ sutastava pumān paramaḥ sa eṣaḥ / 14.110 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3808: sandarśito nanu mayaiva vikuṇṭhaloko gojīvināṃ sthitirapi pravarā madīyā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3809: mānuṣyabuddhimapanetumaje mayi sma tasmānmayi sthitimavāpya śamaṃ prayāntu / 14.111 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3810: śrutvoddhavo nigaditaṃ paramasya puṃ so vṛndāvanaṃ prati yayau vacanaiśca tasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3811: duḥkhaṃ vyapohya nikhilaṃ paśujīvanānāmāyāt punaścaraṇasannidhimeva viṣṇoḥ / 14.112 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3817: Oṃ / evaṃ praśāsati jagat puruṣottame'smin bhīmārjunau tu sahadevayutāvanujñām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3819: sairandhrikodarabhavaḥ sa tu nāradasya śiṣyo vṛkodararathasya babhūva yantā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3820: yā piṅgalā'nyabhava ātmani saṃ sthitaṃ taṃ saṃ smṛtya kāntamurugāyamabhūt trivakrā / 15.2 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3821: taṃ pañcarātravidamāpya suṣārathiṃ sa bhīmo mumoda punarāpa parātmavidyām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3822: vyāsāt parātmata uvāca ca phalgunādidaiveṣu sarvavijayī paravidyayaiṣaḥ / 15.3 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3823: sarvānabhāgavataśāstrapathān vidhūya mārgaṃ cakāra sa tu vaiṣṇavameva śubhram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3824: krīḍārthameva vijigāya tathobhayātmayuddhe balaṃ ca karavākprabhave'mitātmā / 15.4 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3825: nityaprabhūtasuśubhapratibho'pi viṣṇoḥ śrutvā parāṃ punarapi pratibhāmavāpa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3826: ko nāma viṣṇvanupajīvaka āsa yasya nityāṇsrayādabhihitā'pi ramā sadā ṇsrīḥ / 15.5 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3828: te pañca pāṇḍutanayā mumudurnitāntaṃ saddharmacāriṇa urukramaśikṣit ārthāḥ / 15.6 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3830: drauṇistadā dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ sametya krīḍan payaḥ pātumupaiti sadma / 15.7 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3831: tasmai mātā piṣṭamāloḍya pātuṃ dadāti pītvaiti tadeṣa nityam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3832: pītakṣīrān dhārtarāṣṭrān sa caitya mayā pītaṃ kṣīramityāha nityam / 15.8 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3833: nṛtyantamenaṃ pāyayāmāsurete payaḥ kadācid rasamasya so'vet /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3834: punaḥ kadācit sa tu mātṛdatte piṣṭe nedaṃ kṣīramityārurāva / 15.9 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3836: sampreritaḥ kṛpayā cā'rtarūpo droṇo yayāvārjayituṃ tadā gām / 15.10 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3837: pratigrahāt sannivṛttaḥ sa rāmaṃ yayau na viṣṇorhi bhavet pratigrahaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3838: doṣāya yasmāt sa pitā'khilasya svāmī guruḥ paramaṃ daivataṃ ca / 15.11 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3839: clxvi.dṛṣṭvaivainaṃ j āmadagnyo'pyacintayad droṇaṃ kartuṃ kṣitibhārāpanode /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3840: hetuṃ surāṇāṃ narayonijānāṃ hantā cāyaṃ syāt saha putreṇa ceti / 15.12 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3841: teṣāṃ vṛddhiḥ syāt pāṇḍavārthe hatānāṃ mokṣe'pi saukhyasya na santatiśca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3842: yogyā surāṇāṃ kalijā supāpāḥ prāyo yasmāt kalijāḥ sambhavanti / 15.13 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3843: na devānāmāṇsataṃ pūruṣā hi santānajāḥ prāyaśaḥ pāpayogyāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3845: avyucchinne sakalānāṃ surāṇāṃ tantau kalirno bhavitā kathañcit /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3846: tasmādutsādyāḥ sarva ete surāṃ śā etena sākaṃ tanayena vīrāḥ / 15.15 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3847: evaṃ vicintyāpratimaḥ sa bhārgavo babhāṣa īṣatsmitaśociṣā girā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3848: anantaśaktiḥ sakaleśvaro'pi tyaktaṃ sarvaṃ nādya vittaṃ mamāsti / 15.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3849: ātmā vidyā ṇsastrametāvadasti teṣāṃ madhye rucitaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3850: uktaḥ sa itthaṃ pravicintya vipro jagāda kastvadgrahaṇe samarthaḥ / 15.17 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3852: svāmyaṃ tavecchan pratiyātyadho hi yasmānnacotthātumalaṃ kadācit / 15.18 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3854: vidyaiva deyā bhavatā tato'ja sarvaprakāṇsinyacalā susūkṣmā / 15.19 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3855: itīritastattvavidyādikāḥ sa vidyāḥ sarvāḥ pradadau sāstraśastrāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3856: abdadviṣaṭkena samāpya tāḥ sa yayau sakhāyaṃ drupadaṃ mahātmā / 15.20 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3857: dāne'rddharājyasya hi tatpratijñāṃ saṃ smṛtya pūrvāmupayātaṃ sakhāyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3858: sakhā tavāsmīti tadodito'pi jagāda vākyaṃ drupado'tidarpāt / 15.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3859: na nirdhano rājasakho bhaveta yatheṣṭato gaccha vipreti daivāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3861: pratigrahāt sannivṛttena so'yaṃ mayā prāpto matpituḥ śiṣyakatvāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3862: clxvii.pituḥ śiṣyo hyātmaśiṣyo bhaveta śiṣyasyārthaḥ svīya eveti matvā / 15.23 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3863: so'yaṃ pāpo māmavajñāya mūḍho duṣṭaṃ vaco'śrāvayadasya darpam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3864: haniṣya ityeva matiṃ nidhāya yayau kurūñchiṣyatāṃ netumetān / 15.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3865: pratigrahād vinivṛttasya cārthaḥ syācchiṣyebhyaḥ kauravebhyo mamātra /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3866: evaṃ manvānaḥ krīḍataḥ pāṇḍaveyān sadhārtarāṣṭrān purabāhyato'khyat / 15.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3868: kūpe na śekuḥ sahitāḥ kumārā uddhartumetaṃ pavanātmajo'vadat / 15.26 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3869: niṣpatya coddhṛtya samutpatiṣye kūpādamuṣmād bhṛśanīcādapi sma /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3870: sakandukāṃ mudrikāṃ paśyatādya sarve kumārā iti vīryasaṃ śrayāt / 15.27 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3871: tadā kumārānavadat sa vipro dhigastrabāhyāṃ bhavatāṃ pravṛttim /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3872: j ātāḥ kule bharatānāṃ na vittha divyāni cāstrāṇi surārcitāni / 15.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3873: itīritā astravidaṃ kumārā vijñāya vipraṃ surapūjyapautram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3879: papracchurenaṃ sahitāḥ kumārāḥ ko'sīti so'pyāha pitāmaho vaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3880: vakteti te dudruvurāṇsu bhīṣmaṃ droṇo'yamityeva sa tāṃ stadoce / 15.32 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3881: na rājagehaṃ sa kadācideti tenādṛṣṭaḥ sa kumāraiḥ purā'taḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3882: bhīṣmo vidyāstena sahaiva cintayannastraprāptiṃ tasya śuśrāva rāmāt / 15.33 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3883: śrutvā vṛddhaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ dvijaṃ taṃ mahāstravidyāmapi tāṃ mahāmatiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3884: droṇaṃ j ñātvā tasya śiṣyatva etān dadau kumārāṃ statra gatvā svayaṃ ca / 15.34 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3885: clxviii.droṇo'tha tānavadad yo madiṣṭaṃ kartuṃ pratijñāṃ prathamaṃ karoti /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3886: taṃ dhanvināṃ pravaraṃ sādhayiṣya ityarjunastāmakarot pratijñām / 15.35 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3887: unmādanādīni sa veda kṛṣṇādastrāṇyanāpatsu na tāni muñcet /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3891: na buddhipūrvaṃ vara indirāpateranyatra me grāhya itaśca jiṣṇuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3892: karotu gurvarthamiti sma cintayan bhīmaḥ pratijñāṃ na cakāra tatra / 15.38 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3893: tatpreritenārjunena pratijñā kṛt ā yadā vipravarastataḥ param /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3894: snehaṃ nitāntaṃ surarājasūnau kṛtvā mahāstrāṇi dadau sa tasya / 15.39 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3895: sa pakṣapātaṃ ca cakāra tasmin karoti cāsyorutarāṃ praśaṃ sām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3896: rahasyavidyāṇsca dadāti tasya nānyasya kasyāpi tathā kathañcit / 15.40 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3897: bhīmaḥ samastaṃ pratibhābalena jānan snehaṃ tvadvitīyaṃ kaniṣṭhe /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3898: droṇasya kṛtvā sakalāstravedinaṃ kartuṃ pārthaṃ nārjunavaccakāra / 15.41 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3899: naivātiyatnena dadarśa lakṣaṃ śuśrūṣāyāṃ pārthamagre karoti /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3901: tadā samīyuḥ sakalāḥ kṣitīśaputrā droṇāt sakalāstrāṇyavāptum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3902: dadau sa teṣāṃ paramāstrāṇi vipro rāmādavāptānyagatāni cānyaiḥ / 15.43 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3904: avāpya sarve tanayā nṛpāṇāṃ śaktā babhūvurna yathaiva pūrve / 15.44 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3905: naitādṛśāḥ pūrvamāsan narendrā astre bale sarvavidyāsu caiva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3908: sūto niṣāda iti naitayoradādastrāṇi vipraḥ sa tu rāmaśiṣyaḥ / 15.46 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3910: vipro'pyayaṃ tamajamemi bhṛgoḥ kulotthamitthaṃ vicintya sa yayau bhṛgupāṇsramāya / 15.47 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3915: j ñānaṃ ca bhāgavatamapyaparāṇsca vidyā rāmādavāpya vijayaṃ dhanuragryayānam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3916: abdaiścaturbhiratha ca nyavasat tadante hātuṃ na śakta urugāyamimaṃ sa karṇaḥ / 15.50 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3917: aṅke nidhāya sa kadācidamuṣya rāmaḥ śiśye śiro vigatanidra udārabodhaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3918: saṃ suptavat suravaraḥ surakāryahetordātuṃ ca vālinidhanasya phalaṃ tadasya / 15.51 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3919: tatrā'sa rākṣasavaraḥ sa tu hetināmā kāle mahendramanupāsya hi śāpato'sya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3920: kīṭastamindra uta tatra samāviveśa karṇasya śāpamupapādayituṃ sutārthe / 15.52 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3921: karṇaḥ sa kīṭatanugena kirīṭinaiva hyūroradhastanata oparigātvacaśca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3922: viddhaḥ śareṇa sa yathā rudhirasya dhārāṃ susrāva taṃ vigatanidra ivā'ha rāmaḥ / 15.53 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3923: kiṃ tvaṃ na cālayasi māṃ rudhirapraseke prāpte'pi pāvanavirodhini ko'si ceti /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3924: taṃ prāha karṇa iha naiva mayā vidheyo nidrāvirodha iti kīṭa upekṣito me / 15.54 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3925: j ātyā'smi sūta uta te tanayo'smi satyaṃ tenāsmi vipra iti bhārgavavaṃ śajo'ham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3926: agre'bruvaṃ bhavata īśa nahi tvadanyo mātā pitā gurutaro jagato'pi mukhyaḥ / 15.55 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3927: ityuktamātravacane sa tu kīṭako'sya rāmasya dṛṣṭiviṣayatvata eva rūpam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3928: samprāpya naijamatipūrṇaguṇasya tasya viṣṇoranugrahata āpa vimānagaḥ svaḥ / 15.56 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3929: athā'ha rāmastamasatyavāco na te sakāṇse mama vāsayogyatā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3930: tathā'pi te naiva vṛthā madīyā bhaktirbhavejjeṣyasi sarvaśatrūn / 15.57 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3931: aspardhamānaṃ na kathañcana tvāṃ jetā kaścit spardhamānastu yāsi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3932: clxx.parābhūtiṃ nātra vicāryamasti pramādī tvaṃ bhavitā cāstrasaṅghe / 15.58 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3933: yāhīti tenokta udārakarmaṇā karṇo yayau taṃ praṇamyeśitāram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3934: tathaikalavyo'pi nirākṛto'munā droṇena tasya pratimāṃ vane'rcayat / 15.59 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3935: tataḥ kadācid dhṛtarāṣṭraputraiḥ pāṇḍoḥ sutā mṛgayāṃ samprayātāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3936: agre gacchan sārameyo rurāva dharmātmajasyātra vane mṛgārthī / 15.60 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3937: śrutvā rāvaṃ sārameyasya dūrāccharairmukhaṃ śabdavedhī pupūre /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3938: sa ekalavyo vraṇamasya nākarocchvā pūritāsyaḥ pāṇḍavānabhyayāt saḥ / 15.61 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3939: dṛṣṭvā citraṃ kuravaḥ pāṇḍavāṇsca draṣṭuṃ kartāraṃ mārgayāmāsuratra /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3942: divyānyastrāṇyāptumetāṃ ca śikṣāṃ droṇaṃ sadā pūjayati sma bhaktyā / 15.63 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3943: dṛṣṭvā viśeṣaṃ tamamuṣya pārtho droṇāyoce tvadvaro me mṛṣā'sīt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3944: ityukta enaṃ tvabhigamya dakṣiṇāṃ vipro yayāce dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhameva / 15.64 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3946: tataḥ paraṃ nāsya babhūva śikṣā sanmuṣṭihīnasya samā'rjunena / 15.65 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3947: punaḥ kṛpāl . ūraivataparvate taṃ droṇaḥ prāpyā'dādastravarāṇi tasmai /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3948: ekānta evāsya bhaktyā sutuṣṭo dhanviśreṣṭhaṃ kṛtavānarjunaṃ ca / 15.66 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3955: kāle tvetasmin bhūya evākhilaiśca nṛpairyukto māgadho yoddhukāmaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3956: prāyād yadūṃ statra nityāvyayātibalaiśvaryo'pīcchayā'gāt sa kṛṣṇaḥ / 16.1 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3958: prāpte virodhe balibhirnītimagryāṃ yayau sarāmo dakṣiṇāṇsāṃ rameśaḥ / 16.2 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3959: so'nantavīryaḥ paramo'bhayo'pi nītyai gacchan jāmadagnyaṃ dadarśa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3960: krīḍārthameko'pi tato'tidurgaṃ śrutvā gomantaṃ tatra yayau sahāgrajaḥ / 16.3 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3961: tadā dugdhābdhau saṃ sṛtisthaiḥ surādyaiḥ pūjāṃ prāptuṃ sthānameṣāṃ ca yogyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3964: saṃ suptavicchaśya udārakarmā sañjñāyai devānāṃ mukhamīkṣyāprameyaḥ / 16.5 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3968: gatvā pātāl . aṃ yudhi jitvā baliṃ ca kirīṭamādāyābhyayād yatra kṛṣṇaḥ / 16.7 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3969: tat tasya śīrṣṇi pratimucya natvā khagaḥ stutvā devadevaṃ rameśam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3970: smṛta āgacchetyeva visarjito'munā yayau dugdhābdhiṃ yatra nārāyaṇo'sau / 16.8 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3971: kirīṭaṃ tat kṛṣṇamūrdhni praviṣṭaṃ tattulyamāsīt tasya rūpeṣvabhedāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3972: tadicchayā caiva nārāyaṇasya śīrṣṇyapyāsīd yugapad dugdhavārdhau / 16.9 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3973: pūrvaṃ prāptānyeva divyāyudhāni punarvaikuṇṭhaṃ lokamitāni bhūyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3974: tadā'vaterū rauhiṇeyasya caivaṃ bhāryā'pyāyād vāruṇī nāma pūrvā / 16.10 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3976: kāntiścā'gāt tasya somasya cānyā bhāryā dvayoḥ pūrvatanā surūpā / 16.11 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3977: clxxii.t ābhī rāmo mumude tatra tiṣṭhañchaśāṅkapūgodriktakāntiḥ sudhāmā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3978: tasyā vāruṇyāḥ pratimā peyarūpā kādambarī vāruṇī tāṃ papau saḥ / 16.12 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3979: evaṃ tayoḥ krīḍatoḥ svairamatra rājanyavṛndānugato jarāsutaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3980: giriṃ gomantaṃ parivāryādahat taṃ dṛṣṭvā devau pupluvaturbalābdhau / 16.13 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3981: giristābhyāṃ pīḍitaḥ san nimagno bhūmau padbhyāṃ yojanaikādaśaṃ saḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3982: niṣpīḍit ājjaladhārodgatā'smād vahniṃ vyāptaṃ śamayāmāsa sarvam / 16.14 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3983: senāṃ praviṣṭau sarvarājanyavṛndaṃ vyamathnātāṃ devavarau svaśastraiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3984: tatra haṃ so ḍibhakaścaikalavyaḥ sakīcakastau śiśupālapauṇḍrakau / 16.15 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3985: bhaumātmajo dantavakraśca rugmī saubhādhipo maindamaindānujau ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3986: anye ca ye pārthivāḥ sarva eva krodhāt kṛṣṇaṃ parivāryābhyavarṣan / 16.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3989: bhayāt kṛṣṇaṃ śastravarṣairavarṣan kārāgṛhe vāsitā māgadhena / 16.17 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3991: kṛtvā vamacchoṇit ānārtarūpān vidrāvayāmāsa hariryathā mṛgān / 16.18 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3992: hatvā senāṃ viṃ śadakṣohiṇīṃ t āṃ tribhiryuktāṃ rugmiṇaṃ naiva kṛṣṇaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3993: rugmiṇyarthe pīḍayāmāsa śastrāṇyasya cchitvā virathaṃ drāvayānaḥ / 16.19 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3994: jarāsuto rauhiṇeyena yuddhaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā tanmusalena pothitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3996: tenā'hataḥ subhṛśaṃ rauhiṇeyaḥ papāta mūrcchābhigataḥ kṣaṇena /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3997: ajeyatvaṃ tasya dattaṃ hi dhātrā pūrvaṃ gṛhīto viṣṇunā rāmagena / 16.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3998: tathākṛte balabhadre tu kṛṣṇo gadāmādāya svāmagānmāgadheśam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:3999: tatāḍa jatrau sa tayā'bhitāḍito jagāma gāṃ mūrcchayā'bhiplutāṅgaḥ / 16.22 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4001: kruddho gṛhītvā maulimasyā'śu rāmo vadhāyodyacchanmusalaṃ bāhuṣāl . ī / 16.23 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4002: athābravīd vāyurenaṃ na rāma tvayā hantuṃ śakyate māgadho'yam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4003: vṛthā nate bāhubalaṃ prayojyamamoghaṃ te yad balaṃ tadvadastram / 16.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4004: anyo hantā balavānasya ceti śrutvā yayau balabhadro vimucya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4005: jarāsutaṃ punarudyacchamānaṃ jaghāna kṛṣṇo gadayā svayaiva / 16.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4006: tenā'hataḥ srastasamastagātraḥ papāta mūrchābhigataḥ sa rājā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4007: cirāt sañjñāṃ prāpya cāntarhito'sau samprādravad bhītabhītaḥ salajjaḥ / 16.26 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4008: yayau śiṣṭai rājabhiḥ saṃ yutaśca puraṃ jīvetyeva kṛṣṇena muktaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4009: punaryuddhaṃ bahuśaḥ keśavena kṛtvā jito rājagaṇaiḥ sametaḥ / 16.27 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4010: kṛṣṇo jitvā māgadhaṃ rauhiṇeyayukto yayau damaghoṣeṇa sārddham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4011: pitṛṣvasāyāḥ patinā tena coktaḥ pūrvaṃ jitenāpi yudhi sma bāndhavāt / 16.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4013: śrutvā vākyaṃ tasya yuddhe jitasya bhītyā yuktasyā'tmanā tadyuto'gāt / 16.29 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4014: gandharvo'sau danunāmā naro'bhūt tasmāt kṛṣṇe bhaktimāṃ ścā'sa rājā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4015: puraprāptāṃ stān sa vijñāya pāpaḥ sṛgālākhyo vāsudevaḥ krudhā'gāt / 16.30 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4016: sūryapradattaṃ rathamāruhya divyaṃ varādavadhyastigmaruceḥ sa kṛṣṇam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4018: dvidhā kṛtvā dehamasyāriṇā ca putraṃ bhaktaṃ tasya rājye'bhiṣicya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4019: sa śakradevaṃ māṇibhadraḥ purā yo yayau purīṃ svāṃ sahito'grajena / 16.32 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4020: clxxiv.nītiṃ baliṣṭhasya vihāya senāṃ dūrād yuddhaṃ yuddhaṃ darśayitvaiva guptyai /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4021: svasenāyāḥ sarvapūrṇātmaśaktiḥ punaḥ purīṃ prāpya sa pūjito'vasat / 16.33 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4027: Oṃ / gate'tha cedipe svakaṃ puraṃ janārdano'śṛṇot /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4033: tadā jagāma keśavo javena kuṇḍinaṃ puram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4037: kimatra naḥ kṛtaṃ bhavet sukhāya hīti te'bruvan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4040: jitā vayaṃ ca sarvaśo'munaikalena saṃ yuge /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4042: amuṣya cāgrajaḥ purā nihantumudyato hi mām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4044: kimasya tūcyate balaṃ vayaṃ tṛṇopamāḥ kṛt āḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4045: samastaśo mṛdhemṛdhe hi yena cākṣatena hā / 17.9 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4051: hariṃ vadanti kecidapyado bhavenna vai mṛṣā / 17.12 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4054: na kāraṇaṃ na vidmahe na saṃ śayaḥ paro hariḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4055: vrajāma taṃ sukhārthino vayaṃ vihāya śatrutām / 17.14 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4056: idaṃ hi naḥ śubhapradaṃ nacānyathā ṇsubhaṃ kvacit /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4059: vinindya tau krudhā sphuran krudhā sphurantamīkṣya ca / 17.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4060: na tanmṛṣā hariḥ svayaṃ janārdano vadhāya naḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4061: prajāta eṣa yādavo vayaṃ ca dānaveśvarāḥ / 17.17 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4062: svadharma eṣa naḥ sadā dṛḍhapratīpatā harau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4063: svadharmiṇo hatā api prayāma sadgatiṃ dhruvam / 17.18 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4075: samastayoṣit āṃ varā vrajeta rugmiṇī dhruvam / 17.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4080: ato na deyamasya naḥ subhūbhujāṃ samāgame /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4082: nacā'syati kṣitau kvacid vimānitaḥ puro hi naḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4084: sa darpamānasaṃ yutaḥ krudhā prayāsyati dhruvam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4085: purīṃ svakāṃ tatau vayaṃ vidhema ca svayambaram / 17.29 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4086: iti sma sarvabhūbhṛt āṃ viniścayaṃ sakaiśikaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4093: surendra ājñayā'vadannṛpān va īśvaro hi saḥ / 17.33 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4100: purā bibheti naḥ sadā pratiprati sma vāsavaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4103: bhavema pīḍit ā vayaṃ varādamṛtyavo'pi hi / 17.38 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4104: purā divisthitasya ca pramardane vayaṃ kṣamāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4105: utādya yadyamuṃ vayaṃ vrajema kṛṣṇa eṣyati / 17.39 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4110: tathaiva kṛṣṇasaṃ śrayāt sa naḥ śacīpatirnayet /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4123: patatripuṅgavaṃ ca tau sa bhīṣmakānujau prabhuḥ / 17.48 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4128: athā'ha bhīṣmakaṃ prabhuḥ svayaṃ varaḥ kila tvayā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4129: abhīpsitaḥ sutākṛte śubhāya te bhavenna saḥ / 17.51 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4130: iyaṃ ramā tavā'tmajā babhūva tāṃ harernaca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4131: dadāti cet tadā pitā nirindiro vrajedadhaḥ / 17.52 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4133: na yoṣidicchayā tvahaṃ bravīmi paśya yādṛśaḥ / 17.53 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4142: clxxx.tadadbhutaṃ samīkṣya tu prabhīta āṇsu bhīṣmakaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4143: papāta pādayorvibhoḥ karomi tat tatheti ca / 17.58 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4148: svayaṃ varaḥ kṣiterbhujāṃ svadharma ityato dvayoḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4149: na doṣa āsa bhīṣmako na keśavārthamaicchata / 17.61 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4150: ato harau prabodhya taṃ gate kṛpālusattame /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4153: na keśavena sūdito jarāsuto hi manyate / 17.63 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4156: mṛdhemṛdhe jito'pi san dṛḍhāṇsayā punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4159: dhigeva pauruṣaṃ hi no yadeṣa no'jayat sadā / 17.66 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4164: ataḥ punaḥ kathaṃ hariṃ vayaṃ jayema cintyatām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4166: clxxxi.ayaṃ hi dattaputrako ma aurasād viśiṣyate /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4167: ato niveśya eṣa me surūpiṇī ca rugmiṇī / 17.70 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4174: svayaṃ tu kṛṣṇa etya no vijitya kanyakāṃ haret /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4175: tato'sya pūrvameva no hyabhāvatā kṛt ā ṇsubhā / 17.74 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4177: muniṃ hi garganāmakaṃ hyamuṣya sāla ākṣipat / 17.75 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4178: yadā'sya ṣaṇḍhatoditā muneḥ puro hi tasya ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4179: pareṇa vṛṣṇayo'hasaṃ ścukopa garga eṣu ha/ 17.76 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4180: cakāra hi pratiśravaṃ samārjaye sutaṃ drutam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4182: yato hi kṛṣṇasaṃ śrayād batāpahāsitā vayam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4183: iti bruvan vanaṃ yayau tapaśca śaivamācarat / 17.78 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4184: sa cūrṇamāyasaṃ tvadan dadarśa cābdataḥ śivam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4187: vyadhāddhareḥ pratīpakaṃ vrataṃ ca naiṣṭhikaṃ jahau / 17.80 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4190: sa yāvanena bhūbhṛt ā hi gopikābhirarcitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4192: sa cāpsarastanau sutaṃ niṣicya yāvanāya ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4196: jagāma cāraṇaṃ hariṃ prapāhi māṃ supāpinam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4197: iti sma viṣṇvanujñayā cakāra vaiṣṇavaṃ tapaḥ / 17.85 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4202: tavaiva śiṣya eṣa cātibhaktimān hi śaṅkare /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4205: vikṛṣṇakaṃ kṣitestal . aṃ vidhāya saṃ ramāma hā / 17.89 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4210: karaṃ kareṇa pīḍayan niśāmya cā'tmano bhujau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4213: samastabhūtal . e nṛpāḥ sa cāhameṣa māgadhaḥ / 17.93 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4218: svaśiṣyakaiḥ kṛtaṃ tu yat kimanyasādhitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4223: vinā bhavadbalaṃ kvacit pravartituṃ nahi kṣamaḥ / 17.98 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4224: varo hi kṛṣṇamardane vṛto'sya kevalaḥ śivāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4237: nadī suvegagāminī kalau ca yā vahed drutam / 17.105 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4245: purā jayāṇsayā hi nau yadūn na jaghnivānasau / 17.109 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4256: śatakratoḥ sabhāṃ tu tāṃ pradāya keśavāya saḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4257: nidhīn samarpya sarvaśo yayau praṇamya taṃ prabhum / 17.114 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4266: nirāyudhaṃ ca māmayaṃ varācchivasya na kṣamaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4274: sa bāhunaiva keśavo vijitya yāvanaṃ prabhuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4288: harirguhāṃ nṛpasya tu praviśya saṃ vyavasthitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4289: sa yāvanaḥ padā'hanannṛpaṃ sa taṃ dadarśa ha / 17.130 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4290: sa tasya dṛṣṭimātrato babhūva bhasmasāt kṣaṇāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4291: sa eva viṣṇuravyayo dadāha taṃ hi vahnivat / 17.131 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4297: sa yauvanāṇsvajo nṛpo na devatoṣaṇaṃ vṛthā / 17.134 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4298: tato hariṃ nirīkṣya sa stutiṃ vidhāya cottamām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4302: tal . ena muṣṭibhistathā mahīruhaiśca cūrṇit āḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4305: sa pupluve janārdanaḥ kṣaṇena tāṃ kuśasthalīm / 17.138 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4317: rathe nyaveśayaddhariḥ prapaśyatāṃ ca bhūbhṛt ām / 17.144 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4319: vidhāya tān nirāyudhān jagāma keśavaḥ śanaiḥ / 17.145 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4325: papāta bhūtal . e balo vijitya taṃ yayau purīm / 17.148 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4334: athāpare ca yādavā vijitya tadbalaṃ yayuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4337: hariṃ vavarṣa sāyakaiḥ sa siṃ havannyavartata / 17.154 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4341: sa ekalavya āṇsu taṃ vihāya dudruve bhayāt / 17.156 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4342: dhanurbhṛt āṃ vare gate raṇaṃ vihāya bhūbhṛtaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4350: nibaddhya pañcacūl . inaṃ vidhāya taṃ vyasarjayat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4353: clxxxix.ramā hariśca tatra tau vijahraturhi rugmiṇā / 17.162 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4355: hariḥ śaraṃ yamopamaṃ mumoca tasya vakṣasi / 17.163 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4360: atho viveśa keśavaḥ purīṃ kuśasthalīṃ vibhuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4362: purā tato halāyudhaḥ priyāṃ nijāṃ purā'pi hi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4366: sa tatsado gato varāt tadīyataḥ pragītikām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4371: sutāpatiṃ balaṃ ca so'bravīd yugātyaye bahau / 17.171 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4372: sa raivato balāya tāṃ pradāya gandhamādanam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4384: surāṃ śakāṇsca ye nṛpāḥ samāhutā mahotsave /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4394: sa māyayā hareḥ sutaṃ pragṛhya sūtikāgṛhāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4404: bhavāsureṇa dūṣiteti sā tato hi māyayā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4405: pidhāya tāṃ nijāṃ tanuṃ jagāma cānyayā'suram / 17.188 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4407: na gacchati sma sā patiṃ nijaṃ samīkṣya harṣit ā / 17.189 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4411: uvāca kārṣṇiramba te kuceṣṭitaṃ kathaṃ nviti / 17.191 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4412: jagāda sā'khilaṃ patau tadasya janma cā'gatim /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4413: tato'grahīt sa tāṃ priyāṃ ratiṃ ramāpateḥ sutaḥ / 17.192 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4417: sa śambaraṃ sa caitya taṃ yuyodha śaktito balī / 17.194 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4419: yadā na yoddhumāṇsakaddhareḥ sutaṃ na dṛśyate / 17.195 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4427: ramārameśayoḥ sutaṃ jagāda taṃ sma nāradaḥ / 17.199 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4434: sa taṃ na dattavāṃ stato'nujo nibaddhya taṃ maṇim /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4436: tadā sa satrajiddhariṃ śaśaṃ sa sodarāntakam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4437: upāṃ śu vartmanā tato hariḥ sayādavo yayau / 17.204 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4438: vane sa siṃ hasūditaṃ padaiḥ pradarśya vṛṣṇinām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4440: tato nidhāya tān bilaṃ sa jāmbavatparigraham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4441: viveśa tatra saṃ yugaṃ babhūva tena ceśituḥ / 17.206 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4442: yuyodha mandameva sa prabhuḥ svabhakta ityajaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4445: jagāma cetasā raghūttamaṃ nijaṃ patiṃ gatim / 17.208 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4446: cxciii.smṛtiṃ gate tu rāghave tadākṛtiṃ yadūttame /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4448: tataḥ kṣamāpayan sutāṃ pradāya rohiṇīṃ śubhām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4449: maṇiṃ ca taṃ nunāva sa prapanna āṇsu pādayoḥ / 17.210 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4455: pratīkṣya yādavāstu ye gatā gṛhaṃ tadā'hṛṣuḥ / 17.213 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4457: dadau ca satrajitkare sa vicchavirbabhūva ha / 17.214 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4460: maṇiṃ ca taṃ pradāya taṃ nanāma ha kṣamāpayan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4464: tato hi sā ca rugmiṇī priye priyāsu te'dhikam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4466: athā'pa sāmbanāmakaṃ sutaṃ ca rohiṇī hareḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4472: kṣamasva me vacaḥ prabho bravīmyatīva pāpakam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4474: na te'styagocaraṃ kvacit tathā'pi cā'jñayā vade /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4478: ajeyavadhyatāṃ ca tau śivād varaṃ samāpatuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4482: tayoḥ sahāya eva tau varācchivasya bhūtakau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4488: svayaṃ hi rājasūyitāṃ jarāsuto na manyate /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4489: yato hi vaiṣṇavaṃ kratuṃ tamāhurīśa vaidikāḥ / 17.230 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4492: samudrasaṃ śrayo bhavān bahūn pragṛhya lāvaṇān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4494: itīrya taṃ nanāma sa pra cāhasan sma yādavāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4496: prayāhi sātyake vaco bravīhi me nṛpādhamau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4497: sametya vāṃ varāyudhaiḥ karaṃ dadānyasaṃ śayam / 17.234 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4498: upaitamāṇsu saṃ yugārthinau ca puṣkaraṃ prati /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4499: itīritaḥ śineḥ suto jagāma viprasaṃ yutaḥ / 17.235 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4501: vidhāya tau tṛṇopamau girā jagāma keśavam / 17.236 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4508: sa tān samarcya mādhavaḥ pradāya corumātrakāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4509: yayau ca taiḥ samanvito vadhāya sālvaputrayoḥ / 17.240 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4510: tamatrijaṃ harātmakaṃ yato hi veda māgadhaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4512: harau tu puṣkaraṃ gate munīśvaraiḥ samarcite /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4515: samāgatau ca bhūtakau śivasya yau purassarau / 17.243 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4520: na jīyase na vadhyase kutaścaneti toṣit āt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4521: sa caitayoḥ sakhā'bhavat samājagāma tatra ca / 17.246 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4525: samīyaturyudhe hariṃ hariśca tau sasāra ha / 17.248 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4531: samāhvayad raṇāya vai tayoḥ sa tātameva hi / 17.251 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4537: śiro jahāra devatā vineduratra harṣit āḥ / 17.254 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4539: sasāra tau harānugau prabhakṣakau sa sāttvatām / 17.255 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4541: upetya cāṃ sagau hareradaṃ śatāṃ sukarṇakau / 17.256 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4545: sahograsenako yayau pitā hareḥ śarān kṣipan / 17.258 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4546: tayo rathau sahāyudhau prabhakṣya rākṣaso balī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4548: tadā gadāvarāyudhaḥ sahaiva haṃ sabhūbhṛt ā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4551: upetya muṣṭinā'hanad balaṃ sa vakṣasi krudhā / 17.261 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4552: ubhau hi bāhuṣāl . ināvayuddhyatāṃ ca muṣṭibhiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4553: ciraṃ prayuddhya taṃ balo'grahīt sa jaṅghayorvibhuḥ / 17.262 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4555: papāta pādayojane sa nā'jagāma taṃ punaḥ / 17.263 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4556: vihāya sainikāṃ śca tau nṛpau yayau vanāya saḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4557: nihatya tasya rākṣasān halāyudho nanāda ha / 17.264 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4560: sutena tasya kanyasā yuyodha sātyakī rathī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4562: ciraṃ prayuddhya sātyakiḥ sa haṃ sakanyasā balī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4563: cxcviii.śataṃ sapañcakaṃ raṇe cakarta tasya dhanvanām / 17.267 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4569: tato vihāya saṅgaraṃ gatau nirarthakaṃ tviti / 17.270 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4570: tataḥ sa haṃ sasaṃ yuto jagāma yoddhumacyutam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4571: kṣaṇena tau nirāyudhau cakāra keśavaḥ śaraiḥ / 17.271 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4585: vyadhād gadaṃ ca tau raṇaṃ vihāya hāpajagmatuḥ / 17.278 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4586: cxcix.vidhūya sainikāṃ śca sa pragṛhya cāpamātatam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4592: sa haṃ sa āṇsu kārmukaṃ punaḥ pragṛhya taṃ balam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4597: śaraṃ ca kaṇṭhakūbare vyasarjayat sa sātyakeḥ / 17.284 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4600: sa tena tacchiro balī cakarta śuklamūrddhajam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4603: balo'pi haṃ sakānujaṃ yuyodha senayā yutam / 17.287 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4604: haristu haṃ samulbaṇaiḥ śaraiḥ samardayan balam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4605: jaghāna tasya sarvaśo na kaścidatra śeṣitaḥ / 17.288 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4606: sa eka eva keśavaṃ mahāstramuk sasāra ha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4613: tathā suduḥkhasaṃ yuto vasan manoḥ paraṃ mriyet / 17.292 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4634: j ñānabhaktī harestṛptiṃ vinā viṣṇorapi kvacit / 18.3 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4636: śuddhe bhāgavate dharme nirato yad vṛkodaraḥ / 18.4 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4641: na pratīpaṃ hareḥ kvāpi sa karoti kathañcana /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4643: nāpayāti yudhaḥ kvāpi na kvacicchadma cā'caret / 18.7 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4645: na karoti svayaṃ naiṣāṃ priyamapyācaret kvacit / 18.8 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4649: na saṃ śayaṃ kadā'pyeṣa dharme jñāne'pi vā'karot / 18.10 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4661: anvenameva taddharme kṛṣṇaikā saṃ sthitā sadā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4663: nāṇsapad dhārtarāṣṭrāṃ śca mahāpadyapi sā tataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4664: na vācā manasā vā'pi pratīpaṃ keśave'carat / 18.17 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4670: j ñātvā'pi rurudhuḥ samyak sātyakiḥ kṛṣṇasammitam / 18.20 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4680: devāḥ śivādyā apitu virodhaṃ cakrire kvacit / 18.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4686: vyāsenaiva purāṇeṣu bhārate ca svasaṃ vidā / 18.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4696: avidhyanmāṇsake pāde pakṣiṇaḥ pakṣma eva ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4700: kuntī nijaṃ sutaṃ j ñātvā lajjayā nāvadacca tam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4705: na kṣatriyo hi bhavati yathā vrātyo dvijottamaḥ / 18.37 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4711: tutuṣuḥ karmaṇā tasya santaḥ sarve samāgatāḥ / 18.39 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4719: jaya bhīma mahābāho jaya duryodhaneti ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4721: dṛṣṭvā jagat susaṃ rabdhaṃ droṇo'tha dvijasattamaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4726: droṇājñayā vāritau tau yayatuḥ svaṃ svamālayam / 18.45 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4727: surāsurān susaṃ rabdhān kālena drakṣyatheti ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4728: brahmā nivārya sasuro yayau seśaḥ svamālayam / 18.46 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4729: karṇaṃ haste pragṛhyaiva dhārtarāṣṭro gṛhaṃ yayau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4730: pārthaṃ haste pragṛhyaiva bhīmaḥ prāyāt svamālayam / 18.47 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4743: atha pṛṣṭo dakṣiṇārthaṃ droṇa āha kumārakān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4745: te dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ karṇena sahitāḥ pāṇḍavā api /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4750: nivṛtteṣvakṛt ārtheṣu vayaṃ baddhvā ripuṃ tava /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4751: ānayāma na sandeha iti tasthau sasodaraḥ / 18.56 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4761: ā yojanāt puramupa na tvā jeṣyati kaścana / 18.61 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4762: iti tena vareṇaiva sukhasaṃ varddhitāṇsca te /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4766: t ān prabhagnān samālokya bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4780: t āvubhau virathau kṛtvā vicāpau ca vivarmakau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4784: hastaprāptaṃ ca pāñcālaṃ nāgrahīt sa vṛkodaraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4788: pupluve syandane cāpaṃ chitvā taṃ cāgrahīt kṣaṇāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4794: ghnantaṃ bhīmaṃ punaḥ sainyamarjunaḥ prāha mā bhavān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4800: muktā kathañcid bhīmāsyāt sā senā dudruve bhayāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4805: nahyarājñā bhavet sakhyaṃ tavetīdaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā / 18.81 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4806: na vipradharmo yad yuddhamatastvaṃ na mayā dhṛtaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4809: gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe kūle tvaṃ rājaivottare tvaham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4811: ityuktvonmucya taṃ droṇo rājyārddhaṃ gṛhya cāmutaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4814: dhārtarāṣṭraistu bhīmasya bhayāt pādau praṇamya ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4826: ajuhvatāṃ tat putrārthaṃ patnyāḥ prāṇsyaṃ havistadā / 18.89 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4827: hute haviṣi mantrābhyāṃ vaiṣṇavābhyāṃ tadaiva hi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4834: prāṇo hi bharato nāma sarvasya bharaṇācchrutaḥ / 18.93 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4836: śaṃ rūpamāṇsritā vāyuṃ śrīrityeva ca kīrtitā / 18.94 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4844: ccx.pūrvaṃ hyumā ca devyastāḥ kadācid bhartṛbhiryutāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4850: devi no mānuṣaṃ prāpyamanyagātvaṃ ca sarvathā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4852: brahmaṇaiva ca śaptāḥ sma pūrvaṃ cānyatra līlayā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4858: caturjanma bhaved bhūmau tvāṃ nānyo mārutād vrajet / 18.104 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4866: tasyai sa rudradehastho hariḥ prādād varaṃ prabhuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4868: ccxi.sarveṣvapīti cānyāsāṃ dadau śaṅkara eva ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4870: tatastadaiva dehaṃ t ā visṛjya nal . anandinī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4878: na tvaṃ yāsyasi tā devī mārutastvaccharīragaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4879: yāsyati tvaṃ sadā mūrchāṃ gato naiva vibuddhyase / 18.114 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4882: reme ce sa tayā sārddhaṃ dīrghakālaṃ jagatprabhuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4883: tato mudgalamudbodhya yayau ca svaṃ niketanam / 18.116 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4884: tato deśāntaraṃ gatvā tapaścakre sa mudgalaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4885: sendrasenā viyuktātha bhartrā cakre mahat tapaḥ / 18.117 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4889: pratyakṣe caśive jāte taddehasthe ca keśave /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4893: anyāsāṃ śiva evātha pradadau caturaḥ patīn / 18.120 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4897: t āḥ śrutvā svapatiṃ devi nacirāt prapsyasīti ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4898: viṣṇūktaṃ śaṅkaroktaṃ ca catvāraḥ patayaḥ pṛthak / 18.122 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4906: matpālite yoṣitaṃ tvaṃ vṛthā ṇsapasi durmate / 18.126 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4911: udbabarha giriṃ taṃ tu dadarśātra ca tān surān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4914: tato vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ viṣṇuṃ prāpya sa vāsavaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4918: śaśāpa mānuṣeṣu tvaṃ kṣipraṃ j ātaḥ parābhavam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4923: svaloke prāpsyasi svārthe varo'yaṃ te mṛṣā bhavet / 18.134 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4925: mṛṣā vāg yeṣu te proktā mārutādyāstu te'khilāḥ / 18.135 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4926: t āsāṃ patitvamāpsyanti bhāratyaiva tu pārvatī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4929: j ātā iti śrutistatra nāvajñā te'tra kāraṇam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4934: ukto'rthaḥ sarva evāyaṃ tathā pūrvoditāṇsca ye / 18.139 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4954: na snehāt tad balaṃ j ñātvā pārthānāṃ keśavasya ca / 18.148 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4957: api taṃ bahuśaḥ kṛṣṇavijitaṃ naiva tatyajuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:4958: āsurāḥ pūrvasaṃ skārāt saṃ skāro balavān yataḥ / 18.150 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:5091: t ān bhaktinamraśirasaḥ samudīkṣya kṛṣṇo bhīmaṃ jagāda nata āṇsu hiḍimbayā ca/

GSP33m_mbhtnu:5093: evaṃ bruvatyagaṇitoruguṇe rameśa Oṃ ityudīrya kṛtavāṃ śca tathaiva bhīmaḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:5095: sā nandanādiṣu vaneṣu vihṛtya tena sāyaṃ prayāti pṛthayā sahitāṃ śca pārthān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5096: evaṃ yayāvapi tayoriha vatsarārddho jātaśca sūnurativīryabalopapannaḥ / 19.62 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5097: devo'pi rākṣasatanurnirṛtiḥ purā yaāveśayuk ca giriśasya ghaṭotkacākhyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5098: pūrvaṃ ghaṭopamamamuṣya śiro babhūva keśā nimeṣata udāsurato hi nāma / 19.63 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5099: j āte sute samayato bhagavatkṛt āt sa bhīmo jagāda sasutāṃ gamanāya tāṃ ca /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:5101: vyāso'pi pāṇḍutanayaiḥ sahito bakasya raudrād varājjayavadhāpagatasya nityam /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:5103: t ān brāhmaṇasya ca gṛhe praṇidhāya kṛṣṇaḥ śiṣyā mamaita iti viprakumārarūpān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5104: āyāmi kāla iti tānanuśāsya cāyāt te tatra vāsamatha cakruranūcya vedān / 19.66 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5105: bhikṣāmaṭatsu satataṃ pratihuṅkṛtena bhīme viśāṃ sadana eva gṛhapramāṇam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5106: bhāṇḍaṃ kulālavihitaṃ pratigṛhya gacchatyāṇsaṅkayā'vagamanasya tamāha dhārmaḥ / 19.67 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5107: sthūlaṃ hi sadma pṛthivīsahitaṃ tvarakṣa uddhṛtya vahnimukhatastadu caikadoṣṇā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5108: bhāṇḍaṃ tadarthamuru kumbhakareṇa dattaṃ bhikṣāṃ ca tena carasi pratihuṅkṛtena / 19.68 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5109: dharmasya te suniyaterbalataśca bodho bhūyāt suyodhanajanasya tato bhayaṃ me /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5110: mātrā sahaiva vasa phalgunapūrvakaistvamānītameva paribhuṅkṣva natu vrajethāḥ / 19.69 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5111: ccxxii.ityukta āṇsu sa cakāra tathaiva bhīmaste'pi svadharmaparirakṣaṇahetumaunāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5112: bhikṣāṃ carantyatha caturṣvapi teṣu yāteṣvekatra mātṛsahitaḥ sa kadācidāste / 19.70 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5113: tatkāla eva ruditaṃ nijavāsahetorviprasya dārasahitasya niśamya bhīmaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:5114: strībālasaṃ yutagṛhe śiśulāl . anādau lajjediti sma jananīmavadannacāgāt / 19.71 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6159: ato vayaṃ trayo'dya taṃ prayāma māgadhaṃ ripum / 21.109 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6160: haniṣya eva māgadhaṃ hareḥ puro na saṃ śayaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6162: vayaṃ trayaḥ sametya taṃ prayātayāma mṛtyave /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6164: bhayaṃ na kāryameva te mayā hataḥ sa neti ha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6165: mayā hinītihetutaḥ svayaṃ na hanyate ripuḥ / 21.112 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6167: nihanyate yadā tadā prakāṇsitaṃ hi me balam / 21.113 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6168: ato na śaṅkitaṃ manaḥ kuruṣva bhūpate kvacit /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6170: itīritaḥ sa viṣṇunā vicārya tadguṇān parān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6171: tatheti cā'ha te trayaḥ pratasthurāṇsu māgadhān / 21.115 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6176: advārataste nagaraṃ praviśya māṣasya nāl . ena kṛt āstribherīḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6178: tathā'paṇebhyo bahumālyagandhān prasahya saṅgṛhya śubhāṃ śca dadhruḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6179: advāratastasya gṛhaṃ ca sasrurbhośabdatastaṃ ca nṛpaḥ prasasruḥ / 21.119 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6180: t ān vipraveṣān sa niśāmya rājā mahābhujān snātakaveṣayuktān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6181: dvitīyavarṇān pravicintya bāhūn jyākarkaśān vīkṣya babhāṣa etān / 21.120 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6182: ke ṣṭhātha kiṃ hetuta āgatāṇsca kṛtaśca me parvataliṅgabhedanam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6183: kṛtaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kuta eva durnayāḥ kṛt āstathā'nye dvijavaryaveṣaiḥ / 21.121 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6184: cclxix.iti bruvāṇaṃ bhagavānuvāca kāryaṃ hi śatrorakhilaṃ pratīpam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6185: ityukta ūce nahi vipraśatrurahaṃ kuto vo mama śatrutā bhavet / 21.122 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6186: ityuktavākyaṃ nṛpatiṃ jagāda janārdano naiva hi tādṛśā dvijāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6187: vayaṃ ripuste'smi hi vāsudeva imau ca bhīmārjunanāmadheyau / 21.123 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6188: yad bāndhavān naḥ piśitāṇsidharmato raudre makhe kalpayituṃ paśutve /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6189: icchasyare vedapathaṃ vihāya taṃ tvāṃ balācchāstumihā'gatā vayam / 21.124 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6190: vimokṣayāmaḥ svajanān yadi tvaṃ na mocayasyadya nigṛhya ca tvām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6191: muñcāthavā tānabhiyāhi vā'smān raṇāya martuṃ kṛtaniścayo'tra / 21.125 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6192: itīrito'sau magadhādhipo ruṣā jagāda nāhaṃ śiva yāgayuktān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6193: mokṣye paśūn yugapad vā krameṇa yotsye ca vo'thāpi camūsahāyān / 21.126 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6197: ehyekameko vā'smāsu sasainyo vā raṇe nṛpa / 21.128 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6198: yena kāmayase yoddhuṃ taṃ na āsādaya drutam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6207: māgadhasya sasainyasya svagṛhe saṃ sthitasya ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6212: mukhena māgadhasyaiva vṛṇvekaṃ na iti bruvan / 21.134 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6216: abalatvād yuvā'pyeṣa bāla eva mato mama / 21.136 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6220: etadarthaṃ hi kṛṣṇena sahā'nītaḥ sa phalgunaḥ / 21.138 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6221: j ānan kṛṣṇe balaṃ ghoramaviṣahyaṃ sa māgadhaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6222: kutsayan gopa iti taṃ bhayānnaivā'hvayat prabhum / 21.139 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6223: āhvayāmāsa bhīmaṃ tu syād vā me jīvanaṃ tviti /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6225: tasmāt taṃ nāhvayāmāsa vāsudevaṃ sa māgadhaḥ / 21.140 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6226: arjune tu jite kṛṣṇabhīmau māṃ nihaniṣyataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6229: kathañcijjīvitaṃ vā syānnatu naśyati me yaśaḥ / 21.142 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6230: iti sma bhīmaṃ pratiyodhanāya saṅgṛhya rājā sa jarāsuto balī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6231: rājye nijaṃ cā'tmajamabhyaṣi ñcat purā khyātaṃ patratāpākhyarudram / 21.143 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6232: cclxxi.balaṃ bhīme manyamāno'dhikaṃ tu gadāṇsikṣāmātmani cādhikāṃ nṛpaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6233: bhīto niyuddhe'sya dadau gadāṃ sa bhīmāya cānyāṃ svayamagrahīd balī / 21.144 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6234: tadarthamevā'śu gadāṃ pragṛhya bhīmo yayau māgadhasaṃ yuto bahiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6235: purāt sakṛṣṇārjuna eva tatra tvayuddhyatāṃ keśavapārthayoḥ puraḥ / 21.145 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6236: vācā'jayat taṃ prathamaṃ vṛkodaraḥ śivāṇsrayaṃ viṣṇuguṇaprakāṇsayā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6239: anyonyayorvakṣasi pātite ruṣā yathā'śmanoḥ pāṃ supiṇḍau sumuktau / 21.147 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6242: cacāla pṛthvī girayaśca cūrṇit āḥ kulācalāṇsceluralaṃ vicakṣubhuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6245: paśyanti sarve kramaśo balaṃ svaṃ samādade mārutanandano'pi / 21.150 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6246: mānayitvā varaṃ dhāturdivasān daśa pañca ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6247: vāsudevājñayā bhīmaḥ śatruṃ hantuṃ nao dadhe / 21.151 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6256: cclxxii.nihatya kṛṣṇasya ripuṃ sa bhīmaḥ samarpayāmāsa tadarcanaṃ hareḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6257: kṛt āṃ hi bhīmena samarcanāṃ t āṃ samakṣamādātumihā'gato hyajaḥ / 21.156 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6258: svīkṛtya pūjāṃ ca vṛkodarasya dṛḍhaṃ samāṇsliṣya ca taṃ janārdanaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6259: prīto nitāntaṃ punareva kṛṣṇaṃ nanāma bhīmaḥ praṇato'rjunena / 21.157 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6260: jagmuḥ surāṇscātitarāṃ prahṛṣṭā brahmādayo dīnatarāṇsca daityāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6262: suto yayau śaraṇaṃ t ān rameśabhīmārjunān sahadevo'sya dhīmān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6263: rathaṃ svasāraṃ ca dadau sa māruternanāma kṛṣṇaṃ parayā ca bhaktyā / 21.159 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6264: ratho hyasau vasunā vāsudevācchakrāntarā'pto vasuvaṃ śajatvāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6265: jarāsutasyā'sa vṛkodarastaṃ hare rathaṃ prārpayāmāsa tasmai / 21.160 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6266: kṛṣṇo'smarad garuḍaṃ sa dhvaje'bhūd rathaṃ kṛṣṇo'thā'ruhat pāṇḍavābhyām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6267: bhīmaḥ kanyāṃ sahadevasya hetoḥ samagrahīdanujasyā'tmanaḥ saḥ / 21.161 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6268: nakulasyā'dānmadrarājo hi pūrvaṃ svīyāṃ kanyāṃ sā tathaiṣā'pyuṣā hi/
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6269: ekā pūrvaṃ te aśvinoścaiva bhāryā yamau remāte yaduṣā aśvibhāryā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6272: tadājñayā pitṛkāryāṇi kṛtvā tadājñayaivāmucat tān nṛpāṃ śca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6273: taiḥ saṃ stutaḥ keśavo bhīmapārthayukto yayau bhaktinamrairyathāvat / 21.163 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6274: sambhāvitāste sahadevena samyak praśasya kṛṣṇaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca sarve /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6276: kṛṣṇaṇsca pārthau ca tathaikayānaṃ samāsthitā dharmajamabhyagacchan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6280: cclxxiii.kartā hi tasy aparameṣṭhipadaṃ prayāti yadyanyasadguṇavaraiḥ parameṣṭhitulyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6281: bhīme makhasya phalamatyadhikaṃ nidhātuṃ vyāsaḥ kratuṃ tamadiśad gururabjajasya / 21.167 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6283: sa eva tatphalaṃ pūrṇaṃ bhuṅkte'nyo'lpamiti sthitiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6284: vinā viṣṇuṃ nirṇayo'yaṃ sa hi karmaphalojjhitaḥ / 21.168 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6285: hetavo'pi hi pāpasya na prāyaḥ phalabhāginaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6291: tasmād brahmapadāvāptyai vyāso bhīmasya taṃ kratum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6294: mamāsti tad diśāṃ jayo mamaiva vāñchitaḥ prabho / 21.173 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6298: na yānti nāpi te vaśaṃ prayāti karṇa eva ca / 21.175 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6300: dadāti te hyatispṛdhā na vadhya eṣa te'dya ca / 21.176 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6301: savarmakuṇḍalatvato na vadhya eṣa yat tvayā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6302: tato vṛkodaro diśaṃ prayātu te pituḥ priyām / 21.177 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6304: bhīmāya nātra sandeho jito'nena ca saṃ yuge / 21.178 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6308: tasmāt karaṃ prayacchanti jitā vā pūrvameva vā / 21.180 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6309: prayāhi ca tvaṃ dhanadaprapālitāṃ diśaṃ dvīpān sapta cāṇseṣadikṣu /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6310: nāgāṃ śca daityāṃ śca tathā'dharasthān vijitya śīghraṃ punarehi cātra / 21.181 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6311: ratho hi divyo'mbaragastavāsti divyāni cāstrāṇi dhanuśca divyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6312: ye'nye ca bāṇapramukhā ajeyāḥ śarvāṇsrayāstānapi bhīma etu / 21.182 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6313: tathā surāṇscāpi samastaśo'sya baliṃ prayacchanti madajñayetare /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6314: diśaṃ pratīcīmatha dakṣiṇāṃ ca yātāṃ yamau kramaśo hyadhvarārthe / 21.183 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6315: yaśaśca dharmaśca tayorapi syāditi syaditi sma kṛṣṇena sutena kāl . yāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6316: ukte yayuste tamabhipraṇamya diśo yathoktāḥ paramorusadguṇāḥ / 21.184 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6318: jite'tra kīcake raṇe samādade karaṃ tataḥ / 21.185 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6319: tataḥ kramānnṛpān jitvā cedīnāṃ viṣayaṃ gataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6322: karaṃ sumahadādāya tataḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ yayau / 21.187 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6323: krameṇa sarvān nirjitya pauṇḍrakaṃ ca mahābalam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6327: cclxxv.bāhuyuddhena śeṣaṃ ca garuḍaṃ ca mahābalam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6329: t ābhyāṃ ca dṛḍhamāṇsliṣṭaḥ snehaviklinnayā dhiyā / 21.190 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6330: poplūyamānaḥ sa tato'mbudhau balī jagāma bāṇasya puraṃ haraṃ ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6331: raṇe'jayad vāraṇarūpamāsthitaṃ krīḍantametena ca toṣito haraḥ / 21.191 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6336: hariṃ tato baleḥ sutād dadau ca ratnasañcayam / 21.193 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6340: puro nidhāya tad vasu prabhūtamānamat tadā / 21.195 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6349: ūce taṃ bhagavān vyāso jitaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā'rihan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6350: jaye sarvasya yajño'yaṃ pūrṇo bhavati nānyathā / 21.200 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6355: tatra rugmī na yuyudhe sahadevena vīryavān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6356: jitaḥ kṛṣṇena pūrvaṃ yaḥ śarvādāpa dhanurvaram / 21.203 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6366: vicārya keśavaṃ ca taṃ balaṃ ca bhīmapārthayoḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6369: yayau ca mādrinandanaṃ sa cā'yayau svakaṃ puram / 21.208 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6374: yāta eva diśamuttarāṃ yadā pārvatīyakanṛpāḥ samāyayuḥ / 21.210 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6377: t ān vijitya yugapat sa pāṇḍavaḥ sañjayan kramaśa eva tāṃ diśam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6379: so'bhiyuddhya sagajo dināṣṭakaṃ śrānta āha puruhūtanandanam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6380: brūhi te samarakāraṇaṃ tviti prāha dehi karamityathārjunaḥ / 21.213 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6381: so'pyadāt karamamuṣya vāsavo madgurustava piteti sādaram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6383: snehapūrvaṃ pradatte tu kare naivā'ha cottaram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6392: catvāro yojanānāṃ hi daśa triṃ śacchataṃ tathā / 21.219 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6393: catuḥ śataṃ ca kramaśa ucchritā digjayārjitāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6406: kimu pātrādikaṃ sarvaṃ śibirāṇi ca sarvaśaḥ / 21.225 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6414: prāṇsniko'tra paripūrṇaciddhano vyāsa eva bhagavān babhūva ha / 21.229 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6416: nāsti tatsadṛśa uttamaḥ kutaḥ pāra eṣa na tato'nya ityapi / 21.230 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6420: saṃ śayaṃ bhūbhṛt āṃ bhettuṃ bhīṣmaṃ papraccha dharmavit / 21.232 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6422: kṛte brahmādibhirapi kṛṣṇaṃ martyaṃ hi menire / 21.233 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6423: cclxxix.nṛpāstasmādayaṃ kṛṣṇo nārāyaṇa iti sma ha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6427: sarvaśāstravidaṃ bhīṣmaṃ j ānantyete nṛpā api /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6431: iti pṛṣṭo'bravīd bhīṣmaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ pūjyatamaṃ prabhum / 21.237 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6434: vipratvānna viruddhyante tata eva ca yuktatām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6435: manyante na virodhaśca teṣāṃ tatra hi tādṛśaḥ / 21.239 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6439: vivādena ca kīrtiḥ syād vāsudevasya vistṛt ā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6443: agryopahāramupayāpita eva kṛṣṇe kopādanindadamumāṇsu ca cedirājaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6444: śrutvaiva tat pavanajo'bhiyayau nṛpaṃ taṃ hantuṃ jagadguruvinindakamṛddhamanyuḥ / 21.243 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6445: dūre'pi keśavavinindanakārijihvāṃ mucchetsya ityurutarā'sya sadā pratijñā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6446: bhīmasya taṃ tu jagṛhe saridātmajo'tha samprocya keśavavaco nijayorvadhāya / 21.244 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6447: cclxxx.mayaiva vadhyāviti tāvāha yat keśavaḥ purā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6452: arcanāṃ ya iha mānuṣo jano madhya eva sa tu saṃ sthito'bhavat / 21.247 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6453: āsurā iha suyodhanādayastatra te vimanaso babhūvire /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6470: cclxxxi.puraṃ yayuḥ punaśca te susadma cāgaman surāḥ / 21.256 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6471: gateṣu sarvarājasu svakāṃ puraṃ svakeṣu ca/
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6481: samāsatāṃ tu sā sabhā vyarocatādhikaṃ tadā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6482: yathā sabhā svayambhuvaḥ samāsthitā ca viṣṇunā / 21.262 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6487: upāsire ca tān nṛpāḥ samastaśaḥ suhṛdgaṇāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6489: dvāraṃ sabhāyā harinīlaraśmivyūḍhaṃ na jānan sa vihāya bhittim /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6490: abhyantarāṇāṃ dṛśi no vighātinīṃ saṃ sphāṭikāmāṇsu dṛḍhaṃ cucumbe / 21.266 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6491: praveśayetāṃ ca yamau tamāṇsu sabhāṃ bhujau gṛhya nṛpopadiṣṭau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6493: cclxxxii.tatrendranīlabhuvi ratnamayāni dṛṣṭvā padmāni nīramanasā jagṛhe svavastram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6494: ratnorudīdhitinigūḍhajalaṃ sthalaṃ ca matvā papāta sahito'varajairjalaughe / 21.268 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6495: taṃ prāhasad bhagavatā kṣitibhāranāṇsahetoḥ susūcita urusvarato'tra bhīmaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6496: pāñcālarājasutayā ca samaṃ tathā'nyaiḥ svīyaistathā'nu jahasurbhagavanmahiṣyaḥ / 21.269 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6498: novāca kiñcidatha dharmasuto nivārya prāsthāpayad vasanamālyavilepanāni / 21.270 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6499: kṛṣṇāvṛkodaragataṃ bahal . aṃ nidhāya krodhaṃ yayau saśakunirdhṛtarāṣṭraputraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6500: sambrīl . ito nṛpatiṃ dattavarāmbarādīn nyakkṛtya mārgagata āha sa mātulaṃ svam / 21.271 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6503: yadi me śaktiratra syād ghātayeyaṃ vṛkodaram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6504: agrapūjāṃ ca kṛṣṇasya vilumpeyaṃ na saṃ śayaḥ / 21.273 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6508: kiṃ te vaireṇa rājendra balibhirbhrātṛbhiḥ punaḥ / 21.275 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6511: yadi teṣāṃ tadaiśvaryaṃ na māṃ gacchedaśeṣataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6512: sarvathā naiva jīveyamiti satyaṃ bravīmi te / 21.277 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6513: naca bāhubalācchakṣya ādātuṃ t āṃ śriyaṃ kvacit /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6514: nendro'pi samare śaktastān jetuṃ kimu mānuṣāḥ / 21.278 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6517: cclxxxiii.yāntāṃ śriyaṃ pradīptāṃ tvaṃ pāṇḍaveṣu prapaśyasi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6523: duryodhanaṃ tu tacchrutvā kuta ityāha durmanāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6524: abrūtāṃ tau nṛpāyā'śu dvābhyāṃ yanmantritaṃ pathi / 21.283 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6525: śrutvaiva tannetyavadat sa bhūpatirvirodhi dharmasya vināṇsakāraṇam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6526: kumantritaṃ vo na mamaitadiṣṭaṃ svabāhuvīryāptamahāṇsriyo hi te / 21.284 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6527: tvayā'pi nirjitya diśo makhāgryāḥ kāryāḥ spṛdho mā guṇavattamaistaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6530: mṛtamevādya māṃ viddhi pāṇḍavaistvaṃ sukhī bhava / 21.286 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6534: truṭyate yena śatruśca tacchastraṃ naiva cetarat / 21.288 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6535: ataḥ svadharma evāyaṃ tavāpi syāt phalaṃ mahat /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6555: sa śrutvā māgadhavadhaṃ diśāṃ vijayameva ca /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6577: prāptāḥ sabhātal . amathā'hvayadatra dharmarājaṃ sutaḥ subalakasya sa devanāya / 21.309 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6580: bhīmādibhiḥ sa vidureṇa cavāryamāṇo dyūte nidhāya paṇamapyakhilaṃ svavittam /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6584: sūto gatvā tadantaṃ samakathayadimāṃ dyūtamadhye jitā'si

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6611: cclxxxvii.dṛṣṭvā bhīmaḥ kliśyamānāṃ tu kṛṣṇāṃ dharmātyayaṃ dharmarāje ca dṛṣṭvā /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6659: cclxxxix.punaḥ punaścaiva vikarṣamāṇe duḥ śāsane'nyāni ca tādṛśāni /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6660: babhūvurantaṃ na jagāma pāpaḥ śrānto nyaṣīdat svinnagātraḥ sabhāyām / 21.348 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6661: vastroccaye śailanibhe prajāte duryodhanaḥ prāha sañjātakopaḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6664: bhīmo duryodhanaṃ hantā karṇaṃ hantā dhanañjayaḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6671: arjunārjuna naivātra kṣamā me tāta rocate /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6685: āha taṃ viduro jyeṣṭhaṃ kṣaṇe'smiṃ stava putrakāḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6701: itīrito vinirbhartsya putraṃ duḥ śāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6703: chanditā sā varaistena dharme bhāgavate sthitā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6704: naivā'tmano varān vavre vavre teṣāṃ vimokṣaṇam / 21.368 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6708: evaṃ hi bhagavaddharmastasmāt sā nāvṛṇot param / 21.370 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6709: adharmato hṛtatvāttu tad dānaṃ na varo bhavet /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6710: iti matvā pāṇḍavānāṃ vavre kṛṣṇā vimokṣaṇam / 21.371 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:6712: uktāḥ śataṃ ca viprāyā dharme bhāgavate tataḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6714: tato vimuktāḥ prayayuśca pārthā gurūn praṇamya svapuraṃ sakṛṣṇāḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6717: vyamocayo vṛkodarād vadhaśca no dhruvo bhavet / 21.374 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:6797: ccxcv.tasmin gate bhrātṛviyogakarśitaḥ papāta bhūmau sahasaiva rājā /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:7643: sa cā'ha diṣṭyā jayasi rājanniti suyodhanam /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:7651: dhārtarāṣṭraṃ samādāya yayau pātāl . amāṇsu ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7653: tvaṃ divyaḥ puruṣo vīraḥ sṛṣṭo'smābhiḥ pratoṣit āt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7656: idānīṃ sarvadevānāṃ varāt tvaṃ vijito raṇe /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7657: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā jeṣyasi pāṇḍavān / 22.404 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:7660: bhīṣmādīṃ śca vayaṃ sarvānāviśāma jayāya te /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7664: ityuktvā kṛtyayā bhūyaḥ svasthāne sthāpito nṛpaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7666: j ñātvaivāvadhyatāṃ caiva rājye buddhiṃ cakāra saḥ / 22.408 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7668: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ punaḥ karṇo vaco'bravīt / 22.409 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7670: tena mānyo'dhikaṃ loke yad bhṛtyā eva tādṛśāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7671: kimu tvaṃ rājaśārdūla taduttiṣṭha sthiro bhava / 22.410 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7672: yā ca te'rjunamāhātmye śaṅkā sā vyaitu me śṛṇu /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7673: yāvannaivārjunaṃ hanyāṃ pādau prakṣāl . aye svayam / 22.411 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7678: tad vijñāya raviḥ karṇaṃ svapna uktvā nyavārayat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7680: dadau cotkṛtya kavacaṃ kuṇḍale ca śacīpateḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7683: datvā ṇsaktiṃ yayau śakraḥ sārddhaṃ kavacakuṇḍalaiḥ / 22.416 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7684: pārthā vimucyaiva suyodhanaṃ taṃ vane vasanto muditāḥ sadaiva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7685: sahāraṇībhāṇḍamatho mṛgeṇa hṛtaṃ dvijasyā'śu niśamya cānvayuḥ / 22.417 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7689: kṣatradharmasya rakṣārthaṃ na tatpraśnān vidāṃ varāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7691: na viprāṇāṃ ca dharmo'yaṃ vidyāyā upajīvanam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7692: kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu kimuta prasabhaṃ tena te papuḥ / 22.420 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7693: devā api manuṣyeṣu jātāḥ subalino'pi hi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7703: icchan pātuṃ vāri saṃ vāritaśca pitrā bakākāramitena nāpāt / 22.425 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7705: tato dharmo yakṣatanuḥ sa bhūtvā praśnāṃ ścakre vyākarot tān sa pārthaḥ / 22.426 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7706: tatastuṣṭo varamasmai dadau sa ekotthānaṃ bhrātṛmadhye sa vavre /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7707: yadyekaḥ syānnakulo'stvityathā'ha tuṣṭo dharmaḥ kathametat kṛtaṃ te /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7708: atiprītirbhīmasene tavāsti balī cāsau rājyahetustava syāt / 22.427 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7709: ityukta ūce mādriputraṃ vihāya kuntīputro na mayotthāpanīyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7710: cccxxxiii.sa evamukto nitarāṃ prīyamāṇa utthāpayāmāsa ca tān samastān / 22.428 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7712: ajñātavāse'jñātatāṃ sarvadaiva dadau teṣāṃ prīta ivā'nṛśaṃ syāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7713: evaṃ krīḍan putra ityātmanaiva yaśodharmāvātmano varddhayan saḥ / 22.429 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7716: dātuṃ viprāya taddhaste yayau dharmo divaṃ punaḥ / 22.430 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7717: tato rājā bhīmasenārjunau ca sārddhaṃ yamābhyāmaraṇīṃ pradāya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7718: mudā yutāḥ kṛṣṇayā sārddhameva santuṣṭuvuḥ kṛṣṇamanantamacyutam / 22.431 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7724: Oṃ / nārāyaṇānugrahato yathāvannistīrya tān dvādaśābdān vane te /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7725: visṛjya ca brāhmaṇādīn sadhaumyānajñātavāsāya tato mano dadhuḥ / 23.1 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7726: gatvā virāṭasya purīṃ nidhāya hetīḥ śamyāṃ channarūpā babhūvuḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7727: yatiḥ sūdaḥ ṣaṇḍhaveṣo'śvasūtaveṣo gopo gandhakartrī cajātāḥ / 23.2 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7728: sarve virāṭaṃ yayuratra devavat sambhāvitāstena śubhorulakṣaṇāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7729: yudhiṣṭhirasyaiva śuśrūṣaṇaṃ te cakrurhṛdā vāsudevasya nānyat / 23.3 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7731: na yogya iti sūdasya babhre veṣaṃ vṛkodaraḥ / 23.4 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7734: svīyaṃ vedavidāṃ sarvaṃ deveśānāṃ ca kiṃ punaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7744: draupadī bhartṛsādharmyaṃ strīṇāṃ dharmo yataḥ sadā / 23.10 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7746: cccxxxv.vareṇa yo'jito jayī śivasya sañjagarja ca / 23.11 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7749: ya eṣa sūda āṇsu taṃ nihatya mallamojasā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7755: ya eva devanāmadhā iti śrutirjagāda hi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7756: mahāṃ śca deva eṣa tat sa me jayaṃ vidhāsyati / 23.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7762: saṃ vatsare dvimāsone vijitya diśa āgataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7764: sa draupadīmīkṣya manobhavārtaḥ samprārthayāmāsa tayā nirastaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7765: māse gate bhaginīṃ svāṃ sudeṣṇāṃ samprārthayāmāsa tadarthameva / 23.20 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7766: tayā niṣiddho'pi punaḥ punastāṃ yadā yayāce'tha ca sā'ha kṛṣṇām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7767: samānayā'śveva surāṃ madarthamitīritā neti bhīt ā'vadat sā / 23.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7768: balāt tayā preṣit ā tadgṛhāya yadā'gamat tena haste gṛhīt ā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7769: vidhūya taṃ prādravat sā sabhāyai smṛtvā'dityasthaṃ vāsudevaṃ pareśam / 23.22 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7770: cccxxxvi.anudrutyaitāṃ pātayitvā padā sa santāḍayāmāsa tadā ravisthitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7771: nārāyaṇo hetināmaiva rakṣo nyayojayat tadadṛśyaṃ samāgāt / 23.23 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7772: vāyustamāviśya tu kīcakaṃ taṃ nyapātayat tāṃ samīkṣyaiva bhīmaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7773: cukopa vṛkṣaṃ ca samīkṣamāṇaṃ taṃ vārayāmāsa yudhiṣṭhiro'grajaḥ / 23.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7774: kṛṣṇā rātrau bhīmasakāṇsametya hantuṃ pāpaṃ kīcakaṃ prairayat tam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7775: bhīmasya buddhyā niśi sā kīcakaṃ ca jagāda gantuṃ śūnyagṛhaṃ sa cāgāt / 23.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7776: tatrainamāsādya tu bhīmaseno vijitya taṃ bāhuyuddhe nihatya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7777: śiro gude pāṇipādau ca tasya praveśayāmāsa vimṛdya vīraḥ / 23.26 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7778: avadhyaṃ taṃ nihataṃ vīkṣya tasya pañcottaraṃ śatamevānujānām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7779: sarvaṃ varācchaṅkarasya hyavadhyaṃ sahaiva kṛṣṇāṃ tena dagdhuṃ babandha / 23.27 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7780: sā nīyamānā kīcakaiḥ saṃ rurāva śrutvaiva taṃ bhīmaseno mahāntam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7781: uddhṛtya vṛkṣaṃ tena jaghāna sarvānādāya kṛṣṇāṃ punarāgāt puraṃ ca / 23.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7782: evaṃ yatnāt tapasā tairavāpto varaḥ śivādajayatvaṃ raṇeṣu /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7783: avadhyatā caiva ṣaḍuttarāste śataṃ hatā bhīmasenena saṅkhe / 23.29 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7784: gandharva ityeva nihatya sarvān mumoda bhīmo draupadī cā'tha kṛṣṇām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7785: yāhītyūce tāṃ sudeṣṇā bhayena trayodaśāhaṃ pālayetyāha tāṃ sā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7786: astvityenāmāha bhayāt sudeṣṇā tathā'vasan pūrṇamabdaṃ ca te'tra / 23.30 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7787: tadā pārthān pravicintyākhilāyāṃ pṛthvyāṃ channān dhārtarāṣṭrasya dūtāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7789: tenāvadad draupadīkāraṇena duryodhano nihataṃ kīcakaṃ tam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7790: bhīmenāgustatra duryodhanādyā bhīṣmādibhiḥ saha karṇena caiva / 23.32 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7791: agre yayau tatra yoddhuṃ suśarmā sagā virāṭasya samājahāra /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7793: cccxxxvii.vijitya saṅkhe jagṛhe virāṭaṃ tadā suśarmā tamayād vṛkodaraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7794: sa tasya senāṃ vinihatya mātsyaṃ vimocya jagrāha suśarmarājam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7795: yudhiṣṭhiro mocayāmāsa taṃ ca tato rātrau nyavasan bāhyataste / 23.34 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7799: jarāsandhasya nṛpateḥ kaṃ sādīnāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / 23.36 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7800: na bādhanāya bhīṣmādyā api śekuḥ kathañcana /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7801: tasmāt te kīcakaṃ śāntaṃ śrutvā mātsyaṃ yayuryudhe / 23.37 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7803: satyāṃ kartuṃ pratijñāṃ tu yayau droṇaḥ saputrakaḥ / 23.38 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7804: yadi yuddhāya niryānti jñātāḥ syuḥ pāṇḍavāstadā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7807: tadottaraḥ sārathitve prakalpya pārthaṃ yayau tān niśāmyaiva bhītaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7808: tato'rjunaḥ sārathiṃ taṃ vidhāya kṛcchreṇa saṃ sthāpya ca taṃ yayau kurūn / 23.40 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7809: ādāya gāṇḍīvamatha dhvajaṃ ca hanūmadaṅkaṃ sadaro'grato gāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7810: nivartya yuddhāya yayau kurūṃ stān jigye sarvān dvairathenaiva saktān / 23.41 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7812: jagrāha teṣāmuttarīyāṇyṛte tu bhīṣmasya vedāstraghātaṃ sa eva / 23.42 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7813: vidhāya bhīṣmaṃ virathaṃ jagāma tadā ṇsrutvā matsyapatirjitān kurūn /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7814: mumoda putreṇa jitā iti sma tadā'ha ṣaṇḍhena jitān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / 23.43 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7815: tadā kruddhaḥ prāharat taṃ virāṭaḥ so'kṣeṇa tad bhīmadhanañjayābhyām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7816: śrutaṃ tadā kupitau tau niśāmya nyavārayat tāvapi dharmasūnuḥ / 23.44 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7817: cccxxxviii.nijasvarūpeṇa samāsthitān no yadi sma nāsau praṇipātapūrvakam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7819: tadā virāṭāsanamāsthitaṃ nṛpaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ vīkṣya virāṭa āha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7821: tato virāṭo bhayakampitāṅgaḥ praṇamya pārthāñcharaṇaṃ jagāma /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7822: dadau ca kanyāmuttarāṃ phalgunāya putrārthameva pratijagrāha so'pi / 23.47 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7823: evaṃ virāṭaṃ mocayitvaiva gāṇsca tamasyandhe kīcakān pātayitvā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7824: prāpto dharmaḥ sumahān vāyujena tasyānu pārthena ca govimokṣaṇāt / 23.48 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7825: ayātayan keśavāyātha dūtān sahābhimanyuḥ so'pi rāmeṇa sārddham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7828: sa pāñcālānāṃ vāsudevena sārddhamajñātavāsaṃ samatītya modatām / 23.50 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7829: duryodhanādyāḥ sūtaputreṇa sārddhaṃ sasaubaleyā yudhi pārthapīḍit āḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7831: ajñātavāse phalguno no'dya dṛṣṭastasmāt punaryāntu pārthā vanāya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7833: tayorvākyaṃ te tvanādṛtya pāpā vanaṃ pārthāḥ punareva prayāntu /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7834: iti dūtaṃ preṣayāmāsuratra jānanti viprā iti dharmajo'vadat / 23.53 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7839: saumyaṃ kālaṃ tato yajñe gṛhṇanti natu sūryajam / 23.55 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7841: cccxxxix.rājyaṃ na dattaṃ pārthebhyaḥ pārthāḥ kālasya pūrṇatām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7843: suvāsudevā akhilaiśca yādavaiḥ pāñcālamatsyaiśca yutāḥ sabhāryāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7844: upaplāvye te katicid dināni vāsaṃ cakruḥ kṛṣṇasaṃ śikṣit ārthāḥ / 23.57 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7854: yasya bhīmārjunau yaudhau netā yasya janārdanaḥ / 24.2 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7859: bhrātḸṛṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca lokānāṃ ca hitaiṣiṇā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7860: tato hi sarvatīrthāni gamyānyāsan nṛṇāṃ kṣitau / 24.5 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7863: j ñātvā'pi bhīmasenena viprarūpasya no vadhaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7864: yogya ityahato bhīme mṛgayārthaṃ gate kvacit / 24.7 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7866: dṛṣṭo bhīmena tāṃ styaktvā saṃ saktastena saṅgare / 24.8 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7868: jagāma kimu te putrāḥ śakyā hantumiti sma ha / 24.9 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7870: j ānāsi ca harervīryaṃ yasyedamakhilaṃ vaśe /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7874: tataḥ sahaiva yadubhiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ dvāravatīṃ gatam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7879: tayorāgamanaṃ pūrvaṃ j ñātvaiva hi hariḥ prabhuḥ / 24.14 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7881: praṇamya pādayoḥ prahvo bhaktyudrekāt kṛt āñjaliḥ / 24.15 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7888: anyatra daśalakṣaṃ me putrāḥ śūrāḥ padātayaḥ / 24.18 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7889: ityukte phalgunaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vavre tadbhaktimān yataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7893: tataḥ pārthena sahitaḥ pāṇḍavān keśavo yayau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7894: duryodhano yayau rāmaṃ sa bhayāt keśavasya ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7896: cccxlii.upaplāvye sabhāyāṃ hi tatpakṣīyaṃ vaco bruvan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7898: tato duryodhanaṃ nāyāt sa ca hārdikyasaṃ yutaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7914: śalyaṃ ca pāṇḍavāneva yāntaṃ j ñātvā suyodhanaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7916: t ā yudhiṣṭhiraklṛptāḥ sa matvā ṇsalyo'bravīdidam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7921: cccxliii.sa pāṇḍavāṃ stato gatvā tairanujñāta eva ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7925: pāṇḍavān pratyadharmaṃ ca yuddhaṃ sa pratyapādayat / 24.34 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7926: haṭhavāde'vadad bhīmo yaṃ dharmaṃ draupadī tathā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7929: tato niruttaraḥ kṛṣṇaṃ pāṇḍavāṃ śca praṇamya saḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7930: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ yayau taṃ ca vinindya prayayau gṛham / 24.36 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7941: rājyaṃ nādāt pāṇḍavānāṃ tato dharmasuto nṛpaḥ / 24.41 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7942: yaduktavān sañjayāya yadi ditsatiḥ naḥ pitā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7943: rājyaṃ tadā tvamāgaccha viduro vā na cennaca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7946: vakṣye pathyāni yuktāni yadi nāsau grahīṣyati /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7947: vadhyaḥ sarvasya lokasya sa bhavet sarvadharmahā / 24.43 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7954: vadhaṃ teṣāṃ dharmameva loke jñāpayituṃ hariḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7955: ākṣipanniva bhīmaṃ taṃ yuddhāya prerayad dṛḍham / 24.47 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7956: abhiprāyaṃ keśavasya jānan bhīmo nijaṃ balam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7958: śaśaṃ sa satyaiḥ sadvākyai rājñāṃ madhye prakāṇsayan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7959: vadhaṃ kurūṇāṃ saddharmaṃ guṇān bhīmasya cāmitān / 24.49 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7961: evaṃ lokasya saṃ vādahetoḥ saṃ vādamakratām / 24.50 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7967: dasyūnāṃ nigraho dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ yataḥ paraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7968: ato na dhārtarāṣṭrairnaḥ sandhiḥ syāditi pārṣatī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7969: jagāda kṛṣṇaṃ so'pyenāṃ Oṃ ityuktvā viniryayau / 24.53 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7970: cccxlv.sasātyakiḥ syandanavaryasaṃ sthitaḥ pṛthātanūjairakhilaiḥ sa bhūmipaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7971: anvāgato dūrataraṃ girā tān saṃ sthāpya viprapravaraiḥ kurūn yayau / 24.54 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7972: eko'pi viṣṇuḥ sa tu bhārgavātmā vyāsaḥ saśiṣyastadananyadṛśyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7973: yayau tadukterhi guṇān pravettuṃ nānyo hi śaktastamṛte yataḥ prabhum / 24.55 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7976: sa bhīṣmamukhyaiḥ sarasābhiyātaḥ sahaiva taiḥ prayayau rājamārge /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7979: sa bhīṣmamukhyān purato nidhāya vaicitravīryeṇa samarcito'jaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7980: raugme niṣaṇṇaḥ paramāsane prabhurbabhau svabhāsā kakubho'vabhāsayan / 24.58 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7981: yathocitaṃ teṣu vidhāya keśavo dauryodhanaṃ prāpya gṛhaṃ ca pūjitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7982: pūjāṃ tadīyāṃ guṇavaddviḍityasau jagrāha no viduraṃ cā'jagāma / 24.59 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7984: upekṣit ā draupadīyaprameyo jagāma gehaṃ vidurasya śīghram / 24.60 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7985: sa tena bhaktyā'bhigataḥ prasannaḥ praviśya cāntargṛhamīśvaro'jaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7987: pare dine'sau dhṛtarāṣṭrasūnunā samānītaḥ saṃ sadi kauravāṇām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7988: viveśa divye maṇikāñcanāsane sārddhaṃ munīndraiḥ paramārthavedibhiḥ / 24.62 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7990: yathocitāstatra vidhāya vārtā jagāda kāle kalikalmaṣāpahaḥ / 24.63 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7991: vaicitravīrya svakulasya vṛddhyai pradehi rājyaṃ tava satsutāya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7992: yaśaśca dharmaṃ paramaṃ prasādaṃ mama tvamāpnoṣi tadaiva rājan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7993: ato'nyathā yaśaso dharmataśca hīnaḥ pratīpatvamupaiṣi me'taḥ / 24.64 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7994: cccxlvi.itīritaḥ prāha mamātivartinaḥ sutaṃ svayaṃ me pratibodhayeti /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7997: yeye tadā keśavasaṃ yamāya nyamantrayaṃ ste vibudhapratīpāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7998: ato vikarṇapramukhā api sma vadhyatvamāyannaśubhāṃ gatiṃ ca / 24.66 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:7999: karṇaḥ surāgryo'pi suyodhanārthe nyamantrayad bhāvato naiva duṣṭaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8000: ato gatiścāsya suśobhanā'bhūd ye'trānukūlāḥ paramasya te śubhāḥ / 24.67 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8006: saṃ sthāpya kṛtavarmāṇaṃ rahaḥ sātyakiratra ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8013: dṛṣṭvaiva cakṣūṃ ṣi suyodhanādyā nyamīlayan dīdhitivāritāni / 24.73 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8014: pidhāya rūpaṃ punareva taddharirvaicitravīryeṇa samarthitaḥ punaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8015: kṛtvā'ndhameva prayayau suyodhanaṃ sahānugaṃ pāpatamaṃ prakāṇsya / 24.74 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8020: āyāhi pāṇḍūniti tadvacaḥ sa naivākaronmānito dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8021: saṃ sthāpya taṃ bhagavān drauṇaye ca raho'vadanmitrabhāvaṃ pṛthājaiḥ / 24.77 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8022: yāvat piturmaraṇaṃ so'pi maitrīṃ vavre pārthaistaṃ ca visṛjya kṛṣṇaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8023: yayau kurūn pūrvamevodvisṛjya pṛthāsutānāṃ sa sakāṇsamīśaḥ / 24.78 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8024: samprārthitaḥ pṛthayā caiva karṇaḥ pārthairyogaṃ yāhi sūnurmamāsi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8025: tenāpyuktā vāsavinā vinā'haṃ hanyāṃ sutāṃ ste na kathañcaneti / 24.79 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8026: tato yayuḥ kauravāḥ pāṇḍavāṇsca kurukṣetraṃ yoddhukāmāḥ sakṛṣṇāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8027: cakruśca te śibirāṇyatra sarve śubhe deśe pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇabuddhyā / 24.80 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8033: Oṃ / te sene samarārambhe samete sāgaropame /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8036: ityuktaḥ sa tathā cakre pārthaḥ paśyaṃ śca
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8048: na me kutaścit sargādyāḥ svātantryād guṇapūrtitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8052: “ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃ nyasya matparāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8062: ityukto vāsaviḥ prāha vyāptaṃ te darśayeśa me / 25.12 /
