GSP33m_mbhtnu:8374: iti sma sañcintya sahārjunena tatrā'yayāvatha pārthaṃ trigartāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8375: nyavārayaṃ stvāṣṭramastraṃ sa teṣu vyavāsṛjanmohanāyā'śu vīraḥ / 26.20 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8377: jaghnustadā vāsavistān visṛjya prāgjyotiṣaṃ hantumihābhyagād drutam / 26.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8378: visṛjya bhīmaṃ sa ca pārthameva yayau gajaskandhagato gajaṃ tam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8380: ccclxiii.manojavenaiva rathe pareṇa sambhrāmyamāṇe natu taṃ gajaḥ saḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8381: prāptuṃ śaśākātha śaraiḥ sutīkṣṇairabhyarddayāmāsa nṛpaṃ sa vāsaviḥ / 26.23 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8382: astraiśca śastraiḥ suciraṃ nṛvīrāvayuddhyatāṃ tau balināṃ prabarhau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8383: atho cakartāsya dhanuḥ sa pārthaḥ sa vaiṣṇavāstraṃ ca tadā'ṅkuśe'karot / 26.24 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8384: tasminnastre tena tadā pramukte dadhāra tad vāsudevo'mitaujāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8385: tadaṃ sadeśasya tu vaijayantī babhūva mālā'khilalokabhartuḥ / 26.25 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8386: dṛṣṭvaiva tad dhāritamacyutena pārthaḥ kimarthaṃ vidhṛtaṃ tvayeti /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8387: ūce tamāhā'śu jagannivāso mayā'khilaṃ dhāryate sarvadaiva / 26.26 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8388: na mādṛśo'nyo'sti kutaḥ paro mat so'haṃ caturdhā jagato hitāya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8389: sthito'smi mokṣapral . ayasthitīnāṃ sṛṣṭeṇsca kartā kramaśaḥ svamūrtibhiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8390: sa vāsudevādicatuḥ svarūpaḥ sthito'niruddho hṛdi cākhilasya / 26.27 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8391: sa eva ca kroḍatanuḥ parā'haṃ bhūmipriyārthaṃ narakāya cādām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8392: astraṃ madīyaṃ varamasya cādāmavadhyatāṃ yāvadastraṃ sasūnoḥ / 26.28 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8393: astrasya cānyo natu kaścidasti yo'vadhya etasya kutaśca mattaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8394: iti sma tenaiva mayā dhṛtaṃ tadastraṃ tadenaṃ jahi cāstrahīnam / 26.29 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8395: ityuktamākarṇya sa keśavena sammantrya bāṇaṃ hṛdaye mumoca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8398: nihatya tau vāsavirugrapauruṣo mumoda sādhu svajanābhipūjitaḥ / 26.31 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8399: athācalaṃ vṛṣakaṃ caiva hatvā kanīyasau śakunestaṃ ca bāṇaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8400: vivyādha māyāmasṛjat sa tāṃ ca vijñānāstreṇā'śu nāṇsāya cakre / 26.32 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8401: sa naṣṭamāyaḥ prādravat pāpakarmā tataḥ pārthaḥ śarapūgaiścamūṃ t ām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8402: vidrāvayāmāsa tadā guroḥ suto māhiṣmatīpatimājau jaghāna / 26.33 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8403: ccclxiv.tadā bhīmastasya nihatya vāhān vyadrāvayad dhārtarāṣṭrīṃ camūṃ ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8404: bhīmārjunābhyāṃ hanyamānāṃ camūṃ t āṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇaḥ kṣipramapājahāra / 26.34 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8406: duryodhano'śrāvayad dīnavākyānyatra droṇaṃ so'pi nṛpaṃ jagāda / 26.35 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8407: pārthe gate śvo nṛpatiṃ grahīṣye nihanmi vā tatsadṛśaṃ tadīyam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8408: iti pratijñāṃ sa vidhāya bhūyaḥ prātaryayau yuddhamākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ / 26.36 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8409: padmavyūhaṃ vyūhya parairabhedyaṃ varād viṣṇostasya mantraṃ hyajaptvā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8410: pārthāṇsca taṃ prāpurṛte'rjunena saṃ śaptakairyuyudhe so'pi vīraḥ / 26.37 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8411: pārthā vyūhaṃ tu taṃ prāpya nāṇsakan bhettumudyatāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8412: j ānaṃ śca pratibhāyogāt kāmyaṃ naivājapanmanum / 26.38 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8414: bhindhi vyūhamimaṃ t āta vayaṃ tvāmanuyāmahe / 26.39 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8415: sa evamukto rathināṃ prabarho viveśa bhittvā dviṣatāṃ camūṃ t ām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8416: anveva taṃ vāyusutādayaśca vivikṣavaḥ saindhavenaiva ruddhāḥ / 26.40 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8420: praviśya vīraḥ sa dhanañjayātmajo vilol . ayāmāsa parorusenām / 26.42 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8423: sa lakṣaṇaṃ rājasutaṃ prasahya pituḥ samīpe'nayadāṇsu mṛtyave /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8424: bṛhadbalaṃ cottamavīryakarmā varaṃ rathānāmayutaṃ ca patribhiḥ / 26.44 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8426: sammantrya karṇaṃ purato nidhāya cakrurvicāpāṇsvarathaṃ kṣaṇena / 26.45 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8427: ccclxv.karṇo dhanustasya kṛpaśca sārathī droṇo hayānāṇsu vidhamya sāyakaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8429: bhīteṣu kṛṣṇādatha tadvadhāya teṣvāsasādā'śu gadāyudhaṃ gadī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8431: tasmin hate śatruravaṃ niśamya harṣodbhavaṃ mārutirugravikramaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8434: vijitya saṃ śaptakapūgamugro niśāgame vāsavirāpa sācyutaḥ / 26.49 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8435: niśamya putrasya vadhaṃ bhṛśārtaḥ pratiśravaṃ so'tha cakāra vīraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8436: jayadrathasyaiva vadhe niśāyāṃ svapne'nayat taṃ giriśāntikaṃ hariḥ / 26.50 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8445: trātāsmyahaṃ sarvatheti pratijñāṃ kṛtvā droṇo vyūhamabhedyamātanot / 26.54 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8446: sa divyamagryaṃ śakaṭābjacakraṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ vyūhamukhe vyavasthitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8450: ccclxvi.pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tamāṇsvagāt tataḥ kālātyayaṃ tveva viśaṅkamānaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8452: vijitya hārdikyamathāprayatnaḥ sa indrasūnuḥ praviveśa tad balam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8453: vilol . ayāmāsa ca sāyakottamairyathā gajendro nal . inīṃ baloddhataḥ / 26.58 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8454: sa uccakāṇse'tiratho rathottame savāsudevo hariṇā yathendraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8455: cakarta cogro dviṣatāṃ śirāṃ si śaraiḥ śarīrāntakaraiḥ samantataḥ / 26.59 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8461: sa tu tena śaraistīkṣṇairarpito virathaṃ kṣaṇāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8463: gadāṃ cikṣepa sā tasya vāruṇeḥ śira eva tu /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8466: tayā viśīrṇamastiṣko mariṣyasi na saṃ śayaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8467: amoghā cānyathā seyaṃ gadā tava bhaviṣyati / 26.64 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8468: ityabravīt taṃ varuṇaḥ purā tena sa keśave /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8470: hateṣu vīreṣu nijeṣu saṅghaśo vidrāviteṣvālul . ite ca sainye /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8471: duryodhano droṇamupetya dīnamuvāca hā pārtha upekṣitastvayā / 26.66 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8472: itīrite'bhedyamamuṣya varma baddhvā mahāmantrabalāt sa vipraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8473: jagāda yenaiva balena pārthairviruddhyase tena hi yāhi phalgunam / 26.67 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8476: vivyādha pārtho'pi tamugravegaiḥ śarairna te tasya ca varmabhedam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8478: sandhīyamānaṃ tu guroḥ sutastacciccheda pārtho'tha suyodhanāṇsvān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8479: hatvā tal . e'viddhyadathainamugrairdrauṇiḥ śaraiḥ pārthamavārayad yudhi / 26.70 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8484: sa vīravaryaḥ sthaviro'pi yūnāṃ yuveva madhye pracacāra dhanvinām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8487: nivāritastena śiraḥ śareṇa cakarta pāñcālasutasya vipraḥ / 26.74 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8488: nihatya taṃ vīratamaṃ raṇotkaṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bāṇagaṇaiḥ samārdayat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8489: sa śaktistena vidhāya saṅgaraṃ nirāyudho vyaśvarathaḥ kṛtaḥ kṣaṇāt / 26.75 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8490: sa ūrdhvabāhurbhuvi saṃ sthito'pi gṛhītumājau guruṇā'bhipannaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8492: droṇaṃ tataḥ śaiśupāliḥ saputro jārāsandhiḥ kāṇsirājaḥ saśaivyaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8493: samāsadan kekayāṇscaiva pañca samārdayan bāṇagaṇaiśca sarvaśaḥ / 26.77 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8494: sa tān krameṇaiva nikṛttakandharāñcharottamairatra vidhāya vipraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8495: nināya lokaṃ paramarkamaṇḍalaṃ vrajanti nirbhidya yamūrdhvaretasaḥ / 26.78 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8497: prāyo raṇe mārutasūnunaiva hatapravīrā mṛditāḥ parādravan / 26.79 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8499: sa pīḍitastena śaraiḥ sutejanaiḥ kṣaṇādadṛśyatvamavāpa māyayā / 26.80 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8500: so'dṛśyarūpo'nucarānapīḍayad bhīmasya tad vīkṣya cukopa mārutiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8502: tvāṣṭrāstramādatta sa kāmyakarmahīno'pi bhīmastata utthitāḥ śarāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8505: tatastu bhīmo dviṣatāṃ varūthinīṃ vidrāvayāmāsa śaraiḥ sumuktaiḥ / 26.83 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8506: tadaiva kṛṣṇātanayāḥ sametā jaghnuḥ śalaṃ saṃ yati saumadattim /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8507: alambusaṃ prāpa tadā ghaṭotkacaḥ parasparaṃ tau rathināvayuddhyatām / 26.84 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8508: ghaṭotkacastaṃ virathaṃ vidhāya khasthaṃ kha evābhiyuyodha saṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8509: tatastu taṃ bhīmasuto nigṛhya nipātya bhūmau pradadau prahāram / 26.85 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8510: padā ṇsirasyeva sa piṣṭamastako mamāra madhye pṛthivīpatīnām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8511: tasmin hate bhaimaseniḥ kurūṇāṃ vyadrāvayad rathavṛndaṃ samantāt / 26.86 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8512: tadā'sadat kṛtavarmā rathena senāṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ śaravarṣaṃ pramuñcan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8513: dadau varaṃ tasya hi pūrvamacyutaḥ prītaḥ stutyā sarvajayaṃ muhūrte / 26.87 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8514: sa tena pāñcālagaṇān vijigye yamau ca bhīmasya puro'tha taṃ ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8515: vivyādha bāṇena sa vāsudevavaraṃ vijānan na tadā samabhyayāt / 26.88 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8516: vinaiva vṛṣṇīn vijaye varo yadamuṣya tenāsya hayān sa sātyakiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8517: nihatya bāṇairatudat sa yānamanyat samāsthāya tato'pajagmivān / 26.89 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8523: śaineyamūce parasainyamagne pārthe svayaṃ yuddhyati keśavaḥ sma / 26.92 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8524: na śrūyate gāṇḍīvasyādya ghoṣaḥ saṃ śrūyate pāñcajanyasya ghoṣaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8525: tad yāhi jānīhi tamadya pārthaṃ yadi sma jīvatyasahāya eṣaḥ / 26.93 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8526: itīritaḥ sātyakiratra viprān sampūjya vittaiḥ paramāṇsiṣaṇsca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8527: jayāya tebhyaḥ pratigṛhya senāmukhaṃ yayau bhīmasenānuyātaḥ / 26.94 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8528: bhīmastu senāmukhamāṇsu bhittvā prāveśayad yuyudhānaṃ camūṃ t ām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8529: sa yuddhyamāno guruṇā'bhyupekṣitaḥ sūtaṃ nihatya drāvayāmāsa cāṇsvān / 26.95 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8530: balaṃ vivṛddhaṃ ca tadā'sya sātyakerviprāṇsīrbhiḥ kṛṣṇavarādapi sma /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8531: balasya vṛddhirhi purā'sya dattā kṛṣṇena tuṣṭena dine hi tasmin / 26.96 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8532: tato vivṛddhorubalāt sa sātyakiḥ saṃ sthāpya bhīmaṃ prayayau rathena /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8534: tayorabhūd yuddhamatīva dāruṇaṃ tatrākarot taṃ virathaṃ sa sātyakiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8535: vijitya taṃ sātyakirugradhanvā yayāvatītyaiva śirāṃ si yūnām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8536: kṛntan śaraistaṃ jalasandha āgamad raṇe gajaskandhagato'bhiyoddhum / 26.98 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8537: nivārayantaṃ tamasaṃ hyavikramaṃ nihatya bāṇaiḥ samare sa sātyakiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8538: vilol . ayāmāsa balaṃ kurūṇāṃ nighnan gajasyandanavājipattinaḥ / 26.99 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8539: sa pārvatīyāṃ śca śilāpravarṣiṇo nihatya vidrāpya ca sarvasainikān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8540: samāsadat keśavaphalgunau ca balī tamārā'śu ca yūpaketuḥ / 26.100 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8541: tayorabhūd yuddhamatīva ghoraṃ ciraṃ vicitraṃ ca mahad vibhīṣaṇam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8542: parasparaṃ tau turagān nihatya nipātya sūtau dhanuṣī nikṛtya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8544: sa saumadattirbhuvi sātyakiṃ raṇe nipātya keśeṣu ca sampragṛhya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8546: tad vāsudevastu nirīkṣya viśvataścakṣurjagādā'śu dhanañjayaṃ raṇe /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8547: trāyasva śaineyamiti sma so'pi bhallena ciccheda bhujaṃ parasya / 26.103 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8548: sa tena cotkṛttasakhaḍgabāhurvinindya pārthaṃ niṣasāda bhūmau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8549: prāyopaviṣṭaḥ śarasaṃ stare hariṃ ddhyāyan vinindannasurapraveśāt / 26.104 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8552: tadā svakīyaṃ rathametadarthaṃ klṛptaṃ dadau sātyakaye sasūtam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8553: kṛṣṇo'tha pārthasya hayāstṛṣā'rditāstadā'sṛjad vāruṇāstraṃ sa pārthaḥ / 26.106 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8554: tenaiva tīrthaṃ paramaṃ cakāra tathā'śvaśālāmapi bāṇarūpām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8557: pracodite tena rathe sthitaḥ punastathaiva bībhatsurarīnayodhayat / 26.108 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8558: śinipravīre tu gate yudhiṣṭhiraḥ punaśca cintākulito babhūva ha /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8559: jagāda bhīmaṃ ca na gāṇḍivadhvaniḥ saṃ śrūyate pāñcajanyasya rāvaḥ / 26.109 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8560: mayā niyuktaśca gataḥ sa sātyakirbhāraṃ ca tasyādhikameva manye /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8561: tat pāhi pārthaṃ yuyudhānameva ca tvaṃ bhīma gatvā yadi jīvatastau / 26.110 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8562: itīritaḥ prāha vṛkodarastaṃ na rakṣitaṃ vāsudevena pārtham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8564: ato bhayaṃ nāsti dhanañjayasya na sātyakeścaiva hareḥ prasādāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8565: rakṣyastvamevātra mato mamādya droṇo hyayaṃ yatate tvāṃ gṛhītum / 26.112 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8566: itīritaḥ prāha yudhiṣṭhirastaṃ na jīvamāne yudhi māṃ ghaṭotkace /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8567: dhṛṣṭadyumne cāstravidāṃ variṣṭhe droṇo vaśaṃ netumiha prabhuḥ kvacit / 26.113 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8568: ccclxxi.yadi priyaṃ kartumihecchasi tvaṃ mama prayāhyāṇsu ca pārthasātyakī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8569: rakṣasva sañjñāmapi siṃ hanādāt kuruṣva me pārthaśaineyadṛṣṭau / 26.114 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8570: tathā hate caiva jayadrathe me kuruṣva sañjñāmiti tena bhīmaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8571: uktastu haiḍimbamamuṣya rakṣaṇe vyadhācca senāpatimeva samyak / 26.115 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8572: sa cā'ha senāpatiratra bhīmaṃ prayāhi tau yatra ca keśavārjunau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8573: na jīvamāne mayi dharṣituṃ kṣamo droṇo nṛpaṃ mṛtyurahaṃ ca tasya / 26.116 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8574: iti bruvāṇe praṇidhāya bhīmaḥ punaḥ punastaṃ nṛpatiṃ gadādharaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8576: nyavārayat taṃ śaravarṣadhāro droṇo vacaścedamuvāca bhīmam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8577: śiṣyasnehād vāsaviḥ sātyakiśca mayā pramukto bhṛśamānatau mayi / 26.118 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8578: svīyā pratijñā'pi hi saindhavasya guptau mayā pārthakṛte visṛṣṭā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8579: dāsye na te mārgamahaṃ kathañcit paśyāstravīryaṃ mama divyamadbhutam / 26.119 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8580: ityuktavākyaḥ sa gadāṃ samādade cikṣepa tāṃ droṇarathāya bhīmaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8581: uvāca cāhaṃ pitṛvanmānaye tvāṃ sadā mṛdustvāṃ prati nānyathā kvacit / 26.120 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8582: amārdave paśya ca yādṛśaṃ balaṃ mameti tasyā'śu vicūrṇito rathaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8584: droṇo gadāmāpatatīṃ nirīkṣya tvavapluto lāghavato dharātal . e /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8585: tadaiva duryodhanayāpitaṃ rathaṃ paraṃ samāsthāya śarān vavarṣa ha/ 26.122 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8587: śiro nidhāyā'śu puro vṛṣo yathā tamabhyayādeva rathādavaplutaḥ / 26.123 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8588: manojavādeva tamāpya bhīmo rathaṃ gṛhītvā'mbara ākṣipat kṣaṇāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8589: śakto'pyahaṃ tvāṃ na nihanmi gauravādityeva sujñāpayituṃ tadasya / 26.124 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8590: suvājisūtaḥ sa rathaḥ kṣitau patan vicūrṇito'smād gururapyavaplutaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8591: tadā viśoko'sya rathaṃ samānayat tamāruhad bhīma udāravikramaḥ / 26.125 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8592: ccclxxii.droṇo'pi duryodhanadattamanyaṃ rathaṃ samāsthāya yudhiṣṭhiraṃ yayau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8593: gṛhītukāmaṃ nṛpatiṃ prayāntaṃ nyavārayat saṃ yati vāhinīpatiḥ / 26.126 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:8611: sañjñāṃ nṛpasya sa dadāvapi siṃ hanādān śrutvā parāṃ mudamavāpa sa cāgryabuddhiḥ / 26.134 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8612: bhīmasya nānadata eva mahāsvanena viṇmūtraśoṇitamatho mṛtimāpureke /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:8617: t āṃ ścaiva tatra vinihatya tathaiva karṇo vyaśvāyudhaḥ kṛta utāpayayau kṣaṇena / 26.137 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8625: raṇaṃ tyaktvā pradudrāva rudan duḥkhāt punaḥ punaḥ / 26.141 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:8630: sughora āsīt sa tayorvimardo bhīmasya karṇasya ca dīrghakālam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8632: tato bhīmo mahābāhuḥ sahajābhyāṃ ca saṃ yutam /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:8636: evaṃ t ānyapakṛṣyāhaṃ hanyāṃ tvāmiti vedayan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8638: tatastu bhīmasya babhūva buddhiraspardhinaḥ sarvajayo hi dattaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8639: ccclxxiv.amuṣya rāmeṇa naca spṛdhā'yaṃ karṇo mayā yuddhyati kṛcchrago hyayam / 26.148 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8641: mayā tumānyaṃ vacanaṃ hareḥ sadā tasmād dāsye vivaraṃ tvadya śatroḥ / 26.149 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8642: evaṃ smṛtvā tena randhre pradatte karṇo'stravīryeṇa dhanurnyakṛntat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8643: raśmīn hayānāṃ ca tato rathaṃ sa tatyāja naijaṃ balameva vedayan / 26.150 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8644: na me rathādyairdhanuṣā'pi kāryamityeva sa khyāpayituṃ vṛkodaraḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8645: khamutpapātottamavīryatejā rathaṃ ca karṇasya samāsthitaḥ kṣaṇāt / 26.151 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8646: bhītastu karṇo rathakūbare tadā vyalīyatātaḥ sa vṛkodaro rathāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8648: naicchad gṛhītuṃ vinihantumeva vā rathaṃ dhanurvā'sya raṇe'pahartum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8649: droṇasya yadvat pūrvamatīva śakto'pyamānayad rāmavaco'sya bhaktyā / 26.153 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8650: satyāṃ kartuṃ vāsaveśca pratijñāṃ sammānayan vaiṣṇavatvācca karṇam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8651: dātuṃ randhraṃ sūryajasya prayātaḥ śarakṣepārthaṃ duramatiṣṭhadatra / 26.154 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8652: tataḥ karṇo dūragataṃ vṛkodaraṃ sammānayantaṃ rāmavākyaṃ vijānan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8653: śarairavidhyat sa ca tānavārayad gajairmṛtaistāṃ śca cakarta karṇaḥ / 26.155 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8654: vyasūn gajān prakṣipantaṃ sametya saṃ spṛśya cāpena vacaśca duṣṭam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8655: saṃ śrāvayāmāsa suyodhanasya prītyai prajānannapi tasya vīryam / 26.156 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8657: sa varmahīnaḥ pārthabāṇābhitapto vyapāgamad bhīma āpā'tmayānam / 26.157 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8658: karṇo bhīme vāsavīṃ naiva śaktiṃ vimoktumaicchannaiva bībhatsuto'nyān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8659: hanyāmiti prāha yataḥ sa kuntyai yadyapyavadhyaḥ sa tayā'pi bhīmaḥ / 26.158 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8660: nārāyaṇāstraṃ śirasi prapātitaṃ na yasya lomāpyadahaccirasthitam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8661: kiṃ tasya śaktiḥ prakaroti vāsavī tathā'nyadapyastraśastraṃ mahacca / 26.159 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8667: yuddhāyāyād rathaṃ cāpaṃ śaktiṃ caikatra nākarot / 26.161 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8668: ekaṃ hṛtaṃ cedanyat syāditi matvā bhayākulaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8670: niścito maraṇāyaiva mṛtikāle tu taṃ ratham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8671: āruhyāgāddhi pūrvaṃ tu na kālaṃ manyate mṛteḥ / 26.163 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8672: śaktiṃ tu tadrathagatāṃ prasamīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ saṃ sthāpya pārthamapi sātyakimeva yoddhum /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8673: dattvā svakīyarathameva virocanasya putreṇa so'diśadamuṣya balaṃ pradāya / 26.164 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8674: śiṣyaṃ tvaśaktamiha me pratiyodhanāya pārtho hyadāditi sa sātyakimīkṣamāṇaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8675: saṃ spardhayaiva yuyudhe virathaṃ cakāra tenaiva sātyakiramuṃ hariyānasaṃ sthaḥ / 26.165 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8676: na keśavarathe kaścit sthito yāti parājayam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8681: aviruddhaṃ ca dharmasya kāryaṃ rāmasya tuṣṭidam / 26.168 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8682: anupadravaṃ ca lokasyetyato bhīmo vrataṃ tvidam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8685: suśmaśruṃ māṃ na kaściddhi tathā brūyāditi sphuṭam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8688: iti tacca vijānāti bhīma eko nacāparaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8689: gāṇḍīvasyā'gamaṃ pūrvaṃ j ānātyeva hi nāradāt / 26.171 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8691: duryodhanastu śuśrāva tāṃ ca karṇāya so'bravīt / 26.172 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8694: j ānāsi matpratijñāṃ tvaṃ tvatpratijñāmahaṃ tathā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8698: ityukto vāsaviḥ prāha hantavyo'yaṃ mayaiva hi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8700: na tvatkṛtaṃ matkṛtaṃ syād gururmama yato bhavān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8702: rūkṣā vācaḥ śrāvito'yaṃ bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇasya śṛṇvataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8707: tatra vegaṃ paraṃ cakre drauṇiḥ pārthanivāraṇe / 26.180 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8709: tayorāsīcciraṃ yuddhaṃ citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca / 26.181 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8710: ccclxxvii.tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇo lohitāyati bhāskare /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8713: tamovyāpte gagane sūryamastaṃ gataṃ matvā drauṇipūrvāḥ samastāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8716: agniṃ vivikṣanniva darśitaḥ śirastadā vacaḥ prāha janārdanastam / 26.184 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8717: naitacchiraḥ pātaya bhūtal . e tvamitīritaḥ pāṇsupatāstratejasā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8719: idaṃ pitustasya kare nipātyatāṃ varo'sya datto hi purā'munā'yam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8720: śiro nikṛttaṃ bhuvi pātayed yastavāsya bhūyācca śiraḥ sahasradhā / 26.186 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8721: iti sma vadhyaḥ sa pitā'pi tenetyudīrite tasya sandhyākriyasya /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:8723: tato'bhavat tasya śiraḥ sahasradhā hariśca cakre tamaso layaṃ punaḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:8725: bhīmastadā ṇsalyasuyodhanādīn kṛpaṃ ca jitvā vyanadat subhairavam /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:8727: apūrayat pāñcajanyaṃ ca kṛṣṇo mudā tadā devadattaṃ ca pārthaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8728: bhīmasya nādaṃ sahapāñcajanyaghoṣaṃ śrutvā nihataṃ sindhurājam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8729: j ñātvā rājā dharmasuto mumoda duryodhanaścā'sa suduḥkhitastadā / 26.190 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8734: ccclxxviii.tata ekīkṛt āḥ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ sahasomakāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8735: parān vidrāvayāmāsuste bhīt āḥ prādravan diśaḥ / 26.193 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:8738: sa bhīmasenaṃ ca dhanañjayaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraṃ mādravatīsutau ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8740: te vivyadhustaṃ bahubhiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ sa tānanādṛtya cakarta bāṇaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8741: dhanūṃ ṣi citrāṇi mahārathānāṃ cakāra saṅkhe virathau yamau ca / 26.196 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8742: ādāya cāpāni parāṇi te'pi duryodhanaṃ vavṛṣuḥ sāyakaughaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8743: acintayitvaiva śarānsa eko nyavārayat tānakhilāṃ śca bāṇaiḥ / 26.197 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8744: taṃ gāhamānaṃ dviṣatāṃ bahūnāṃ madhye droṇadrauṇikṛpapradhānāḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:8747: sa āha naiṣa ṇsakyo hi jetuṃ devaiḥ savāsavaiḥ / 26.199 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8749: ato ghaṭāmahe śaktyā jayo daive samāhitaḥ / 26.200 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8751: pārthena nihato bhīmasātyakibhyāṃ ca me balam / 26.201 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8754: itaḥ paraṃ naiva raṇād rātrāvahani vā kvacit /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8755: gaccheyaṃ naca mokṣyāmi varma baddhaṃ kathaścana / 26.203 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8756: matputraśca tvayā vācyaḥ pāñcālān naiva śeṣayeḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8760: drāvayāmāsa tat sainyaṃ paśyatāṃ sarvabhūbhṛt ām / 26.205 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8762: hatāstāsāṃ ca bhīmena tisro dve phalgunena ca / 26.206 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8766: tadanyairmil . itaiḥ sarvaistaccaturthāṃ śa eva ca / 26.208 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8767: tato rātrau pañcabhiśca pārthāḥ ṣaḍbhiśca kauravāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8768: akṣohiṇībhiḥ saṃ vyūhya yuddhaṃ cakruḥ sudāruṇam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8769: bhīmaṃ senāṃ drāvayantaṃ punaḥ karṇaḥ samāsadat / 26.209 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8770: sa karṇapurato bhīmo duṣkarṇaṃ karṇameva ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8775: iti karṇasya tau bhīmaḥ sañjñayā jñāpayan bhuvi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8776: padā pipeṣa kāliṅgaṃ muṣṭinaiva jaghāna ha / 26.212 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8777: muṣṭinā tvadvadhāyāhaṃ samartha iti kiṃ vade /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8780: ketumāṃ śca pitā tasya śakradevaḥ śrutāyudhaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8781: akṣohiṇyā senayā ca saha bhīmena pātitāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8783: ccclxxx.karṇānujān dhruvādyāṃ śca bahūn jaghne sa vai niśi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8784: sañjñāṃ bhīmakṛt āṃ j ñātvā ṇsaktiṃ cikṣepa cāparām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8785: karṇaḥ śaktirmayā divyā na muktā tena jīvasi / 26.215 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8786: iti jñāpayituṃ t āṃ tu jñātvā bhīmaḥ kṣaṇāt tadā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8787: khamutpatya gṛhītvā ca karṇe cikṣepa satvaraḥ / 26.216 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8788: yadi tvayā tadā muktā ṇsaktistvāṃ sā haniṣyati /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8790: muktā dakṣabhuje sā'tha vidārya dharaṇīṃ tathā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8792: tato bhīmaḥ punaḥ svaṃ tu rathamāsthāya cāpabhṛt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8800: evaṃ tvaccūrṇane śakto matkāmāt tvaṃ hi jīvasi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8802: punaḥ karṇapuraḥ senāṃ jaghāna bahuśo raṇe /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8804: sa tu taṃ virathīkṛtya dhanuḥ kaṇṭhe'vasajya ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8806: ccclxxxi.na hantumaicchat taṃ karṇaḥ pṛthāyai svaṃ vacaḥ smaran /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8807: taṃ vijitya raṇe karṇo jaghne pārthavarūthinīm / 26.226 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8809: sā hanyamānā raṇakovidena na śaṃ lebhe mṛtyunā'rtā prajeva / 26.227 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8810: dṛṣṭvā senāṃ drauṇibalābhibhūtāṃ tamāhvayāmāsa ghaṭotkaco yudhe /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8811: drauṇistamāhā'lamalaṃ na vatsa putrastātaṃ yodhayasvādya māṃ tvam / 26.228 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8812: ityukta ūce na pitā mama tvaṃ sakhā pituryadyapi śatrusaṃ śrayāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8813: ariśca me'sīti tamāha yadyariṃ māṃ manyase tadvadahaṃ karomi te / 26.229 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8816: sa rakṣasāṃ lakṣasamāvṛto balī nṛbhiśca vīrairbahubhiḥ suśikṣitaiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8817: akṣohiṇīmātrabalena rākṣasaḥ saṅkṣobhayāmāsa guroḥ sutaṃ śaraiḥ / 26.231 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8818: sa tena bāṇairbahubhiḥ prapīḍito vibhinnagātraḥ kṣatajāplutāṅgaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8819: vyāvṛtya netre kupito mahad dhanurviṣphārya bāṇai rajanīṃ cakāra / 26.232 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8820: so'kṣohiṇīṃ t āṃ kṣaṇamātrataḥ kṣaran mahāṇsarāṃ stānapi rākṣasān kṣayam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8821: nināya putraṃ ca ghaṭotkacasya niṣṭyaṃ purā yo'ñjanavarmanāmakaḥ / 26.233 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8822: nirīkṣya senāṃ svasutaṃ ca pātitaṃ ghaṭotkaco droṇasutaṃ śareṇa /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8823: vivyādha gāḍhaṃ sa tu vihvalo dhvajaṃ samāṇsritaścā'śu sasañjñako'bhavat / 26.234 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8824: utthāya bāṇaṃ yamadaṇḍakalpaṃ sandhāya cāpe pravikṛṣya rākṣase /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8825: mumoca tenābhihataḥ papāta vinaṣṭasañjñaḥ svarathe ghaṭotkacaḥ / 26.235 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8826: vimūrcchitaṃ sārathirasya dūraṃ nināya yuddhājjagato vipaśyataḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8827: drauṇiśca senāṃ niśi taiḥ śarottamairvyadrāvayat pāṇḍavasomakānām / 26.236 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8829: vidrāvayāmāsa sa bāṇavarṣaiḥ prakampayāmāsa mahārathāṃ stathā / 26.237 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8830: ccclxxxii.tadaiva pārthaṃ prati yoddhumāgataṃ vaikartanaṃ vīkṣya jagatpatirhariḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8832: sa karṇamāhūya yuyodha tena tasyānu duryodhanapūrvakāṇsca ye /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8833: droṇena caitān samare sa eko nivārayāmāsa mamarda cādhikam / 26.239 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8834: te bādhyamānā bahuśo balīyasā karṇaṃ purodhāya tamabhyayodhayan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8835: na vivyathe tatra raṇe sa karṇaḥ svavīryamāsthāya mahāstravettā / 26.240 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8837: alambalo nāma tadaiva rākṣasaḥ samāgamad bhīmasutaṃ nihantum / 26.241 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8838: yuddhvā pragṛhyainamatho nipātya ghaṭotkaco bhūmital . e'sinā'sya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8841: yuddhvā muhūrtaṃ sa tu tena bhūmau nipātya taṃ yajñapaśuṃ cakāra / 26.243 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8847: asmin hate hataṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ naḥ pārthaḥ kariṣyati / 26.246 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8848: evaṃ sañcodyamānaḥ sa dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8852: cikṣepa mṛtyo rasanopamāmalaṃ prakāṇsayantīṃ pradiśo diśaśca / 26.248 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8853: ccclxxxiii.nirbhiṇṇavakṣāḥ sa tayā papāta vicūrṇayañchatrubalaṃ hato'pi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:8858: hate sute'graje'smākaṃ vīre kiṃ nandasi prabho / 26.251 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10387: Oṃ / yajñeśvareṇābhiyuteṣu yuktyā mahīṃ praśāsatsu pṛthāsuteṣu /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10405: sa prīyamāṇo nitarāṃ ca teṣu naivādhikaṃ prīyate bhīmasene /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10406: smaran sutāṃ stena hatān samastānapi prabhāvaṃ paramasya jānan / 31.10 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10407: tasyāpanetuṃ viṣayeṣu saktiṃ dveṣaṃ tathaivā'tmani bhīmasenaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10408: jagāda mādrīsutayoḥ samakṣamāsphoṭya saṃ śṛṇvata eva tasya / 31.11 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10409: cdxlvii.tāvimau me bhujau vṛttau pīnau candanarūṣitau /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10412: naiva tat kṛṣṇayā jñḸataṃ pṛthayā ca saputrayā / 31.13 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10414: uvāca jīvitāṇsā te nanu rājan mahīyasī /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10418: hṛtaṃ kṣetraṃ dhanaṃ yasya kiṃ bhīmena kṛtaṃ tvayi / 31.15 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10420: upakārāya bhīmena tava dveṣaṃ tyajātra tat / 31.16 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10433: cdxlviii.vayameva tvadarthāya kurmaḥ sarve tapo vane / 31.22 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10434: netyāha dhṛtarāṣṭrastaṃ kuladharmo hi no vane /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10445: anujñḸaya gṛhaṃ prāpte dharmaje viduraṃ punaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10452: tajj ñḸatvā dadatāṃ doṣo bhavediti vicintayan /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10463: mama sannihitaṃ sarvaṃ tat pitre'dyārpitaṃ mayā / 31.35 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10474: sarvaṃ samarpya govinde pārthebhyo'nyebhya eva ca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10480: iṣṭaṃ ca yajñaiḥ pūrtaiśca caritaṃ yuṣmadāṇsrayāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10484: kṛtaṃ virūpaṃ sumahat kuryād yannāparaḥ kvacit / 31.43 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10495: te hi me putrakāḥ santa ihāmutra ca saukhyadāḥ / 31.48 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10502: saṃ sthāpya tān sukṛcchreṇa yayau sā'nveva taṃ nṛpam / 31.51 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10506: trivatsarādasya nijasya lokasyā'ptiṃ sabhāryasya jagāda tatra /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10507: cdli.brahmāṅkajastena bhṛśaṃ pratīto vyāsopadiṣṭaṃ vyacarat tapo'gryam / 31.53 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10514: taiḥ pūjitastatra niṣaṇṇa āha yadyad yadiṣṭaṃ pravadantu tattat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10515: dḸasyāmi tasyādya tadityamuṣmin bhaktyucchrayaḥ pḸaṇḍusutaiḥ sadāraiḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10518: sammantrya niḥ śeṣaraṇehatānāṃ sandarśanaṃ prārthitavāṃ stamīśam / 31.58 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10519: tatastu te satyavatīsutasya sarveśvarasyā'j ñayā sarva eva /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10520: samāgatāḥ svargalokāt kṣaṇena dattā cadivyā dṛgamuṣya rājñaḥ / 31.59 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10521: ūṣuṇsca rātriṃ paramājñayaiva sarve svabhāryāsahitā yathā purā /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10522: tṛptaḥ sadāro nṛpatiśca tatra sarve'pi dṛṣṭvḸa mahadadbhutaṃ tat / 31.60 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10523: athā'j ñayaivāsya parasya sarvāḥ striyo nijeśaiḥ sahitā yayuḥ svam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10524: vinottarāṃ tāṃ tu kathāṃ niśamya pārīkṣito'yācata tātadṛṣṭim / 31.61 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10525: taṃ cḸa'nayāmāsa tadaiva kṛṣṇo hyacintyaśaktiḥ sa vikuṇṭhalokāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10526: dṛṣṭvḸa sapārīkṣita āpa tuṣṭiṃ svatātamīśena samāhṛtaṃ punaḥ / 31.62 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10528: cakre ca visrambhamatīva bhārate punaśca tatratyajanaiḥ sametaḥ / 31.63 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10529: pḸarthāḥ punaḥ prāpya puraṃ svakīyaṃ dharmeṇa pṛthvīṃ paripālayantaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10530: bhogānarāgā ajuṣanta yogyān yuktā jagaddhātari vāsudeve / 31.64 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10532: te śuśruvurdhṛtarāṣṭraṃ sabhāryaṃ sahaiva kuntyā paridagdhadeham / 31.65 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10534: sametya bhartrā pratipūjyamānāṃ kuntīṃ ca taptā vidadhuḥ kriyāṇsca / 31.66 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10547: Oṃ / tataḥ kurukṣetramavāpya kṛṣṇo dīkṣāṃ prapede dviṣaḍabdasatre /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10548: sa eva ca vyāsabhṛgūdvahātmā cakre'tra sādasyamajo'prameyaḥ / 32.1 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10549: tatrartvijo dakṣabhṛgupradhānāḥ pḸarthā yadūnāṃ pravaraiḥ sametāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10551: sarve ca jīvā vasudhātal . asthā ye'nye'ntarikṣadyumukhottareṣu /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10585: athā'sataḥ pippalamūla īśiturūrusthitaṃ pḸadatal . aṃ sutāmram /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10586: dṛṣṭvḸa jarā nāma sasarja śalyaṃ bhakto'pyalaṃ rohitaṃ śaṅkamānaḥ / 32.19 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10590: pḸapaṃ mḸaṃ jahi deveti yācantamanayad divam / 32.21 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10597: tato viri ñceśapurandarādyāḥ punaḥ stuvanto'bhiyayuḥ praṇamya /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10640: sa tad daivakṛtaṃ jñḸatvā saṃ smaran puruṣottamam /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10690: cdlix.iti śruterna te pāpād dehāṃ statyajurūrjitāḥ / 32.65 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10695: yogya eveti kṛṣṇāyā na doṣaḥ syāt kathañcana / 32.67 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10696: nītir ūpe vīryabale mahāntyeṣāṃ yataḥ kramāt /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10701: tathā'pi tatphalaṃ naitat tāratamyaṃ hi muktigam /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10705: atimānādayo doṣāḥ kuta eva hi māruteḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10742: yatra santastu te santi tatra sthātavyameva me /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10745: ityuktā devat ā dūtaṃ svānāṃ sandarśanārthinaḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10749: icchan nivartanaṃ tatra svānāṃ vḸaca ivāṇsṛṇot / 32.91 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10755: āha dūtaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ tvaṃ gaccha nāhamito vraje / 32.94 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10756: naca svargeṇa me kāryaṃ tyaktvā svajanamīdṛśam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10758: tato'tra devāḥ puruhūtapūrvakāḥ samāyayuḥ snehavaśād yudhiṣṭhire /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10759: teṣvḸagateṣveva na tatra vāco dīnā na durgandhatamo'pyapaśyat /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10761: āhātra dharmaḥ punarātmasadyaśaḥ prakāṇsayan pāṇḍusutābhidhaṃ svam /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10762: dharmād viśiṣṭā hi sadā'nṛśaṃ satā dṛṣṭā casā tvayyadhikā triśo mayā / 32.97 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10763: cdlxii.śakro'pyuvācainamidaṃ mṛṣā te pradarśitaṃ droṇakṛte mṛṣāgiraḥ /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10765: nahyājñayā vāsudevasya kiñcit pāpaṃ bhavet sarvavidharmiṇo'pi /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10766: brahmāparākṣye'pi vikarma sūcakaṃ prārabdhapāpasya viṣāṇsanaṃ yathā / 32.99 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10767: paśyātra bhīmapramukhān sukhasthān sampūjyamānāṃ stridaśaiḥ surūpān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10769: pareṇa yogena visṛṣṭatanvāṃ duḥkhaṃ bhaved devavarādhipānām / 32.100 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10772: na te nṛpḸadyāpi hi mānuṣo gato bhāvastato dveṣṭi suyodhanādīn /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10776: devāṃ śajā ye tu samastaśaste svamūlarūpaṃ samavāpya kāle /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10780: sa tu prapaśyan svajanaṃ samastaṃ svamūlarūpātisamīpasaṃ stham /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10781: dadarśa bhīmaṃ ca marutsamīpe madhye jvalantaṃ marutāṃ gaṇasya / 32.106 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10782: dadarśa kṛṣṇāmapi tatsamīpe śriyā jvalantīṃ samatītya cānyāḥ /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10783: spraṣṭuṃ ca saṃ skāravaśādiyeṣa niṣidhya taṃ prāha surādhirājaḥ / 32.107 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10784: eṣā hi sākṣājjagatāṃ priyasya prāṇātmano jīvavareśvarasya /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10785: prāṇapriyā ṇsrīriti nāma yasyāḥ śamātmake'smin ramate yadeṣā / 32.108 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10787: bhogāya sṛṣṭā puruṣottamena yuṣmatpriyārthaṃ bhavat āṃ ca dāraiḥ / 32.109 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10788: prītistato hyabhyadhikā babhūva bhīmasya cāsyāstadanu sma pārthe /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10792: sparśe'pi nāsyāḥ pavamānapatnyāḥ supūtatā'laṃ bhavat āmidānīm /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10793: nacottaratrāpi bhavet kathañcid divaukasāṃ mḸanuṣadehino yathā / 32.112 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10794: itīritaṃ taṃ pratisannivṛttaṃ vināṇsayan mānuṣavāsanāṃ svayam /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10797: svīyāni dhāmāni tato'pyanūnabhogāḥ sadā sannyavasaṃ śca tatra / 32.114 /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10800: anye ca devāṃ śabhavāḥ samastāḥ svamūlarūpaikyamavāpurāṇsu /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10801: karmakṣayādeva suretarāstu puṇyakṣayaṃ prāpya bhuvi prajātāḥ / 32.116 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10802: catuḥ sahasraṃ triśatottaraṃ te saṃ vatsarāṇāmanubhūya divyān /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10804: duḥkhe'pi teṣāmiha tāratamyaṃ kaleḥ paraṃ duḥkhamihākhilācca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10805: yathā viri ñcasya sukhaṃ paraṃ syānmuktau haridveṣakṛto viśeṣaḥ / 32.118 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10807: dveṣāt tamo'ndhaṃ tvarayā samāpnuyurdevāḥ svakāle nijayogyamuktim / 32.119 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10808: catuḥ sahasre triśatottare gate saṃ vatsarāṇāṃ tu kalau pṛthivyām /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10809: jātaḥ punarvipratanuḥ sa bhīmo daityairnigūḍhaṃ haritattvamāha / 32.120 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10810: cdlxiv.tadaiva kṛṣṇā'pi bhuvi prajātā prītyai harerandhatamasyapātayat /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10813: vḸayutvamāptaḥ sa hanūmadaṃ śo brāhmaṃ padaṃ prāpya vṛkodaraśca /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10814: vḸagīśvaratvaṃ gatayaiva kṛṣṇayā sahaiva muktiṃ gamitā'khilottamām / 32.122 /
GSP33m_mbhtnu:10815: bhuvi dyuloke ca viri ñcatāyāṃ muktau ca tābhyāmadhikaṃ samastāt /

GSP33m_mbhtnu:10825: saṃ vatsarāṇāṃ tu sahasrake gate prāpteṣu cadyāmakhileṣu satsu /
